Ultraviolet water purification is a common method for disinfecting bacteria from water (but by no means a cure-all).It's suitable for treating water taken from a river or stream that looks clear, but contains dangerous microorganisms. After three minutes of cranking, you’ll have enough power to sterilize one liter of unsafe water.   Just insert and gently twirl to purify water. You'll have better drinking water in a matter of three minutes.UV water purifiers haven proven to be extremely effective at eliminating unwanted bacteria and germs from drinking water. The UV wavelength scrambles the DNA of any organisms in the water, so that they can’t replicate and make you sick. This is a well-documented process that is backed in science (see more links at end of this section). It is a completely safe process and does not add any harmful chemicals to the water. As long as you don’t touch or look directly into the UV bulb, it poses no threat.Do note, that these devices are only intended for use with clear water and that the volume of the container will determine the correct use of the UV wand (including time of immersion and the requirement to stir the water).We developed our UV snap-in module in response to requests from the hundreds of outdoor activists who we surveyed, many of whom are familiar with the safety and efficacy of using handheld UV devices, such as the Steripen™ (which is the gold standard and the basis for our functional specifications). The owner of Steripen is Katadyn, a long-established Swiss company specializing in water treatment at all scales. We do not have a formal relationship with Katadyn, (or its Steripen subsidiary).They recognized that our UV wand could be made lighter (without sacrificing quality) since we wouldn't be duplicating the battery, controls, etc. already built into the LIFESABER. Below, you can find a collection of articles supporting the use of handheld UV devices for water purification. SteriPEN Ultra Review (with Lab Test Results) South AmericaDrinking water treatment with ultraviolet light for travelers -- Evaluation of a mobile lightweight system.Drinking water treatment with ultraviolet light for travelers – Evaluation of a mobile lightweight systemTesting of SteriPEN™, a Portable Ultraviolet Light Water Purifier, Using MS-2 Coliphage in Challenge Test Waters According to the U.S.E.P.A. Protocol’s Recommended Materials.  LIFESABER comes with a second optional snap-in attachment that starts fires in wind or rain with the press of a button.The snap-in fire starter (sold separately) creates a 2,000F degree arc to start fires even in the roughest weather. Three minutes of cranking will power 16 ignition cycles.  Unlike a butane or methane lighter, absolutely no lighter fluid is required. Plasma lighters are battery powered.Butane lighters contain flammable gas, which can break or spill in your backpack. Our lighter doesn’t contain any flammable gas. It’s built for rugged outdoor use, making it simple and practical.Cook yourself a meal, or stay warm.  Don’t get lost in the dark.Three minutes of cranking will power the built-in 31 lumens flashlight for up 30 minutes of use. You can even twirl LIFESABER to recharge as you are walking along the trail.  Illuminate your tent or campsite. Three minutes of cranking will power the built-in 31 lumens lantern for up to 30 minutes.  To signal rescuers (even flying overhead), or to startle animal or human intruders, select the built-in strobe light. Three minutes of cranking will power the strobe for up to 40 minutes.Also, with one button, you can trigger both the emergency siren and blinding strobe. This will get everyone’s attention, while disorienting any attacker.The 85-decibel siren will operate for 35 minutes after just three minutes of cranking.With a reliable flashlight/lantern and emergency strobe button, LIFESABER is a solid investment in your family's future!  The LIFESABER personal energy generator represents a technological revolution in efficiency and comfort. Our unique blend of patent-pending mechatronics enables even a child to generate the power they need in an emergency. The multi-jointed, telescoping handle of the LIFESABER enables a full 5 degrees of flexibility which accommodates the natural motion of the hand, wrist and forearm. In contrast, the crank of a typical manual generator is short and inflexible. This means that all the work has to be done by the wrist – which is awkward and quickly becomes tiring.   The weighted grip at the end of our handle permits this swing arm to be 'twirled' much like the motion of a jump rope. This is a very comfortable activity which kids can sustain for hours on the playground.Alternatively, the extended handle can be gripped for power-cranking, putting the strength of the entire arm to work.Which brings us to our unique and essential force-multiplier technology.It stands to reason that you can overcome much greater resistance (torque) while cranking than when twirling.  With the LIFESABER, the user can electronically (rather than mechanically) set the resistance (think gearing) to suit the mode (twirl vs. crank) and to match the person's strength. The higher the force multiplier setting, the more work will be accomplished during each rotation (and the faster you will generate electricity).That's why we expect that it will require a typical person (even a child) 15 minutes to generate a Quick Charge of 900 joules at the lowest resistance setting, while only 3 minutes of power cranking will produce the same results at the highest resistance setting. You can think of our proprietary technology as a kind of distant cousin to regenerative braking.   We created the LIFESABER as a potentially life saving tool for:

column1: As Power Backup in the Glove Compartment
Anyone who can’t afford to have their mobile phone die when they most need it!

LIFESABER Iterations & 5 Year Development HistoryIdeation on the high-level spec for what was originally called the Personal Energy Generator (PEG) began more than 5 years ago. The challenge was to create a self-charging device that even a child could use to generate lifesaving power, but which would be ergonomically efficient for use by even the strongest adults. Of course, the device would also have to be compact, affordable, lightweight and wilderness-friendly.  After 3 years and dozens of false starts and dead ends, I had an epiphany which led to the first of the technical breakthroughs which would be required. Specifically, development of a swing arm that could both be twirled (like a jump rope) yet comfortably cranked. The resulting PowerGrip™ was successfully prototyped in July of 2018, which featured a telescoping arm with a weighted handle for twirling. It also served as the handle grip while for cranking. We created a unique, multi--jointed design which enables an unprecedented 5 degrees of freedom in the arm’s motion. This results in comfortable, sustainable twirling or cranking while bringing to bear the full forearm strength of the user.  But while necessary, the PowerGrip was not sufficient in order to realize the ambitious product objective. It took hundreds of additional hours to prove-out the second breakthrough technology – a dynamically adjustable torque control achieved solely through electronics (no mechanical gearing).  In June of this year we completed our most advanced working prototype, enabling the user to toggle the ‘Force Multiplier’ circuit to match the rotation-resistance to the type of input (twirl vs. crank) and the strength of the user.   This sophisticated prototype was privately demonstrated – to real acclaim – at the Outdoor Retailer show in Denver. While functional, none of our existing prototypes are optimized for manufacturability, which is why we've come on Kickstarter! How confident are you that you can deliver? I have many successful products on the market. The folks who backed my Lil Trucker Kickstarter campaign were pleased with the tools I delivered. In the risks/milestones section of the campaign page we detail the years of work to get to this point where we've demonstrated the crucial technologies - including the 'force multiplier' system.I have a colleague with a PhD in electrical engineering who has run all of the development and testing of the patent-pending circuitry. We are very confident in the physics/electronics as well as mechatronics overall.  Partners This project is promoted by Jellop, the ad tech power behind the best Kickstarters with 850+ successful Kickstarter projects with over $370M raised between them.",41.0,0,"1 Campaign

At Crua, we know the outdoors.  Our designs are built with the crowd and honed over countless hours. Design. Test. Tweak. Repeat. We’re never done.

The Culla Blanket is the perfect addition to your outdoor adventures. It's lightweight, super-tough, has amazing warming properties, and can fulfill any need from a picnic blanket to a camping blanket or even a sleeping bag.

 

Culla Blanket uses recycled Ripstop— a durable fabric woven using a special reinforcing technique that makes the fabric resistant to ripping and tearing. So twigs and branches don’t stand a chance.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 *Color choices are subject to the campaign reaching its stretch goals.

 

 

And you might already know us. We create insulated tents for the outdoors, and now we’re bringing that technology to blankets.

With 9 successful Crowdfunding campaigns, more than $3.1M raised, and nearly 14K backers under our belts, we're still making awesome outdoor gear. And the Crua Culla Blanket is the newest addition to our Culla collection. We used the best materials and innovative technology to create the perfect outdoor accessory.

 

We focused on making this blanket the right size. Just big enough that you can snap it around you sleeping bag style, but not too big. However, if you want it bigger, you can connect as many as you want to make it as big as you need.

 

 

 

Tross is a data driven Crowdfunding company

column33:
> 

We have a combined 20+ years of experience in creating consumer products, developing everything from holiday decorations to summer pool floats.  We wanted to find a single person setup shade product that would allow our families to have portable shade and shelter at the beach, park, or perhaps even a sports tournament. All these activities are much more pleasant when not exposed to the elements for long periods of time.

In pursuit of this product we spoke to many of our friends and discovered that the issue of easy shade was a universal pain. Nobody loved the canopies that are currently in the market, but they were a “necessary evil”.  Many items in the marketplace advertise ease of setup and portability, but none of them actually executed on this promise.

We decided to leverage our collective design and manufacturing expertise to develop a product that provides truly effortless shade and shelter, sets up quickly, and is easy to transport.  We believe Aeri is just that, are so excited to share our creation with you.  Thanks so much for all your support and we hope to see Aeri accompany you on all your outdoor adventures.

Alex Laetsch

After graduating from the University of Southern California with a Bachelors in International Business, Alex began a career in consumer products, managing national retail accounts throughout the US in a variety of different industries. During this time, Alex also had a brief stint as a pool float inflatable model.

Alex’s passion for entrepreneurship has driven him to find creative ways to address “pain points” for customers.  From mobile app development to inflatable breakfast food floats, Alex has remained focused on solving complex consumer problems, creating efficient channels within organizations and racking up lots of air miles and hotel points along the way. For fun, he likes to travel, hike, and spend time with his wife Gabi and dog Georgia.  He also enjoys a good craft IPA.

Niko Cangemi

Niko Cangemi is on his 3rd successful venture with Aeri. He studied Entrepreneurship at the University of Southern California. Niko began developing products and traveling to Asia in 2008, having visited China for business over 120 times. Niko is passionate about developing thoughtful consumer products that strike emotional connections with the target audience. For fun, Niko likes to play outside whether it is an epic beach day, a hike in the wilderness, or perfect snow conditions on the mountain.

The AT26 PACK maybe is the best travel buddy you have ever met. It is a versatile backpack good for travel, outdoor activities and daily use. Believing security is the utmost concern of travelers, we incorporated various anti-theft features into the AT26 PACK. The anti-theft features and functionalities ensure your every single journey SAFE and CAREFREE.

Quick uplift system - easy to take out laptop of any size
The water resistant fabric could keep your belongings dry in a drizzle, while, the rain cover could keep the AT26 PACK dry and clean even in heavy rain!

Besides the mounting straps attaching to the lower part of the backpack, we created the attachable waist strap with FIDLOCK magnetic buckle. If you are looking for better stability, it is the accessory you can't miss!
(The waist strap is an individual perk and not included in the perk of AT26 PACK)
For sure, we will design more accessories to enhance the functionalities of the AT26 PACK and meet the various needs of people in coming future.

column2: >Even though the AT26 Pack is excellent already, we would not stop here. To make it even more all-rounded, we create a travel set consisting of 4 very useful items. They are the 1) RFID block anti-theft waist bag, 2) electronic device cube, 3) compression cube and 4) toiletry bag.

column1: All team members of ADD1D are backpack lovers who believe backpack is not only accessory but also a companion of modern mankind. A little but right functionality could make life a huge betterment. With passion in designing innovative things, we strive to make products fit for various scenario, professions and people.

During the design and prototype stage, we have been studying many anti-theft backpacks in the market and discussing with potential manufacturers for technical issues. Therefore, we are confident that the AT26 Pack could be made with all required features and functionalities in good quality.

The biggest risk to the campaign would be the epidemic of COVID-19. If the situation goes worse, the production and shipment schedule would be affected. If it is the case, we will still strive our best to meet the estimated timeline and closely communicate with backers for updates and possible solutions.

column122:
>We are a diverse team of 6 architects and designers that have partnered with a large production company from Germany in order to create the ideal blend between our expertise in design and their experience of over 30 years in bringing products to life. To get to this stage, we spent two years creating and recreating the product in order to make it feasible and efficient to take from prototypes into all that is needed for a product to move to the large scale production phase. We have the design team, the production partners, and now we need your support to complete the team and create a better keeper of keys.

column1: We're Full Windsor, we design and make sustainable products. To get a set of Magware for yourself and bring them to life, simply click the perk you want to back on the right hand side. Have a scroll down to learn more.

column6:
>

Magware have been designed to address a major problem facing our planet. We throw away billions of single use plastic utensils every year, and many of them end up in our Oceans and Waterways. Plastics never fully break down but rather degrade into small pieces that resemble food scraps to fish and other sea animals. The Ocean Conservancy lists plastic utensils as among the items “most deadly” to sea turtles, sea birds, and other Ocean creatures due to their size and to the ease they enter our waterways.
column9:
>

We think the Bring Your Own (BYO) Cutlery movement could help reduce the number of disposable utensils that get thrown away every year. The same way as carrying drink bottles has started to become ubiquitous to people’s everyday lives, we hope to see non-disposable utensils being used in the same way. Magware utensils are a simple light-weight solution to help in this mission, by making them as organized and easy to carry as possible. We really hope that by promoting this movement, we can have a positive effect in helping against this crisis that is growing exponentially every year.

column3:
>

 It is possible to add on any number of Single Pouches if you are pledging for a Magware Full Set and want the option to carry one single set in its own pouch. You will be able to do this when you fill out your Backerkit survey that we will email to you 10 days after you pledge.

We decided to use Hypalon for the pouches, as it is extremely durable, water proof, easy to clean and stain resistant. Hypalon is so tough it is the material that they make inflatable boats from. We have used high strength velcro for the closing mechanism. The full set pouch also has a thick elastic strap attached to give it an even firmer close. Both pouches should last a lifetime.

column2:
>

 If you would like to order multiples of any Magware set, simply multiply your total pledge amount by the number you would like. Multiple prices are listed below.

column1:
The Full Windsor team is very experienced in terms of designing and manufacturing new products, especially flatware. We have been doing it for the last 8  years, ever since Full Windsor was founded in 2011. Mark Windsor, our founder (tall, skinny dude below on the right), has been working as a product designer, bringing new products to life for the last 14 years. He has worked as a product designer for some of the world's best design firms.

We successfully launched our Muncher Titanium Multi Utensil (see below) in 2017 and Splitter Multi Tongs in 2018 fulfilling all 7146 pledges. The Muncher went on to be awarded Outside Magazine's 'Gear of the Year' 2018 and is now stocked around the world by reputable retailers such as REI amongst many others. Previous to this we successfully launched both our Nutter and Breaker Cycle Multi Tools on Kickstarter. We can't state how much we appreciate all the backers sharing the journey with us and allowing us to do what we do.

We have been working with our manufacturer based in Guangzhou, China who specialize in engineering and manufacture of high end products for the last 7 years and have a great relationship together. We have been working on Magware with them for the past 6 months. On everything from prototype development to drawing up the final product and tooling specifications. They have already begun making tooling and will soon start production. The money raised from kickstarter will allow us to place an order for the initial production run.
column3: >
column4: >

0,"

Daysaver - The Reason Why

 

It has always bothered us that we bikers must choose between having either a useful but heavy and bulky tool or a small and light one - as we want it to be - but inconvenient to use. The common concepts are based on foldable tools. The disadvantage of such concepts is that many screws are not accessible because of the bulky design, and you do not have the right lever when it comes to applying the proper torque. In recent years, the trend has shifted to ""hide"" tools in the bike - in the cranks or the stem. But this concept requires proprietary systems that fit only one bike at a time. So we either had to accept the situation or tackle the problem ourselves.

 

 

The Innovation

 It took some time and elbow grease, but the final solution impresses by simplicity: We nest bits in bits. Simply flippable as needed. This way, we manage to include 9 tools on the classic Allen key shape at an unbelievable 45 grams.


 

We asked you, cyclists, out there which screws you have on your bikes. From your answers, we concluded that with eight tools, you could solve most problems during a ride - on almost any bike. The 9th was then defined by the backer community. We got a lot of feedback and the verdict of the community was that it needs a HEX 2.5.

That's how you get a multi-tool that is 93mm long and 43mm wide (with bits), which you can either put in your jersey pocket without the tool pulling at your jersey. And of course without ruining the fabric - the Daysaver comes with end caps. Or attach it directly to your bike using our bike mount.

The multitool designed in this way offers a whole range of advantages. With a bulky minitool you can't reach many screws on your bike properly. Result: worn screws or scratches on the frame. With the simple and slim form factor of our tool you can get to every screw and tighten or loosen it in the right way. That is a promise!

Screws are sensitive creatures. With the wrong torque they are either broken or tightened too loosely. With the two different lever lengths of our tool you can give each screw the necessary amount of love. Your screws will thank you with endless fun.

Since we are not a tool manufacturer, we searched for a partner who understands our concerns and meets our quality and durability demands. We did not have to look far. Here in Switzerland, practically on our doorstep, we found a manufacturer that is known worldwide and renowned for their quality standards: PB Swiss Tools.

As our manufacturing partner, they will produce your Daysaver, and we give you a lifetime warranty on it. So we can proudly say, without boasting: Daysaver works with the best and delivers a 100% Swiss made product: designed, engineered, and produced in Switzerland.

Hi, we're Daniel, Elam, and Peter. We create innovative ideas for our customers for a living. Over the years, we have seen our customers become successful with our ideas. Now, the time has come to make our creativity work for us. As passionate bikers, it was obvious to us where to start - where our fire burns. We invite you to join the party.
Tinkering for the best multi-tool to take on your ride

In winter 2020, goofing around in the snow, Dani brought up the idea of solving the multi-tool problem cyclists face once and for all. So we started thinking about it. Especially Dani, the tinkerer among us, occasionally called MacGyver, couldn't get the challenge out of his head. Every minute his wife and kids were busy or sleeping, he tossed around the perfect bike multi-tool problem.

Building the actual product

As a result of such sessions, we got a clearer idea of what a mini-tool could look like. But even a great idea is not yet a product. So, we used a method that we had already successfully applied in countless customer projects and took a week off for a design sprint.

That was hard work! Who's our target group, and what are the use cases? What does the customer journey look like? How can we validate our idea with the community to determine if our idea is as good as we believe?

At the end of the design sprint, we had gained clarity about how we needed to realize our idea of the perfect mini-tool. We had the fundamentals:
• No compromise in quality, size, form factor, and weight!
• A rigorous focus on the problems that can occur on the road!

3D Print Prototyping

So far, so good. Now we wanted our vision to materialize. So we hopped over to our trusted 3D printer. And we were more than thrilled with the first shot!

 

Ambushing our desired partner

With this first plastic prototype, we approached PB Swiss Tools, not knowing how they would react. Would they partner with us? Their reaction was overwhelming. They liked our idea so much that they started refining the tool with us. In the following months, we started working on the prototype development of Daysaver with the engineers of PB Swiss Tools. 

And then came the day we held the first metal prototype in our hands, only a few months after the first sketches. That feeling was indescribable.

 

First torque tests

Does the tool withstand the stress of maximum torque? With PB Swiss Tools we have an experienced partner who carried out the strength tests. The result? The key withstands 97Nm maximum torque. And the bits also withstand more force than the maximum defined torque.

Long-lasting design

With the Daysaver's lifetime warranty, you won't have to buy another bike tool for on the road. This is very important to us, because we are strictly against the make-buy-dispose-mentality.

 

 

An idea became reality

 

We scraped together our savings to pay for the first steps in developing the tool out of our pocket. We were so convinced of our tool that we agreed to accept the financial risk. The many positive feedbacks and inputs from the community encouraged us to carry on. Together with PB Swiss Tools, we have achieved our first goal and have completed the prototype phase. We have drawn up and processed an extensive specification sheet: Torque levels for each bit, handling, form factor, coating, rust resistance, weight, ecology, and security. Now, with your support, we are ready for the next phase.

The second important step in tool development is to bring the tool from the prototype to series production. That means defining and testing the manufacturing process, adjusting the settings on machines and material, producing 0-series, etc. And then to take the final step: the actual production of the tool. We took this hurdle as well and reached our financing target on Kickstarter after 3 days. At the end of the campaign after 30 days we reached 300% of our financing target. An idea became a real product, which is now available for all bikers.

A versatile, spacious and customizable watercraft that doesn't require you to break the bank and assembles in less than 10 minutes!

 

 

I’m Vic and I have a vision to create a boat that is capable, versatile, transportable and AFFORDABLE.  Boating is a passion of mine and it’s only ever been accessible to people with lots of money in the bank. This helped me realize my dream, which I called Hulltimate, because it’s the ULTIMATE water adventure with endless customization options! Use it to Paddle like a SUP, expand it to have a floating party barge or even have an afternoon of fishing with friends. No watercraft on the market is a match for the Hulltimate versatility!

 

I want to revolutionize the boating industry by making it accessible so that anyone can own a boat! Families and friends who wouldn't normally be able to afford a boat can experience the same joy that I have had on the water. BOAT is a four letter word. It stands for Bust Out Another Thousand. Not with Hulltimate!
column2:
> 

 

Hulltimate comes as a complete boat with the add-on's of your choice, ready to assemble in ten minutes with no tools required. And even better you won't pay any extra for shipping...shipping is included!! 

That's why I’m turning to the IndieGOGO community for help. With your support we’ll make boating accessible to everyone. Fun on the water for all ages! Thank you for your help in bringing Hulltimate to life!

 

 

NO MORE HOPING ONE DAY YOU’LL BE ABLE TO AFFORD A BOAT

 

NO DOCKING FEES

 

QUICK &
column3:
EASY ASSEMBLY

 

ENJOY SOME SOLITUDE

 

A PARTY ON THE WATER

 

FISH WITH FRIENDS

 

OR STAND UP PADDLEBOARD

 

SUPER PORTABLE

 

SAFER THAN OTHER SMALL BOATS

 

MADE IN NORTH AMERICA

 

More Versatility &
column5:
Easy Set Up!

We will send printed and video instructions with your Hulltimate to be sure you can easily set yours up with any add-on's you receive! 

 

Specifications

Basic catamaran- 12’X4’10”X21” / Weight: 140 pounds / 2 panels

Basic Catamaran with Extension Kit- 16’X4’10”X21” / Weight: 190 pounds / 3 panels

Party barge- 12’X8’10”X21” / Weight: 240 pounds / 4 panels

Super party barge- 16’ X 8’10”X 21” / Weight: 330 pounds / 6 panels

Mega party barge- 16’X 12’10”X 21” / Weight: 470 pounds / 9 panels

 

 

MADE OF RECYCLED MATERIALS


LOOK AT THE PARTY BARGE CARRYING A 1400 POUND VEHICLE

 

WILL NOT POP OR DEFLATE LIKE AN INFLATABLE

 

ULTRA DURABLE &
column6:
PUNCTURE RESISTANT

 

TRANSPORT EASILY WITH THE TRAILER KIT ADD-ON

 

DESIGNED TO CUT THROUGH WAVES 

 

CERTIFICATION PLATE IS INCLUDED SO IT'S LEGAL FOR YOU TO USE AN ENGINE THROUGHOUT CANADA &
column7:
USA

 

For the first 48 hours we're offering 50% off as a Super Early Bird discount on all of our perks and add-ons!  The prices shown on the perks above on the right reflect that discount! Shipping is INCLUDED in all perk and add-on pricing and shipping will begin in December 2021!
column11: >Watch the video above to see all of our Perks &amp
column12:
Add-ons!

 

Planing Kit - $499 / $632 CAD - includes shipping!
($998 retail)
Add a third hull to the basic catamaran to help the boat get up on step. Can also be used to increase cargo capacity and use as a barge to carry 1000 pounds. 


Trailer Kit- $299 USD / $378 CAD- includes shipping!
($598 USD retail)
These sturdy wheels convert your boat into a trailer! Convenient for taking your boat from parking lot to shore or tow it on trails with a utility vehicle. 




Motor Mount Kit- $299 USD / $378 CAD- includes shipping!
($598 USD retail)
Put a trolling motor or small outboard on any of the boats. Made out of aluminum and installs in minutes. 




Fishing Kit- $399 USD / $504 CAD- includes shipping!
($798 USD retail)
 Convert the basic catamaran into a mini bass boat with the fishing kit. Two comfortable seats, rod holders and a cooler are included and will really help land fish!



 

Sailing Kit- $599 USD / $757 CAD - includes shipping!
($1098 USD retail)
 Add a sail in minutes and convert your boat into an effective sail boat!


 

Basic catamaran extension- $699 USD / $883 CAD- includes shipping!
($1398 USD retail) Add four feet of length to increase deck space by 50% and increased boat efficiency.




Seat Kit for Party Barge- $599 USD / $757 CAD- includes shipping!
($1198 USD retail)
Add these comfortable seats to accommodate up to nine people.



Rail Kit for Party Barge- $249 USD / $314 CAD- includes shipping!
($498 USD retail)
Add these aluminum stanchions and rope to give a beautiful railing to your party barge!



 

Seat kit for the mega party barge- $999 USD / $1263 CAD- includes shipping!
($1998 USD retail)
Add these comfortable seats to accommodate up to 15 people. Image below shows seating for 18
but we have decided on 15 for a safer boat experience.

 

Shipping is included with all perks and add-on's and we will be shipping to Canada and the United States. Shipping will begin in December 2021 from North America, so no need to worry about major international shipping delays!
column15:
>

There was a time when taking your family out on a boat was very expensive and many people made this financial sacrifice because the rewards were so worthwhile and amazing.

I have lived on both sides of that fence. As a child of immigrants living in the Midwest my boating experience when I was younger was basically nothing. Then I became a pilot who moved to the West Coast with some time and money and unlimited boating opportunities.
column16:
>

I started boatbuilding by building a rowboat to train in the off-season as I was competing in indoor rowing competitions. I know it sounds backwards but you will soon see clearly that I am a contrarian. My second boat was a 22’ powerboat that I have had countless incredible adventures on with my family and friends. I am very passionate about boating and I want everyone to have the same joy of boating that I have had.
column17:
>

 

Unfortunately, boating with family and friends is out of reach for many people for a number of reasons. It is expensive, boats are difficult to transport and you need a large space to store them to name a few obstacles. That is why I created Hulltimate. I realized the solution in a vision when I saw a catamaran on the river. I could ship two inexpensive hulls to a person and he could join them together in five minutes with a piece of plywood and have a sturdy and capable boat that would easily hold four people or more. The customization possibilities are endless with this boat and I'm so excited to see it come to life and see families enjoy it for years to come!

 

Marketed &
column18:
Promoted by:

Convenient for taking your boat from parking lot to shore or tow it on trails with a utility vehicle. Motor Mount Kit- $299 USD / $378 CAD- includes shipping!($598 USD retail)Put a trolling motor or small outboard on any of the boats. Made out of aluminum and installs in minutes. Fishing Kit- $399 USD / $504 CAD- includes shipping!($798 USD retail) Convert the basic catamaran into a mini bass boat with the fishing kit. Two comfortable seats, rod holders and a cooler are included and will really help land fish! Sailing Kit- $599 USD / $757 CAD - includes shipping!($1098 USD retail) Add a sail in minutes and convert your boat into an effective sail boat! Basic catamaran extension- $699 USD / $883 CAD- includes shipping!($1398 USD retail) Add four feet of length to increase deck space by 50% and increased boat efficiency.Seat Kit for Party Barge- $599 USD / $757 CAD- includes shipping!($1198 USD retail)Add these comfortable seats to accommodate up to nine people.Rail Kit for Party Barge- $249 USD / $314 CAD- includes shipping!($498 USD retail)Add these aluminum stanchions and rope to give a beautiful railing to your party barge! Seat kit for the mega party barge- $999 USD / $1263 CAD- includes shipping!($1998 USD retail)Add these comfortable seats to accommodate up to 15 people. Image below shows seating for 18but we have decided on 15 for a safer boat experience. Shipping is included with all perks and add-on's and we will be shipping to Canada and the United States. Shipping will begin in December 2021 from North America, so no need to worry about major international shipping delays!   There was a time when taking your family out on a boat was very expensive and many people made this financial sacrifice because the rewards were so worthwhile and amazing.I have lived on both sides of that fence. As a child of immigrants living in the Midwest my boating experience when I was younger was basically nothing. Then I became a pilot who moved to the West Coast with some time and money and unlimited boating opportunities.I started boatbuilding by building a rowboat to train in the off-season as I was competing in indoor rowing competitions. I know it sounds backwards but you will soon see clearly that I am a contrarian. My second boat was a 22’ powerboat that I have had countless incredible adventures on with my family and friends. I am very passionate about boating and I want everyone to have the same joy of boating that I have had.  Unfortunately, boating with family and friends is out of reach for many people for a number of reasons. It is expensive, boats are difficult to transport and you need a large space to store them to name a few obstacles. That is why I created Hulltimate. I realized the solution in a vision when I saw a catamaran on the river. I could ship two inexpensive hulls to a person and he could join them together in five minutes with a piece of plywood and have a sturdy and capable boat that would easily hold four people or more. The customization possibilities are endless with this boat and I'm so excited to see it come to life and see families enjoy it for years to come! Marketed & Promoted by:",44.0,1,"1 Campaign

column1: Now, you can use it as a backpack with its convertible design!

We are back with our fourth Indiegogo - Kickstarter campaign after delivering thousands of bags successfully on time! We surveyed our backers and asked about the new functions that they'd like to see on our bags. After eight months of hard work and dozens of prototypes, we are very excited to share our new campaign with you. 

Introducing the backpack style !!

Now, you will be able to carry your Moose laptop bag as a backpack without having any extra straps! We added a rectangular ring on the side so with the current shoulder strap, you will be able to convert the shoulder bag into a backpack whenever you want to. This was one of the most requested feature and it really works well now as a backpack too.

We are here to raise enough funds to bring Moose Designs bag to life. We need your support to establish production of the world's most functional laptop bag in sufficient quantities to reduce the retail price to make the product more affordable for our backers. In supporting this campaign, you will be playing your part in bringing a unique and practical bag to life. To ensure quality and manufacturing time, we partnered with the sector's one of the most experienced manufacturers and suppliers. We are very confident with ourselves and our well experienced manufacturing partners that we will fulfill the rewards on time with the best quality, just like what we've done before with our earlier campaigns!

We can't wait to get this Moose Designs Bag in your hands.

Thank you for your support!

Nomad’s Pad is bringing the first glass pyramid glamping experience to the Grand Canyon. Each 400 square-foot glass pyramid gives you a new way to experience nature with 360° desert views and absolute privacy with Smart Glass Technology.

Just a short flight or a few hours drive from Las Vegas, Phoenix, or Flagstaff, Nomad’s Pad makes the perfect getaway for both long weekends and week-long expeditions to America’s greatest natural wonder.

 

Nomad’s Pad is surrounded by 20 acres of undeveloped land in the rural town of Grand Canyon Junction—just a 25-minute drive from the Grand Canyon itself.

 

From waking up with the sun to stargazing from bed, this one-of-a-kind experience has all the modern comforts of a hotel while giving you unhindered access to the magical Arizona desert.

Each of the 10 temperature-controlled pyramids comes with a self-sufficient attachment of outdoor amenities to let you indulge in the outdoors hassle-free.

During your stay, you become part of the Wild West. Hear birds chirping in the morning, coyotes howling at night, and the whistle of the wind blowing. Smell the fresh aroma of Pinyon Trees and Juniper Berries—like a refreshing glass of gin without the bite, just pure nature.

 

At Nomad’s Pad, you can sleep with the night sky as your ceiling or take an afternoon nap with a backdrop of desert views without sacrificing privacy or comfort.

When you step out into a beautiful desert landscape, you don’t want to walk into a hotel and shut yourself away. You want to stay in it, and be there—in the moment. Nomad’s Pad is built to be just that — a place where you can unwind, escape in nature, and stay there as part of it.

We took a boutique approach to our accommodations, meaning fewer units that are more spaced out, so you get unobstructed views of the surrounding natural beauty.

The pyramids are also designed with Smart Glass technology that turns the clear glass walls opaque at the touch of a button.

Smart Glass gives you instant control over your privacy and experience. Keep the glass clear for those daytime Instagram photos and midnight stargazing, then switch on the privacy frost when it’s time to finally unwind.

 

Mother Nature can be pretty unforgiving in a desert environment, which is why each pyramid has UV-resistant glass and air conditioning to shelter you from those hot summer days or brisk autumn nights.

Enjoy the outdoors as much as you can while you’re here, and know that you have a cozy shelter to come back to once you’re done.

 

Hi, we’re Victor and Jenny Pegeanu, and Nomad’s Pad isn’t our first rodeo with creating desert accommodations.

After months of planning and preparing, we have everything in place to make Nomad’s Pad a reality. We’ve already done soil testing, traffic studies, fire hazard mitigation, gray water system blueprints, and more! We hired the most qualified team of engineers and builders that specialize in creating eco-friendly properties and they are ready to get started.

Our permit is approved, so we have the green light to start building this 
thing—all we need now is your support! 

 

Traditional outdoor experiences, like camping, can leave you worrying about the little things, which is why at Nomad’s Pad, we make your relaxation our first priority.

We’ve partnered with local businesses as passionate as we are who can share the full spirit of Arizona with you. We’ve got you covered from food to fitness.

 

At Nomad’s Pad, weekends mean live music and campfires under the stars. Local musicians perform acoustic, indie, psychedelic rock and more by the campfire so you can enjoy the outdoors with some added ambiance.

(see Add-On section at bottom of page for more details)

 

Meals at Nomad’s Pad will keep you feeling full, fresh, and re-freshed.

 

Not only is it our mission to bring people closer to nature—we want to preserve it, too! When you stay with us, you put your personal health and wellness hand-in-hand with the wellness of the environment around you.

A stay at Nomad’s Pad Grand Canyon is a 100% off-grid experience with everything powered by solar energy. The Pyramids are constructed with the passive house principles for maximum efficiency and lower carbon footprints.

Take Highway 64 up to the South Rim of the Grand Canyon to experience the beauty of one of America’s most revered Natural Wonders.

Most Grand Canyon visitors don’t make it past the developed enclave of Grand Canyon Village, but the close proximity of Nomad’s Pad starts you right at the canyon’s doorstep, helping you dig into all the park has to offer.

Feeling the call of the wild is a sensation as old as humanity, but for those who have ever been intimidated by camping gear, specialized clothing, and technical know-how, getting out and experiencing it might have always felt out of reach.

Making the rejuvenating beauty of nature accessible for everyone is what drives us, because we understand that the grind of a 9-5 can damage our spiritual connection to the Earth and to ourselves.

It’s why we left our day jobs and started Nomad’s Pad in the first place—we weren’t satisfied letting our skills and knowledge grow without nurturing our dreams and desires.

 

Lock down your spot by backing our live Indiegogo crowdfunding campaign. Your contribution will serve as the payment for your stay at Nomad’s Pad Grand Canyon.

*We're happy to accomodate specific requests not featured here on our campaign page, like larger groups, or longer stays. Please reach out directly to info@nomadspad.com*

At the end of the Indiegogo campaign, we’ll email you a confirmation email with your unique voucher code to use on our booking portal.

*Current layout of Nomads Pad booking portal. Final display of booking portal may change*

 

Packages for a stay at Nomad’s Pad Grand Canyon will include:

 

These activities are available for purchase at retail price on arrival for your stay, but you can SAVE BIG by purchasing them ahead of time as an add-on today!

 

*Pyramids can have extra beds added upon request when booking after the campaign to accomodate up to five guests*

 

 

Victor graduated college with a degree in Business Administration, but has always been drawn to artistic and creative expression. Originally from Romania, his love for adventure led him to come to the United States to start a new life and build a business that hosted others just like him. After meeting his wife in 2016, he discovered the missing piece to make Nomad’s Pad a reality.

 

Jenny was born in the Philippines and grew up in San Diego. She attended UCSD for Visual Arts-Media and immediately began working as an insurance agent, naturally. Not wanting to be a starving artist, she spent years working in the insurance industry, applying her creativity in the art of risk management. Insurance is a people business, and this is ultimately how she discovered her passion for creating meaningful experiences that can connect people. In 2017, she decided to double down on that passion. She cashed out her 401K, left the insurance world, and began to build beautiful retreats where people can reconnect with nature. She followed her entrepreneurial instinct with her husband and, together, created Nomad’s Pad.

Q: Does the Claw 2.0 only come in three colours?
A: Depending on demand and requests, we are very likely to add more colours and/or materials.
Q: How much does shipping cost and where do you ship?
A: We offer Free Shipping across the world, regardless of where you are.
Q: How do I give you my address and colours?
A: You can provide all this info to us 11 days after the date you pledge using a survey called BackerKit. They’ll email you at the time to your Indiegogo email to collect these details.
Q: What if I have a problem with my Claw 2.0?
A: All Claw 2.0's backed on Indiegogo come with a Lifetime Warranty. Speak to one of our team and they will be able to assist you in replacing your Claw 2.0.
Please note: Only Claw 2.0's that are received through Indiegogo are able to take advantage of the Lifetime Warranty.
Q: How can we contact you if we have any questions?
A: You may contact us through any of the below and we'll aim to get back to you within the hour (We're in GMT):

Indiegogo messages
Indiegogo comments - (if you’re a backer)
By email at: support (at) MalboroKane (dot) com

We were delighted to smash our target within the first 48 hours. We will use the $3,500/£2,500 to secure the production slot to manufacturer the minimum volume production run of our trademarked design Chilli WearTM Cooling Cap.
… but we’re not done yet. We have big plans and love your input so far.

Now that we have hit our 100% funded target we are adding a stretch goal of $25,000/£20,000 to scale up our production volumes and test some new product innovations around sizing and finishing - all suggested by our early bird Indiegogo backers.
We’ve also introduced a referral programme to recognise and reward those backers who are showing their love on Social Media and sharing Chilli WearTM with their friends and family,
Regular baseball caps impede heat loss by 60% - which makes your head hotter when working or exercising outside.

In hot weather, this can affect your productivity, physical performance as well as impair mental function, alertness and motor control. You can become more irritable, angry and emotional which may increase the likelihood of an accident.
Introducing the Chilli Wear™ Cooling Cap – designed to keep your head cool, even when you’re working or exercising outdoors.

Our trademarked design process delivers a stylish, comfortable, light-weight, adjustable baseball cap which also includes our secret weapon against the heat. A removable medical-grade gel-pack housed in a fully insulated pocket to block heat bleed and maintain the temperature to keep you cooler for longer.
Wear it anywhere, anytime for any activity

The Chilli Wear™ Cooling Cap has been carefully designed and crafted with 100% cotton outer, fully adjustable velcro strap for comfort-fit, light-weight double insulation of Thinsulate™ and Solarize™ to deliver maximum comfort and style that can be worn anywhere, anytime for any activity from gardening to golf, hiking to HIIT.
What our product testers have to say
Two years in development and testing, to marry the concept of heat/cool insulation with comfort, lightweight and style - we are finally ready to share Chilli Wear™ with the rest of the world.

Of all organs, the brain is probably the most vulnerable to heat. Plus, if you like wearing a baseball cap when you're out in the hot weather this can actually delay your body's ability to regulate temperature and ultimately cool down.

Applying cold water or ice to strategic points on the body where the veins are close to the surface — such as the forehead, temples, wrists, neck and chest — can quickly lower the temperature of the blood running through these veins. This allows the body to feel cooler.

This is how our Chilli Wear Cooling Cap works. Our trademarked design features a fully insulated pocket at the front of the cap to house our medical-grade, gel-pack which can be frozen (or chilled) in advance. The insultated pocket keeps the gel-pack cool while holding it in place, close to your veins, to help your body feel cooler.
• Place your gel-packs in the freezer and let them chill (if you're out and about you can cool them by placing in a glass or bowl of ice water)
• When the gels are cold and you are ready to feel the benefit, pop the gel-pack in the Cooling Cap (within the fully insulated pocket) and put it on
• It provides an instant and refreshing change in temperature for your head, helping you to keep cooler for longer
Here’s what makes our technical product design so unique:

Chilli Wear™ was founded in 2019 by David Currie and Gary Melbourne. David, a health and sport professional, spends most of his time keeping active, outdoors. Gary, a contractor spends a lot of the year working outdoors. They bonded over their mutual love and equal frustration with baseball caps. The hat of choice made them even hotter when they were working and exercising. Surely there was an opportunity there?

Their vision was to create a product that would provide all of the lightweight, shade and comfort of a regular baseball cap while also providing the additional benefit of heating or cooling as the environment and activity required.
Two years in development and testing, to marry the concept of heat/cool insulation with comfort, lightweight and style - they are finally ready to share Chilli Wear™ with the rest of the world.

On their journey, they have received some valuable insight and support from a very small team. Each brings something unique, from Annie Melbourne, aged 8 who created the brand name, to Maria Sze, a brand and communications strategist working with start-ups. They have been working together to bring this product to you and can’t wait for you to experience it.

We have spent our life savings, numerous evenings and weekends developing a prototype product that we're happy to share with the world. We have just over 1,000 production samples (split equally across the 4 colour options), landed in the UK, ready to share with our early backers to enjoy this summer.

However, we need to raise funds in order to commission a full manufacturing run of our trademarked design, Chilli Wear™ Cooling Cap. If successful, the full run will go into production in August and ship to backers in December. Plus if we smash our target, we can increase our volumes ... that way, we can make more product available for more people to buy keeping them cooler for longer too!

We have crafted our perk structure to reward as many backers as possible with our existing, production samples of our Chilli Wear™ Cooling Caps. The first 1,000 units are here and ready to ship to backers in August.
Don't let the UK/£ put you off. Our perks are available to all markets from United States to Uzbekistan. All live perks are ready to convert to your local currency and ship NOW.
Perks still available to ship WORLDWIDE NOW!
We are going for our stretch targets to scale up our production run and test some new product innovations around sizing and finishing - all suggested by our early bird Indiegogo backers.
We still have some production samples ready to ship to our backers in the UK, US and beyond.
We just need passionate, early adopters to secure them within our perks.

Plus, if we smash our target, we can increase our volumes ... that way, other people can buy us and stay cooler for longer. The production slot is booked and we are SO EXCITED to see and hear more of your feedback.

We know that not everyone will be able to contribute but we still need your help. Perhaps you know someone who might appreciate a cooler head while working or exercising outdoors? An enthusiastic summer jogger or a hard-working gardener?
This is where the fun begins - we need you to post and share on your social media channels. Spread the love and help us get the backing.

And last, but by no means least - please keep in touch. Follow us on Instagram, Facebook and LinkedIn. Thank you for reading about us and please back us or click on the link to the campaign and share with a friend. You have our future literally in your hands.
Thank you - your interest genuinely means the world to us,
Thank you, thank you, thank you!

What our product testers have to say
Two years in development and testing, to marry the concept of heat/cool insulation with comfort, lightweight and style - we are finally ready to share Chilli Wear™ with the rest of the world.

Of all organs, the brain is probably the most vulnerable to heat. Plus, if you like wearing a baseball cap when you're out in the hot weather this can actually delay your body's ability to regulate temperature and ultimately cool down.

Applying cold water or ice to strategic points on the body where the veins are close to the surface — such as the forehead, temples, wrists, neck and chest — can quickly lower the temperature of the blood running through these veins. This allows the body to feel cooler.

This is how our Chilli Wear Cooling Cap works. Our trademarked design features a fully insulated pocket at the front of the cap to house our medical-grade, gel-pack which can be frozen (or chilled) in advance. The insultated pocket keeps the gel-pack cool while holding it in place, close to your veins, to help your body feel cooler.
Feel the difference in 3 simple steps:
Place your gel-packs in the freezer and let them chill (if you're out and about you can cool them by placing in a glass or bowl of ice water)
When the gels are cold and you are ready to feel the benefit, pop the gel-pack in the Cooling Cap (within the fully insulated pocket) and put it on
It provides an instant and refreshing change in temperature for your head, helping you to keep cooler for longer
Here’s what makes our technical product design so unique:

Chilli Wear™ was founded in 2019 by David Currie and Gary Melbourne. David, a health and sport professional, spends most of his time keeping active, outdoors. Gary, a contractor spends a lot of the year working outdoors. They bonded over their mutual love and equal frustration with baseball caps. The hat of choice made them even hotter when they were working and exercising. Surely there was an opportunity there?

Their vision was to create a product that would provide all of the lightweight, shade and comfort of a regular baseball cap while also providing the additional benefit of heating or cooling as the environment and activity required.
Two years in development and testing, to marry the concept of heat/cool insulation with comfort, lightweight and style - they are finally ready to share Chilli Wear™ with the rest of the world.

On their journey, they have received some valuable insight and support from a very small team. Each brings something unique, from Annie Melbourne, aged 8 who created the brand name, to Maria Sze, a brand and communications strategist working with start-ups. They have been working together to bring this product to you and can’t wait for you to experience it.

We have spent our life savings, numerous evenings and weekends developing a prototype product that we're happy to share with the world. We have just over 1,000 production samples (split equally across the 4 colour options), landed in the UK, ready to share with our early backers to enjoy this summer.

However, we need to raise funds in order to commission a full manufacturing run of our trademarked design, Chilli Wear™ Cooling Cap. If successful, the full run will go into production in August and ship to backers in December. Plus if we smash our target, we can increase our volumes ... that way, we can make more product available for more people to buy keeping them cooler for longer too!

We have crafted our perk structure to reward as many backers as possible with our existing, production samples of our Chilli Wear™ Cooling Caps. The first 1,000 units are here and ready to ship to backers in August.
Don't let the UK/£ put you off. Our perks are available to all markets from United States to Uzbekistan. All live perks are ready to convert to your local currency and ship NOW.
Perks still available to ship WORLDWIDE NOW!
We are going for our stretch targets to scale up our production run and test some new product innovations around sizing and finishing - all suggested by our early bird Indiegogo backers.
We still have some production samples ready to ship to our backers in the UK, US and beyond.
We just need passionate, early adopters to secure them within our perks.

Plus, if we smash our target, we can increase our volumes ... that way, other people can buy us and stay cooler for longer. The production slot is booked and we are SO EXCITED to see and hear more of your feedback.
Please, please, please - SHARE this project

We know that not everyone will be able to contribute but we still need your help. Perhaps you know someone who might appreciate a cooler head while working or exercising outdoors? An enthusiastic summer jogger or a hard-working gardener?
This is where the fun begins - we need you to post and share on your social media channels. Spread the love and help us get the backing.

And last, but by no means least - please keep in touch. Follow us on Instagram, Facebook and LinkedIn. Thank you for reading about us and please back us or click on the link to the campaign and share with a friend. You have our future literally in your hands.
Thank you - your interest genuinely means the world to us,",24.0,1,"1 Campaign

column1: We've partnered with Gibson Product Design to bring this idea to life, an award-winning team that has 15 Innovation Awards at CES Las Vegas, a Red Dot, and an IF Design Award. Safe to say these guys are seriously talented and have designed hardware for some of the largest Canadian companies, some of which being Shopify, and the Bank of Canada.
column3:
showinfo=0"">

Meet Dom Mazzuca, a 22-year-old entrepreneur that's more passionate about keeping his drinks cold than most, and he's got a story to tell.

It all started in the year 2020… ah yes we all know what sparked this idea. During the COVID-19 pandemic, Dom wanted to purchase a high-performance hard cooler but wanted to support local cooler companies rather than “Big Cooler”.  After searching for what he wanted and came up short, he decided to start his own cooler company, but ever since then, it's been nothing but an emotional roller coaster.

Within the hour on the day that all his hard coolers arrived in the warehouse, he was sent a life-changing email. The manufacturer told him that the recent order will be the last they will ever send to Dom. Frustrated, scared, and as he called it ""a sick joke"" Dom wrote back demanding answers to why this was happening to him, and that’s when the manufacturer told him “Big Cooler” had paid them millions of dollars to make sure he couldn’t purchase the coolers from them.

Devastated that his business was quite literally dead on arrival due to the big guys bullying him out of his dream, he scrambled to pick up the pieces and find a way to let the business live on since the feedback was so great from the early adopters.

Dom spent months trying to decide what the next steps were, he kept trying to find ways he could innovate the hard-cooler industry and made damn sure to put in safety nets to make sure he never got screwed over by the big guys ever again. After coming up with generic ways to innovate the hard coolers by adding “x” features and with a “y” value, he took the business plan to someone close to him who has plenty of business experience, and that’s when he received the best advice he had ever gotten.

Dom’s mentor told him “You aren’t going to like what I’m going to tell you but I don’t want to see you live in a van. This idea is too risky for you to take on”. Dom was offended as he was desperately grasping at straws trying to make a risky business plan look like something it simply wasn’t
column4:
a viable business. It was at this point Dom was at his lowest, as he sat down in utter despair, his mentor asked him how his limited run of soft cooler sales was going to which Dom started elaborating “soft coolers are great, they're lightweight and hold ice for long periods of time, but my biggest complaint is that the zippers are stupid hard to use, and require regular lubrication.” and then BANG!

Dom immediately rose from his seat and asked himself out loud “what if there was a soft cooler that was easy to open and didn’t require regular lubrication?!”. An instant lightbulb went off in his head after discovering the next big thing was right under his nose the whole time and he raced home to start doing more research into the problem. 

One year later Dom came back and came back swinging. Armed to the teeth with the world's greatest soft cooler, and hell-bent on giving the big guys a taste of their own medicine.
column5:
> ""Behind every successful entrepreneur is a small army of people that helped them get to where they are today""

This project is no exception to that statement and I'd like to dedicate this section to my amazing friends and family that helped bring this idea to a reality. Without each and every one of you supporting me and my dreams this crazy idea is nothing. So thank you once again for your continued love and support, I owe a great debt to each one of you.

Eric Carpenter, The Berry Family, Tyler Tisdale, Joel Dickie, Natalie Lyons, Nolan Mcdonell, Melynda Visouvath, Mitchell Cronk, Maddie Bell, Jordan DiCicco, Drew Derikx, Neal Lilliot, David Bruno, The Higgins Family, Braeden Pauwels, The D'Oria Family, and Derrik Campbell.
column6:
>Risks and challenges

Our first prototypes are almost completely waterproof, but the only way to validate that the next round of prototypes will be completely waterproof is by getting funded and making the prototypes. We can't be 100% certain that our next round of prototypes will get us to our target of an IP67 waterproof rating, but with that being said we're extremely confident that the new designs will achieve our goal.

Our first round of prototypes have also shown condensation issues around the plastic outer rims, which we suspect is due to the one-off parts we had made for the prototypes, and we will be using the same process as premium hard coolers called ""rotomolding"" to make the next round of prototypes as well as production units. We'll be injecting foam inside the lid/ bottom rim to ensure our coolers are condensation-free. This is not new science as had been used on hard coolers to prevent sweating for decades, so we don't see any risk there whatsoever, but we want to be as transparent as possible, plus rotomolding keeps weight down and retains ice for longer.

Speaking of risks, as with all crowdfunding projects there are many involved. Everything from engineering, manufacturing, and distribution, there will likely be some kind of delay or issues along the way but we've planned far ahead into the future, and are ready for anything that gets thrown our way. Most of the engineering issues we've faced in the first round of prototypes will be completely solved without issue, but the biggest is the waterproof seal. If our second round of prototypes isn't completely waterproof, we'll need to make another round of prototypes before we give the green light for production.

Our number one priority is creating a quality product, and we won't go to production with anything less than a perfect retail-ready prototype. We're working with a dynamite manufacturing and distribution team based out of Georgia, USA and they've worked on countless successful Kickstarter projects, and even have worked for the biggest cooler companies on planet earth. We're in great hands to see a smooth production, and fully expect to live up to all of our promises.

Ensuring more than enough storage for your day trip essentials. Optional Dry Goods TraySay sayonara to soggy buns because each and every one of our coolers is compatible with our dry goods trays, perfect for keeping your contents cold, without running the risk of drowning your precious cargo. Ballistic NylonMade from the same ballistic nylon that was used to make flak jackets in WWII. Providing durability and strength proven through the test of time.

DiFOLD Origami Bottle is the most compact, stable and elegant collapsible bottle AND it is also kickstarting a bigger REUSE REFOLD REVOLUTION! It is the flagship product that comes out of our collapsible design technology and opens up a whole new foldable reusable world!

column2: >

column3: >Patent-pending collapsible design technology for folding various tubular-shaped containers.

column2: >

column1:
1. Arnitel ECO by DSM  is currently half bio-based produced by using rapeseed oil. In the future, it can be completely made of renewable content.

2. Polypropylene and Polyethylene can potentially be produced by using renewables.

3. Closed-loop recyclability means that the material can be recycled to the same quality product or upcycled to a different product with higher demands.

4. TPE-E is a highly recyclable type of polymer. Arnitel ECO was granted a Cradle To Cradle certification in 2013.

5. We have used the LCA database of Delft University of Technology. It can be easily accessed via the IDEMAT app.

6. The carbon footprint of raw polymers can be significantly reduced in the near future by increasing the plant-derived content.

7. The carbon footprint of raw bottle glass is low - about 1.10 CO2 Equiv. / kg but usually glass bottles weigh 5-6 times more than plastic ones. Hence, the total footprint of glass is several times higher.

2. Select your reward level. Each backer may make only one pledge.

3. Follow on-screen instructions and enter your payment information. You won't be charged until the very end of this campaign.

4. You can mix and match colors for multiple bottle packs! We'll send a survey about that after the campaign.  

5. We'll use a pledge manager software to send surveys to collect your shipping address and color preference after the campaign. Shipping gets charged also after the campaign, just the right amount.

DiFOLD Origami Bottle is the flagship product that comes from our collapsible design technology and together with you, as a powerful community, we aim to create a new perspective for REUSE. We call it a REFOLD Revolution! Its goal is to redefine the packaging industry by bringing REUSE &
column2: FOLDABILITY in a new generation of foldable and more practical reusable products.
column3:
>

Imagine the milkman model from the past but in a modern context. Packaging never becomes waste and is simply reused, refilled and refold. We believe we can add value to modern-day milkman models and zero waste shopping by developing collapsible packaging that is convenient for carrying and refilling in-store or we can develop larger collapsible containers that are more sustainable and efficient for the transport of bulk goods.

DiFOLD Origami Bottle is the flagship product that comes from our collapsible design technology and together with you, as a powerful community, we aim to create a new perspective for REUSE. We call it a REFOLD Revolution! Its goal is to redefine the packaging industry by bringing REUSE & FOLDABILITY in a new generation of foldable and more practical reusable products. Imagine the milkman model from the past but in a modern context. Packaging never becomes waste and is simply reused, refilled and refold. We believe we can add value to modern-day milkman models and zero waste shopping by developing collapsible packaging that is convenient for carrying and refilling in-store or we can develop larger collapsible containers that are more sustainable and efficient for the transport of bulk goods.  The perfect business-tech duo, Radina & Petar started working together in March 2018 and since then they've walked a long journey in creating the DiFOLD Origami Bottle while also exploring the bigger potential and impact of the design technology in the packaging world. PETAR ZAHARINOV - inventor & product designer. An architect by education but truly and inventor and innovator by heart. He has been a product designer for the last 10 years and some of his creations include the creative puzzle furniture Praktrik and the innovative modular wall system WallStack.  Petar is a Platinum A’Design Award Winner and his projects have been featured in WIRED, Designboom,  Fast Company, The Verge аnd other leading business and tech media outlets. RADINA POPOVA - business developer & marketeer.  Outspoken go-getter and never giving up, not surprisingly her passion is rock climbing. Her driving principles are: ""Always add value and be of value to people. Make an impact while taking care of the world"". She has a solid experience in business and brand development, working for the ad agency Saatchi & Saatchi and for startups in Berlin and Barcelona. Also, one of the founders at WallStack.  Pitching for the development of reusable packaging for the retailer ALDI.

The last two years we’ve spent in Research & Development of DiFOLD’s design technology and creating the Origami Bottle as our flagship product. We have covered the whole process from conceptualising, 3D modelling and prototyping to pre-production and injection-molding, testing all of the details that would ensure the best bottle performance and user experience.
