This campaign has ended but the FireAnt is available NOW on our website. 

Come visit us and see all of our unique gear at  tortoisegear.com
The FireAnt is a patented aftermarket accessory designed by Tortoise Gear for use with the Swiss Army knife.
column2:
>

What is the FireAnt and why are we making it?

Everyone loves a good Swiss Army knife - they are an icon of quality and utility wrapped up in a small and easy to carry package!  But let's face it, unless you're an alcoholic who only opens wine bottles with your Swiss Army knife, the corkscrew really is a tool with limited to no use. Until now...

column1: The FireAnt is a custom sparking-steel fire starting tool designed to integrate with the corkscrew tool on Swiss Army knives. Every FireAnt will come with one Helix tinder. The FireAnt and Helix tinder transform the corkscrew into one of the most useful tools you can possibly have on a Swiss Army knife!   Oh, and you can keep your toothpick...
column2:
>

 The FireAnt adds firepower, a splash of color and glow to your Swiss Army knife instantly without any required modifications!

 A perfect micro fire starter for EDC! 

The FireAnt is a complete fire starter integrated within the corkscrew so ZERO extra pocket bulk is added AND at less than one gram it weighs almost nothing, yet it's waterproof and can start hundreds of fires!

column1: Just say NO to bulky pockets!
column3: >Unlike other fire starters FireAnt adds ZERO extra pocket bulk

column6: >
column7:
>

Design Features.

Every feature of the FireAnt is carefully engineered to increase utility.

column1: • Fluted design helps create a strong visual impact.

Not your ordinary firesteel:  The FireAnt will use the same proprietary formula that we developed for our Firefly fire starters.  This is NOT your ordinary sparking steel, it is superior in every way!  It is easy to spark and anti corrosive and it has a lower hardness so it is much less brittle and puts far less wear on your knife tools.

•  Colors that GLOW:  We plan to make the FireAnt in three different neon color tops: Orange, Blue, and Yellow-Green, each with a color complimented sparking steel.  These colors are bright and can be spotted easily if the FireAnt is dropped. AND THEY GLOW!  Each color will have it's own unique all-night glow color so you can easily locate your knife at night!
column2: >
column3: >

column1: •  Anti-corrosion coating: The sparking steel on every FireAnt will be coated with it's own color complimented anti-corrosion coating.  This paired with a low corrosive steel makes the FireAnt very resistant to any corrosion.  If it gets wet or goes through the washing machine it's no big deal.

column3:
>

 

  •  Helix Tinder Included- Every FireAnt comes with one Helix Tinder.  Helix Tinder is a custom extruded waxed cotton tinder designed to integrate into the corkscrew with the FireAnt.
column4:
>

Helix Tinder is waterproof and blended with special additives to increase the melt temperature so it won't melt in your pocket.  Helix Tinder also has a low flash point so it ignites easily even with very small sparks, this helps to prolong the life of your FireAnt fire starter.
column5:
>

 One Helix Tinder can be used all at once for a large hot fire lasting up to 2 minutes or a small piece can be cut off preserving the rest for later.  When separated or cut into 4 pieces each piece can burn for up to 1 minute.
column6:
>

 Helix Tinder is waterproof so it is a very effective fire starter even in very bad conditions.
column9:
>

This is no gimmick, FireAnt means business!

Wet hands, wet tinder, wet fire starter, wet knife, wet ground, submerged gear, rain, snow, sleet... no problem.  The FireAnt and Helix Tinder combination just works! 

We want to make sure everyone knows the FireAnt fire starter and tinder is a real survival tool that means business, check out this video.

column1: Not only does it work great, it looks great too!  The FireAnt can add a bright splash of color and luminescence to your EDC selection, and with three colors to choose from you can pick your complement of the day or activity.
Just click on the reward you want from the column at the right.
What knives and tools will FireAnt work with?

FireAnt will work with any modern Victorinox brand Swiss Army knife that has a smooth corkscrew tool.  Older style corkscrews have a groove running down along them, most of these will work too, but there are some that won't, especially if they are bent at all or have extra turns (really old ones).
We recommend using a knife model that has either a wood saw, metal saw (file), scissors, or an awl as these four tools work the best, but the FireAnt will work with any of these pictured tools:
I already have a Firefly, why would I want a FireAnt too?
The Firefly (our previous project) and the FireAnt both have their place.  Here is a comparison of each and the reasons why you might want one or the other or both:

• More visually useful and appealing.  With a larger top it has color and glow brightness that are much better compared to the Firefly.  This makes it more visually appealing as an accessory and much easier to find at night.
• The FireAnt comes in three color choices as compared with only two Firefly colors.
• Every FireAnt comes with a complimentary piece of Helix Tinder.
• Comes with special anti-corrosion coating for added protection from the elements.
• Because of the shorter sparking steel the FireAnt is much more difficult to accidentally break compared to the Firefly.

• The Firefly has a much larger sparking steel than the FireAnt.  The larger sparking steel makes it easier to get really good sparks which are necessary for starting fires with larger tinder like coarse grass or new dry leaves.
• The Firefly has the potential to last longer because it has a much larger sparking steel.

• The Firefly is more versatile.  The Firefly will fit into any Swiss Army knife with a toothpick slot, which is found in most models.  Even the smaller Classic key chain size knives will accept a Firefly Mini.  It is not restricted only to corkscrew models.

• The Firefly doesn't take up any space in the corkscrew so you can carry a significantly larger amount of Helix Tinder in the corkscrew to use with the the Firefly if you have a knife with a corkscrew.  (Larger size Helix tinder made for the Firefly will be available after the FireAnt campaign if it is successful)
Redundance is key in a survival situation and you can put different fire starters in different knives so we of course recommend getting both :)
• 2017 - Firefly project.  Several people telling us they want to keep their toothpicks or just want more options.  Decision to move forward with the FireAnt idea.
• 2019 - Design, prototyping, testing, settling pre-arrangements with manufacturing partners.
• Jan 2020 - Work on pre-production tooling and samples.
• April 2020 - Kickstarter campaign complete early April, funds delivered to us by Kickstarter a few weeks later.  Indiegogo in-demand campaign begins.
• June 2020 -  Reward shipment to early reward tier Kickstarter backers.  Production continues!
• July 2020 - Shipment to all Kickstarter and Indiegogo backers complete.
","This campaign has ended but the FireAnt is available NOW on our website. Come visit us and see all of our unique gear at  tortoisegear.com

The FireAnt is a patented aftermarket accessory designed by Tortoise Gear for use with the Swiss Army knife.What is the FireAnt and why are we making it?Everyone loves a good Swiss Army knife - they are an icon of quality and utility wrapped up in a small and easy to carry package!  But let's face it, unless you're an alcoholic who only opens wine bottles with your Swiss Army knife, the corkscrew really is a tool with limited to no use. Until now...

The FireAnt is a custom sparking-steel fire starting tool designed to integrate with the corkscrew tool on Swiss Army knives. Every FireAnt will come with one Helix tinder. The FireAnt and Helix tinder transform the corkscrew into one of the most useful tools you can possibly have on a Swiss Army knife!   Oh, and you can keep your toothpick... The FireAnt adds firepower, a splash of color and glow to your Swiss Army knife instantly without any required modifications! A perfect micro fire starter for EDC! The FireAnt is a complete fire starter integrated within the corkscrew so ZERO extra pocket bulk is added AND at less than one gram it weighs almost nothing, yet it's waterproof and can start hundreds of fires!
Just say NO to bulky pockets!Unlike other fire starters FireAnt adds ZERO extra pocket bulk
Design Features.Every feature of the FireAnt is carefully engineered to increase utility.
Fluted design helps create a strong visual impact.

Not your ordinary firesteel:  The FireAnt will use the same proprietary formula that we developed for our Firefly fire starters.  This is NOT your ordinary sparking steel, it is superior in every way!  It is easy to spark and anti corrosive and it has a lower hardness so it is much less brittle and puts far less wear on your knife tools.

Colors that GLOW:  We plan to make the FireAnt in three different neon color tops: Orange, Blue, and Yellow-Green, each with a color complimented sparking steel.  These colors are bright and can be spotted easily if the FireAnt is dropped. AND THEY GLOW!  Each color will have it's own unique all-night glow color so you can easily locate your knife at night! Easy to see, especially in low-light conditions.

Anti-corrosion coating: The sparking steel on every FireAnt will be coated with it's own color complimented anti-corrosion coating.  This paired with a low corrosive steel makes the FireAnt very resistant to any corrosion.  If it gets wet or goes through the washing machine it's no big deal.Corrosion resistant coating

Helix Tinder Included- Every FireAnt comes with one Helix Tinder.  Helix Tinder is a custom extruded waxed cotton tinder designed to integrate into the corkscrew with the FireAnt. Helix Tinder is waterproof and blended with special additives to increase the melt temperature so it won't melt in your pocket.  Helix Tinder also has a low flash point so it ignites easily even with very small sparks, this helps to prolong the life of your FireAnt fire starter.   One Helix Tinder can be used all at once for a large hot fire lasting up to 2 minutes or a small piece can be cut off preserving the rest for later.  When separated or cut into 4 pieces each piece can burn for up to 1 minute.    One Helix Tinder pulled into four pieces. Helix Tinder is waterproof so it is a very effective fire starter even in very bad conditions.Helix Tinder is waterproof!This is no gimmick, FireAnt means business!Wet hands, wet tinder, wet fire starter, wet knife, wet ground, submerged gear, rain, snow, sleet... no problem.  The FireAnt and Helix Tinder combination just works! We want to make sure everyone knows the FireAnt fire starter and tinder is a real survival tool that means business, check out this video.

Not only does it work great, it looks great too!  The FireAnt can add a bright splash of color and luminescence to your EDC selection, and with three colors to choose from you can pick your complement of the day or activity.

These are not three different bags but just one bag. A single bag that you can carry whatever you do, wherever you go and wherever life takes you. 

 

You only need one bag whichever zone you're in.

 

 

The exterior of the backpack is made of  1,000mm waterproof coated material that is identical to the proofing of regular tents. This is far superior to the 600mm water-resistance standard of regular packs.
column4: EXPANSION SYSTEM
column5: />
column6:
>Special 4-point Strap Adjustment System

 

BTBAG weighs light considering the capacity it can carry. At 3.3 lbs, you can carry the BTBAG all day without too much strain on your shoulder. You can put just about anything inside the expanded mode of the bag and it'll still keep its structure thanks to the HDPE base.
column7: >STYLE AND FUNCTION IN ONE!
column8: >When looking for a backpack, you want one that is both stylish in a minimalist kind of way but would also provide the right functions of an outdoor bag so you won't need separate backpacks for work, travel, sports day, camping, out-of-town, the list is endless, as long as you need a bag to put your stuff on.
column14:
>ABOUT US

BTBAG, established in the US, and its partner factory in Vietnam combines more than 12 years of know-how, infrastructure and experience in the manufacturing of backpacks. We decided to venture into crowdfunding to create a product that aggregates user's ideas for a pack that they actually need in their everyday life. Our goal and  motto in BTBAG is to be part of life.
column16:
>Risks and challenges

During the design and prototype stage, we have studied many backpacks in the market, gathered user comments, and discussed with manufacturers for technical issues.  We are confident that the BT BAG could be made with all required features and functionalities in good quality.

The biggest risk to the campaign would be the COVID-19 pandemic. If the situation gets worse, the production and shipment schedule would be affected. If this is the case, we will still strive our best to meet the estimated timeline and closely communicate with backers for updates and possible solutions.

column1:

Choppy - the most lightweight kids balance bike in the world
column2:
>

Cute and functional design, premium materials, and quick assembly without tools. The perfect first bike for 1-4 year-olds

Choppy – fun way to run! 

Riding a bike is a fundamental part of a happy childhood! Remember when you used to ride ahead, hide behind a tree and wait until mom or dad found you? Can you recall the sense of freedom to dash wherever you feel like in a given moment? Did you often ride to a hidden place only you and your friends knew about? If such memories are a part of your childhood, then you know that a bicycle is an essential companion to every child. And the first bike, just like all first friends, needs to be trustworthy, adventurous, and super easy-going! 

Wooden balance bike Choppy has an innovative and handsome design and is made for kids up to four years of age. Choppy is manufactured from premium Latvian wood - birch plywood. It can be assembled as a construction game or building blocks without using any tools. Its packaging box has a board game printed on it, making Choppy even more fun. 

Balance bike Choppy is the second product of an enthusiastic and friendly design and engineering team. After the success of our first balance bike - the award-winning Brum Brum Bike - we took up the challenge to make our next bike lighter, more nature-friendly, comfortable, and better suited for kids up to 4 years of age.

We worked on the Choppy design for several years. We involved the RTU Design Factory innovation workshop in creating several prototypes until we found the ideal design and functionality. Several experienced Latvian manufacturers participated in finding the best materials, developing technical solutions, and creating the perfect packaging.

We are now approaching the point when Choppy will begin commercial production and set off to conquer the world. It’s happening this year already, so check out our Privilege packages and order your Choppy now!

The cutest balance bike for family joyrides

Balance bike Choppy is made for kids from one to four years of age. Riding Choppy around the neighborhood, in the park, or simply around your backyard is not only an adventure in itself but also an excellent way to develop your kid’s balance and agility. In only a few years, your little one will be able to master the skills of pedaling a “real” bicycle. 

Choppy’s packaging is also suitable for fun and games - the inside of the bike’s box doubles as an adventure track with lively drawings.
column4:
showinfo=0"">

Anyone can assemble the balance bike - no tools needed

The balance bike features an innovative design without a single screw. Any adult can assemble the Choppy bike and adjust its height without using any tools. Moms will enjoy how easy it is to put the bike together, while dads or big brothers will find the assembly simpler than putting together IKEA furniture.
column6:
showinfo=0"">

Choppy is a great travel buddy, too, because it’s so handy to bring along on any family trip. The bike can be dismantled, packed neatly in the compact box, and stored in the car’s trunk or even the back seat. When you arrive at your destination, you can quickly assemble it and ride into new adventures.

Innovative design in every detail

Choppy is awesome, from the tops of its handle-bars down to the rubber on its wheels. In other words - from design to materials and even up to its packaging! 

The balance bike is made out of Latvian-produced veneered birch plywood. In Latvia, ancient woodworking traditions intertwine with modern and innovative solutions. The country also produces premium quality birch plywood that is used in most of Choppy’s components. The bike doesn’t have the standard metal bearings and not even a single screw.

Choppy’s seat and handlebars can be adjusted to the height of the little rider. The springy bike seat will protect the child’s back. The bike is ultra-light — it weighs less than 3 kg.

A disassembled bike can be placed in a custom-design cardboard box which is also easily portable. The inside of the box can be removed and used as a board game. The set also includes a fun sticker pack.

As eco-friendly as possible

We were striving to make the kid’s balance bike as nature-friendly and sustainable as possible. That’s why the primary material of Choppy is wood — veneered birch plywood. Choppy is 100% manufactured in Latvia to avoid unsustainable long-distance transportation of materials. In addition to wood, the bike’s construction features different polymer composites and very little metal.

The packaging box is made out of FSC-certified cardboard and put together without glue. It’s durable and designed for long-term storage and transportation of the Choppy bike. The box can be used together or separately with its inlet with an adventure track printed on it. 

Now’s the best time to order Choppy because we’ve already begun its commercial production and we’ll start shipping in August. You’ll get a set with the balance bike + storage box/ board game + sticker pack. We’ve also prepared several privilege packages for you to choose from.

About the Choppy family

For Choppy’s designer and engineer team, this balance bike was the logical next step after their previous project - the Brum Brum Bike that received several awards for its appealing design and original packaging.

The awards included Gold in Packaging Design/Children Products from European Product Design Award 2017 and the Runner up Transportation Award from Core 77 Design Awards 2016.

After Brum Brum Bike’s success, designers continued experimenting with different technical aspects, e.g., making the bike lighter. They wanted to create an innovative balance bike that could be adjusted to the height of very young children. Finally, they wondered if it was possible to create a sustainable product and one that could be assembled without tools. So, Choppy was born, embodying all these ideas and so much more.

Aldis Blicsons - Choppy’s inventor, design author, and co-author of packaging. An award-winning architect and designer with significant experience in building industrial design products. He’s also a radio DJ and a multi-talented artist. 

Toms Grinbergs - Choppy’s creative director and co-author of packaging. Toms works as a stage designer and also does product design, photography, event decoration, and DJ’ing. He’s also the leading artist of several feature films. 

Gatis Grandans - Choppy’s director, in charge of all finances and logistics.

Production process

column2: >Pocket Multi-tool crafted for the XXI Century!

column1: Sure, you can lug around a heavy and cumbersome toolbox everywhere you go, but why would you, when you can replace practically the entire box with this one multi-tool?
Be smart. Invest in a tool that captures your real need.
Caliber X -the ultimate combination of style, functionality, and price. Engineered with practicality in mind, designed for single-handed accessibility.
Extremely lightweight, you may forget that you are carrying it in your pocket. Ergonomic dream come true. Comfortable, secure, and stylish.
2. Serrated knife (3 inches/7.62 cm, S30V blade)
We created a tool that will fit perfectly into your lifestyle. A tool that will fit perfectly in your pocket and will look good in your hand. A tool for a true man.

A truly must-have piece for sailors, hikers, for those who love camping, road trips, or DIY projects. You should have it in your car, on your motorcycle, bicycle, boat, or backpack. It will be a tool that you would love to use. Not just because it looks so COOL, but also because it’s perfect for every 21st-century man activities.

You may think it comes from a new era of Terminator or Matrix, but we designed the CALIBER for those adventures type of man that understand the values of Aquaman or Superman! We definitely put more in it than you may think.
*Make sure to include them in your pledge when you back-up our project.
**Add-ons will not incur any extra shipping costs for you. This one is on us!
How to claim Add-ons and include them in your order:

column2: >Step 1: Select the perk you want to get.
>Step 2: Click on the ""GET THIS PERK"" button.
>Step 3: Scroll down on the next screen at the Add-on section. You will see all available Add-ons for the selected Perk.
>Step 4: Select the desired Add-on and on the pop-up window click on the ""CONTINUE TO PAYMENT"" button.
>Step 5: Chose another Add-on if you want, taking the same actions as in Step 4 above.
>Step 6: After you've selected all the Add-ons you want, scroll up and click on the button ""PROCEED TO PAYMENT"" on the right side.
>Step 7: Fill in all the required info (name, delivery address, etc.), agree with the Terms of Use, and click on ""SUBMIT PAYMENT"".

column1: We put a lot of thought into this one product. We designed it for us and for those who appreciate a real practical tool with a beautifully shaped skeleton. We took our time to test, experiment, do focus groups, and search for the best steel and the best team to make this product come true. We hope our backers will enjoy the product and we promise that in case of delays caused by manufacturing, delivery, or any other issues, we will keep you updated, informed, and will be thankful for your understanding. All the true fellows out there, we hope for your support. Let’s get this Caliber in every pocket. Thank you.
CaliberX is made from solid stainless steel and due to its robust structure, will be very hard, if not impossible to break.
To make sure you can pass your CaliberX to the next generation, the product has been designed in such a way to allow 15 out of the 18 tools to be replaced. It's made to last you a lifetime.

We believe in economic sustainability and care a lot about the environment. By using 100% metal in CaliberX construction, we've removed all of the over-molded plastics and multi-material designs that are so common in today's tools.
Share our campaign with your friends here on Indiegogo and everywhere. It really helps a lot. The hardest part is getting the word out. Thanks so much for taking the time to check us out.
You can always get in touch with us:

Step 4: Select the desired Add-on and on the pop-up window click on the ""CONTINUE TO PAYMENT"" button.
Step 5: Chose another Add-on if you want, taking the same actions as in Step 4 above.
Step 6: After you've selected all the Add-ons you want, scroll up and click on the button ""PROCEED TO PAYMENT"" on the right side.
Step 7: Fill in all the required info (name, delivery address, etc.), agree with the Terms of Use, and click on ""SUBMIT PAYMENT"".

We put a lot of thought into this one product. We designed it for us and for those who appreciate a real practical tool with a beautifully shaped skeleton. We took our time to test, experiment, do focus groups, and search for the best steel and the best team to make this product come true. We hope our backers will enjoy the product and we promise that in case of delays caused by manufacturing, delivery, or any other issues, we will keep you updated, informed, and will be thankful for your understanding. All the true fellows out there, we hope for your support. Let’s get this Caliber in every pocket. Thank you.
CaliberX is made from solid stainless steel and due to its robust structure, will be very hard, if not impossible to break.
To make sure you can pass your CaliberX to the next generation, the product has been designed in such a way to allow 15 out of the 18 tools to be replaced. It's made to last you a lifetime.

We believe in economic sustainability and care a lot about the environment. By using 100% metal in CaliberX construction, we've removed all of the over-molded plastics and multi-material designs that are so common in today's tools.
Share our campaign with your friends here on Indiegogo and everywhere. It really helps a lot. The hardest part is getting the word out. Thanks so much for taking the time to check us out.
You can always get in touch with us:

column1:
0,"

Introducing Paramount - a folding pocket knife designed to impress and stand out from the ordinary, aesthetically and functionally. With a superior quality D2 steel for the blade and a lightweight G10 composite handle, it is a perfect beast to take on any hardcore cutting tasks.

We designed Paramount folding knife to be modern, slim and lightweight. It has clean aesthetics with quality construction to fit your lifestyle. From hardcore cutting tasks in the woods to an elegant addition to your everyday carry with your formal business attire. Elegance with functionality is what Paramount is all about.

 FEATURES:

 High Quality Material: For the blade, we selected D2 Steel for its excellent edge retention and superior corrosion and wear resistance.

The G10 material provides superior rigidity and strength without adding excessive weight or thickness, making a ideal everyday material for your everyday use.

Added stainless steel components to provide durability and corrosion resistance.

Strong and durable structure

 Balanced blade properties: Sharp out of the box and superior long lasting blade edge retention. Durable and relatively easy to sharpen.

 Minimalistic Design: We focused on the core function therefore we minimized materials, components and unnecessary complexity by utilizing simplistic forms, and avoided excess ornamentation to achieve a pure form of elegance.

 Added Ball Bearing to enhance smooth opening motion and secure blade closing.

 Thumb Stud:  Use the thumb stud to easily open the blade.

 Key chain hole: Separate stainless steel component added to ensure it fits in with your key ring perfectly without getting in the way.

 Removeable / Multi Position Pocket Clip:  Paramount comes with multiple pre-drilled holes so you can carry the knife in a way that is suitable for you (tip-up / tip-down carry). Clip it on to your jeans, bag, or whatever you want it on in any style that you want.

Note: Pocket clip design might slightly change for production to improve handle grip/feel.

OUR POCKET KNIFE SPECS:

We designed Paramount to be a highly functional lightweight pocket knife to elevate your everyday carry experience.  We kept it sleek and elegant so you can carry it discreetly and comfortably.

Blade: We chose to use D2 premium steel for the blade as it provides excellent wear resistance and balanced toughness to provide a superior long lasting edge retention. The very high chromium content provides improved corrosion resistance and performance than most tool steels.

We selected a modified sheepsfoot blade shape to enhance the functionality for everyday use. It provides a clean controlled cuts and superior slicing performance while minimizing the potential for accidental blade tip piercing due to the smooth transition curve to the tip. The blade style is a perfect all-around design that is versatile, durable and extremely effective for everyday cutting tasks.

 Dimensions / Size: We designed the pocket knife to be minimalistic, sleek, thin and lightweight. This combination allows you discreetly and easily carry the pocket knife, making it an ideal fit for your everyday carry and everyday use.

Locking Mechanism: We chose a liner lock mechanism to bring a sturdy, reliable and dependable lock mechanism. It uses the strength of the inner spring bar to lock the blade in place while minimizing any play. When the blade is fully open, the tension slips the bar inward to make contact with the butt of the blade, keeping it firmly in place and preventing it from closing. To disengage a liner lock, push the spring bar ""down"" so that it clears contact from the butt of the blade. This lets you use your index finger to push the blade just enough so that it keeps the bar pushed down so you can remove your thumb from the blade path, then continue to safely close the knife. When the knife is closed, the spring bar is held under tension and sufficient force to prevent accidental opening of the blade.

Color Variations: We're bringing two colors: White and Black.  Choose a style that best suits you, or get both!

Handle Design: Designed to enhance handle comfort and grip without the boring appearance of traditional knives. Redefining pocket knives with a sleek and minimalistic handle design to enhance your everyday carry experience.

All our projects start with a rough sketch on paper then we develop a 3D CAD model. After analyzing and refining certain elements of the design, we print our first prototype using 3D printer. We printed numerous components to perfect the design. Once we finalized, we decided to create our first  handmade prototype. After months of strength and durability testing, we're proud to introduce our final prototype.

column6:
> 

Hello Indiegogo! 

After the original BLITZ Tactical Pocket Knife raised nearly $100K in total funding last year, we have had our backers asking to make a straight edge edition.  After 4 successful campaigns and early delivery, we're extremely proud to introduce the newest addition to our collection. The BLITZ TANTO STRAIGHT EDGE is a SMALL pocket knife designed and created by all of our backers!
column7:
> 

Over the past year, we asked all of you to help us design and create the ultimate pocket knife together as a community of adventurers, creators, and designers through a series of surveys, updates, and emails. This included over 1,000 surveys from 22,000 original backers and over 10,000 data points analyzed to create the World's First ""Crowd-Designed"" Project.
column13:
>

The B-2 Pocket Knife Collection was inspired by the notorious B-2 Stealth Bomber military aircraft.  The B-2 Bomber is notably the most advanced warplanes in history. Nearly 80 percent of the aircraft is made from woven composites that incorporated glass, carbon, and graphite fibers. Made of 440Carbon Black Stainless Steel, the BLITZ is a slightly bigger, slightly beefier, and ever so slightly... more badass.
column15:
>

 Based on your feedback, we incorporated these aspects of design into our new Bomber BLITZ Pocket Knife. Our new design is meant to be a chubby style knife. It's wider than a normal proportion of a standard knife. This allows the BLITZ pocket knife to be more durable and stronger in situations that require the use of force. It also gives a stronger grip to the user's hold. At only 3.7 inches, the BLITZ is small enough to conceal in any coin pocket. Its the first of its kind and we are absolutely sure you will love it!
column17:
2oz 
               Length of Blade: 3.7cm 
               Thickness: 7cm Open Body Length: 9.5cm 
               Handle Length: 5cm 
               Materials (Blade and Body): 440Carbon Black Stainless Steel 
               Hardness: 58-60HRC (Rockwell Hardness Scale)
               Color: Jet Black
column18:
>

Tanto Blade - The blade has a high point with a flat grind, leading to an extremely strong point that is perfect for stabbing into hard materials. The thick point of the tanto blade contains a lot of metal near the tip, so it is able to absorb the impact from repeated piercing that would cause most other knives to break.
column19:
>

Small Size -  Discrete conceal-ability is the definition of the BLITZ Pocket Knife. The BLITZ is approximately 9.5cm or 3.7 inches in length. We wanted to keep it small enough to be fully-concealable (in coin pocket) and easy to carry on a day to day basis but also heavy duty like a full pocket knife.
column20:
>

Blade - The BLITZ will have an oversize grip in width and blade which gives it a better handle for tactical use. This style of ""chubby knife"" is the first of its kind. 

Just like with the original B-2 Nano Blade, the BLITZ incorporates a non-serrated portion of the blade featuring a flat grind. The blade itself is very robust giving the BLITZ full tactical abilities despite its smaller form.

440Carbon Black Stainless Steel - The entire body and blade of the Blitz will utilize 440Carbon Black Stainless Steel making the BLITZ one of the strongest pocket knives ever created by mankind. Rated at 58-60HRC (Rockwell Hardness Scale) the BLITZ is extremely tough and will stay sharp for longer periods of use. 440C is a highly durable and corrosion resistant stainless steel. The BLITZ can endure years of outdoor wear without extra maintenance to protect the blade from rusting.
column21:
>

Bomber Signature Perforations - Many backers mentioned adding our signature 3 perforated holes into the blade. Perforated blades allow cutting and slicing of materials to not stick onto the blade itself. It provides a cleaner, sharper cut.
column22:
>

Heavy Duty Screws - The BLITZ will utilize stronger and larger screws than the original B-2 Nano Blade. This allows the pivot point of the blade to absorb extreme impact or force meaning it will be more durable than ever.

Urban Military Concept - All of our Bomber &
column23: Company products have a military design and tactical aesthetic. The BLITZ is engineered to hold durability and functionality to the standard of military-grade equipment. Vincent Pilot Ng (Lead Designer) has had over 10 years of professional experience in product design. He has brought about other renown products to markets such as the Bomber Barrel Duffle Bag, original B-2 Nano Blade, and Halo Belt.
column24:
>

Legality - As a two-handed folding blade under 3 inches in length, it is technically legal worldwide. Please double check with your local customs to make sure the knife falls within local legal restrictions.

Weight - The ultralight weight of the B-2 BLITZ TANTO STRAIGHT EDGE Pocket Knife comes in at less than 2oz making it one of the lightest, fully functional, 440C black stainless steel tactical pocket knife in the world.

Folding/Locking: The BLITZ is both locking and folding. Safety was one of our main concerns when it comes to a knife of this size. We wanted the design to be suitable for beginners as well as intermediate knife experts. The lock is a lever rather than a push button. You can actually use the spine to scrape flint without the worry of it coming around when the blade is locked. This makes the knife design much more robust than traditional smaller blades which are just folding.

When the BLITZ opens, the lever ""SNAPS"" into place to lock the blade from accidentally closing when in use. The user can feel and hear the tactile sound and click on the lock. To close, all you have to do is press the locking lever to open. Utilizing the latest manufacturing and engineering technology, we made sure to leave ZERO wiggle room.
column27:
>

Over the past year, we have had several reiterations of prototyping as you can see below.  The first prototypes were designed out of aluminum casts and wood. After several months of collecting surveys and feedback, we added many more features including a quick access tab and even a thumb grip for better stability when in use. See the below pictures.
column35: Company products were originally designed for ourselves. We engineer everything under strict quality and durability standards. It is our promise to provide a Lifetime Warranty for the B-2 BLITZ TANTO STRAIGHT EDGE Pocket Knife. If it ever breaks, send it back to us and we will replace it free of charge!
column36:
>

Examples of BLITZ Tanto Straight Edge Pocket Knife usage:

column2: Company is an industrial urban product design company based out of San Francisco, CA USA with a mission to provide premium survival gear to the modern explorer. We believe that your everyday gear should be functional and minimal. We're here to design quality products that all hold a life-time warranty.

column1: ABOUT US                Bomber & Company is an industrial urban product design company based out of San Francisco, CA USA with a mission to provide premium survival gear to the modern explorer. We believe that your everyday gear should be functional and minimal. We're here to design quality products that all hold a life-time warranty.",28.0,0,"5 Campaigns

0,"

 

 

You use regular tents because you need to, spending as little time as possible inside. Escape M4 is a tent you’ll stay in because you want to, without missing out on the fresh air &
column2:
revitalizing elements of nature.

 

 

Retractable canopy allows for easy open and close, maximum privacy changing clothes, or resting after a long day.

 

 

With three huge overhead netted ventilation panels, you stay comfortable with unparalleled temperature control, even when the tent is fully closed.

 

 

 

 

 

 

Enough space to sleep four adults, or even to fit a queen size blow-up mattress while leaving plenty of extra room on the sides. 

 

""As someone that has a lot of valuable gear with them most of the time, I appreciate how it closed up to keep my gear sheltered from the sun and also out of sight. Later in day after getting roasted in the sun, I was able to shelter myself for a while until the sun went down, then open it back up and enjoy the ample space to relax. Later that night when the bugs started coming out, I simply pulled the top down and watched the stars through the breezy, open roof. ""

""I've spent countless nights camped out in the jungle, at the beach and love how versatile it is. Gets too hot, I open it up, bugs start to attack, or the rain comes, I simply pull it closed and zip it up. Living in Mexico means we're at the beach a lot and normal tents are anti-social because they're always closed, this beauty opens up and becomes party central for our friends.""

""For me, waking up in a hot, stuffy tent is my least favorite thing to do, plus, after hiking and fishing all day, they don't exactly smell great. Being able to open the tent up, air it out and cool it down is HUGE! It also makes it easy to clean. I also love the quality and durability, no issues with rain and bugs getting in. Worth every penny!""

 

 It's a tale of adventure, ingenuity, and one very sweaty morning. June 2011. Ru wakes up in a tent at the Glastonbury Festival. The mid-summer sun rises and hits the walls. Very quickly the greenhouse effect starts up and rapidly turns his tent into some kind of hateful nomadic sauna. Anyone who has been camping in hot weather knows the feeling.

One second to come up with a new idea. Five years to manifest it in the real world. The Escape M4 Tent gives us something we’ve never had in a tent before – effortless temperature control and the facility to keep the weather out when it's bad yet enjoy it when it’s good.

 

Campo Designs is an expression of our ambition to include as many people as possible, from all backgrounds, to experience the outdoors and live out adventures independently and together. We are thrilled to announce the launch of our premium and versatile tent, Escape M4, essential for beach days, camping weekends, and festivals.

Our mission is simple, to design essential outdoor gear and inspire all people to create simple, humble memories and bring people back into connection with nature and each other. Campo Designs is a minority woman and veteran-owned company.

 

We are able to ship worldwide. VAT and GST not included. Please see reward for details on the shipping cost that applies to you.

We plan to ship starting in March 2022*. We will keep you up to date on our progress and the expected delivery date of your order. 

*Actual ship dates may vary. We will keep you notified of your product ship date.

By backing now, you’ll get to own one of the very first products off of the line, plus exclusive access to provide valuable feedback that will shape future generations of the product.

 

Important! Shipping Charges

Shipping fees are unfortunately at an all-time high! As of August 2021, our professionally prepared shipping estimates are expected to be in the following ranges (depending on shipping speed and rewards/perks chosen).

Environmental commitments

For every tent purchased, we will plant 50 trees on behalf of the purchaser.

We will keep you notified of your product ship date.By backing now, you’ll get to own one of the very first products off of the line, plus exclusive access to provide valuable feedback that will shape future generations of the product. Important! Shipping ChargesShipping fees are unfortunately at an all-time high! As of August 2021, our professionally prepared shipping estimates are expected to be in the following ranges (depending on shipping speed and rewards/perks chosen).Environmental commitmentsFor every tent purchased, we will plant 50 trees on behalf of the purchaser.",36.0,0,"1 Campaign

column4: >Meet the modern, sustainable cooler—built to last years, not millennia.
column5: >Nutshell is a cooler on a mission: to fit seamlessly into adventures and apartments, to replace plastic foam with natural fibers, and to connect people with the farmers and materials at the heart of their products.
column9:
>

 

No garage, no problem. Nutshell packs flat to half its width so you can store it away in the closet, under the couch, or in the trunk of your car!
column13:
>

Nutshell kept ice frozen for more than 48 hours in our tests, outperforming the Yeti Hopper Two, Coleman Excursion, Styrofoam, and several other coolers in identical conditions. There are many variables that affect ice retention including contents of the cooler, ratio of ice, original ice temperature, type of ice (crushed, block, cube), ambient temperature, exposure to direct sunlight, etc. Therefore, we can't tell you exactly how long ice will last inside your Nutshell, but we can tell you it will last longer than it would have inside most plastic alternatives.
column18: >
column19:
>

 

We designed Nutshell with Box Clever, the sustainable design studio behind category-defining products like Nebia showers, Caraway cookware, and Away luggage.
column20:
>

 

Carrying your cooler shouldn't be a workout. Use the comfortable side handles or shoulder strap to take Nutshell wherever you go.
column23:
>

 

Nutshell holds enough food and drinks to keep everyone fed and refreshed. It even fits wine bottles! Check out all the stuff you can fit in a Nutshell (including room for plenty of ice):
column24:
>

Nutshell’s removable, leakproof welded liner makes cleaning a breeze. Rinse it with water and mild soap and let it dry before storing.
column26:
>

Pack your essentials in the two side pockets, or use the hidden D-rings as additional attachment points for your keys and more!
column28:
>

Unclip the front of your Nutshell and use it as a tabletop surface. Great for picnics at the park and at the beach!
column32:
>

The colors are inspired by the Philippines, where tropical beaches meet warm waters and deep lagoons.
column34:
>

The Nutshell Ice Pack is made with recycled polyester and ships empty to minimize carbon emissions. You can easily fill it with water or a salt water mixture at home and freeze it before use. Empty the water after your trip and fold it away, or keep your ice pack full in the freezer, ready for your next adventure. Get it for 33% OFF!
column36:
>

Nutshell Coolers are insulated with coconut husk fiber, a waste product of the coconut industry.

The husk of a coconut is a natural marvel: it protects the water inside, keeping it cool in the heat and safe when it falls. But it’s nothing more than waste for farmers. Billions of leftover husks are burned every year, producing unhealthy smoke and releasing tons of CO2 into the atmosphere.

We spent years working alongside farmers and engineers in the Philippines, turning this waste into insulation for the Nutshell Cooler.
column37:
>

 

Our natural materials offer the supernatural technical performance expected of top outdoor gear.
column38:
>

Coconut husk fibers are hollow and contain tons of tiny trapped air pockets--the same exact structure that plastic foam insulation uses to reduce heat transfer (i.e. conduction). In fact, if you compare Expanded Polystyrene foam (EPS, a.k.a. Styrofoam) and coconut fiber side by side under a microscope, you’ll hardly see a difference. Yet every cooler brand, and almost every outdoor gear company, relies on polluting plastic foam insulation without thinking twice about it. Nutshell proves that there's a better choice, and a growing Nutshell community forces the industry to take notice.
column40:
>

Where we can't eliminate synthetics, we source upcycled and recycled textiles that complement our natural insulation. Nutshell’s water-repellent shell and leakproof liner are made with top-of-the-line materials.
column42: >Nutshell is water resistant thanks to a PFC-free PU coating to protect your stuff from the weather. We chose a 600D recycled fabric and coated webbing for long-term durability.
column44:
>

RF-welded seams eliminate stitching and provide a leakproof interior liner made of 100% recycled polyester. Our sturdy metal hook keeps everything sealed and safe inside your Nutshell.
column46:
>

Hidden D-rings for the shoulder strap offer additional attachment points for keys, bottle openers, and other essentials.
column47:
>

Use the bottom closure latch to fold your Nutshell into a neat package and store it away until your next adventure. As easy as 1,2,3!
column50:
>

By using leftover coconut husks that would otherwise be burned, every Nutshell Cooler prevents CO2 emissions and unhealthy smoke.
column52:
>

 

Nutshell is designed to last years, not millennia. 

Nutshell Coolers are made tough so you can enjoy them on countless adventures for years to come. 

And our design and material choices are grounded in circularity: Nutshell insulation is biodegradable and useful as mulch or plant root protection at the end of its insulating life. The coconut fiber insulation is accessible via internal pockets to separate the degradable and recycled components of your Nutshell Cooler.
column56:
showinfo=0"">

 

We source leftover coconut husks from small-scale farmers in the Philippines. This provides them with an additional source of income for food, school fees, and community investment.
column57:
>

We partner with coconut fiber processors in rural communities, creating new jobs and supporting local businesses.
column58:
>

As a member of 1% for the Planet, Nutshell donates at least 1% of all sales to support our longtime conservation NGO partners in the Philippines.
column59:
>

 

Nutshell was born in a fishing village in the Philippines where optimism is contagious and resourcefulness is a way of life. What began as a graduate school project to improve local fish packaging became a social enterprise that’s improving lives and inspiring change from California to Lubang Island. Today we make biodegradable packaging under the Fortuna Cools brand and sustainable consumer products like the Nutshell Cooler.
column63:
>

We perfected Nutshell in partnership with Box Clever, the SF-based team of designers behind some of your favorite brands. Box Clever has helped build household favorites like Nebia and Caraway. They are experts at creating delightful experiences through sustainable design.

The video production teams led by Zach Doleac at Supertramp Studios and Peter Carney at Exposure Media PH helped us bring our story to life.

 

Our one-of-a-kind community of designers, NGO supporters, investors, and advisors are at the heart of our human-centered design approach.
column65:
>

We’re building a global movement to amplify our impact.  Join us in creating a more hopeful, innovative, and sustainable world.  

Nutshell is our first consumer product but we've been cooling the catch and harvest of fisherfolk and farmers since 2018. Our first product was a collapsible, six foot cooler designed for the hundred thousand small-scale tuna fishermen in Southeast Asia that lack at-sea cold storage—their catch is left out in the sun until they reach the shore, at which point the quality has degraded significantly. We spent months prototyping with local fishermen and designed an affordable, durable, and expandable cooler for this overlooked market.
 

We also make a sustainable, durable, flat-packable alternative to the standard Styrofoam cooler. The Fortuna Cooler was designed alongside fish and produce suppliers in the Philippines to avoid plastic pollution and reduce packaging costs in temperature-sensitive supply chains. Learn more at fortunacools.com
 

With the release of Nutshell Coolers, now everyone can join this journey of social impact and material innovation.

 

Welcome to the Nutshell community, and thank you for your support! We can’t wait to deliver your new Nutshell and make your next adventure more refreshing, and more meaningful.

- Tamara and David
column66:
>

column1:
0,"

 

We're YSMART. We design and make cool EDC products. After the success of YSMART 1.0 with 2500+ backers and over 8000 products fulfilled, we received a heap of great feedback.  Now we are glad to be back with our crowdfunding campaign #3.

Meet YSMART 2.0: The Magnetic Quick-Release Flashlight for Everyday Carry. 

The “Pop-to-Light” solution provides an extremely convenient, easy, fast way to use when you need light in a big hurry. The upgraded version is smallest, lightest,  brightest, more durable, and more convenient than ever before.

 

 

 

Sometimes you just need a strong light, fast. With YSMART 2.0 you get a handy, EDC flashlight that you can take it with you anywhere, and light up anything in an instant.

 

 

No more searching blindly around in the dark or fumbling around to unlock your flashlight. We’ve done away with the need to twist your flashlight to turn it on/off. YSMART 2.0 provides a magnetic quick-release solution. Simply pull it off your keychain then the flashlight turns on immediately.  

 

 

Never worry about accidentally disconnecting your YSMART2.0. Featuring a powerful magnet with 2.5kg/4.8lb of pulling force, you can place it anywhere without worrying about it falling off. 

 

Extending the light’s functionality, the magnet can be attached to metal surfaces for hands-free. 

 

With YSMART2.0, we’ve created our most powerful micro flashlight yet. You get 100 lumens packed into a tiny, robust design.

 

We wanted to do better than the already-stunning original YSMART 1.0, so we upgraded our equipment to feature a state-of-the-art SUPER THIN SMD LED module, which offers maximum output for minimum energy consumption.

 

 

YSMART 2.0 is small enough to carry wherever you go. WOW! Your sports bag, your jacket, and even attach to your keychain. Perfect match for any indoor or outdoor activities. It’s in-interesting that your buddy finds out you’re carrying such a mini but functional cool stuff.

 

 

This amazing design is made of signature black aerospace aluminum or solid ultra -tough titanium. YSMART 2.0 not only looks great, but is practically unbreakable. 

 

 

The main piece of feedback we received from YSMART 1.0 was that the flashlight itself has a magnetic base, but you need to twist it to turn it on and off—so while practical and useful, at times it wasn’t as convenient as it could be.  

So, we went back to the drawing board to determine how we could provide a solution to this feedback. How could we improve on YSMART 1.0 ? Make it easy to detach, with automatic on/off! And so, the YSMART 2.0 quick-release auto-lighting mechanism was born. We spent a year on research and development, refining our designs until we landed on the design you see today.

 

SPECIFICATIONS

Weight: Titanium- 12g / Aluminum- 8g

 Width: 1cm Length: 3cm 

Materials: Premium Aerospace Grade Aluminum Alloy / Grade 5 Titanium 

Battery: LR41/AG3 Button Cell （NOT INCLUDE）

Type of Bulb: Micro SMD LED 2.0

column1: Problem solved! You no longer have to settle for having the limitation of long range illumination or close up visibility only.  Get it all with the new One80 Headlamp.

Combining the concept of our original One80 Headlamp with features of a traditional headlamp, we've created the next revolution in headlamps. Get the best of both wide-angle peripheral visibility found in the One80 Headlamp with the long range directional visibility of a traditional headlamp all in one.
Experience wide peripheral visibility combined with longer range directional illumination. All-encompassing illumination perfect for your next big adventure, run, work project or any other activity.
Don't be limited to only one option or another! Get it all with the new One80 Headlamp.

Adjustable long-range directional light expands your visibility. With the adjustable tilt spotlight, you can get an accurate spotlight directed exactly where you need it, while keeping the full close-range 180 degree visibility.
Super low-profile and lightweight at only 5 oz. So comfortable you'll forget you're wearing it.
The broad range of uses for the the new One80 Headlamp are endless. From fishing or running, to home project and more. The diversity of uses will make this tool a go-to for  daily life.
Multiple range of options help you get the exact light source you need for any occasion.
There is nothing worse than a battery running out when you need it most. That's why we've made the battery removable. Keep a back up battery on hand and swap it out as needed  - quickly and easily.
All components are removable and interchangeable. Why?

column2: attach to use light and battery pack on belt add-on (see below)
attach to use light and battery pack on helmet headband add-on (see below)

column1: Loved by runners and hikers, the One80 belt accessory makes running, walking or hiking easier with a lower point of illumination. LED lights and Battery Pack are easily removed from the headband and can be added to your belt in a matter of seconds.
The helmet headband accessory is perfect for most all helmets. Larger and lined with non-slip silicone, this headband makes using the headlamp on a helmet easier and more secure.

This is our 4th Indiegogo Campaign. We are familiar with the process and have learned much from our first 3 experiences. With that in mind we are not naive enough to believe we have it all figured out, and keep our perspectives alert and open to the potential of unplanned changes throughout this process. From what we learned, we've done everything possible to streamline the process on our end. We are working with the same trusted manufacturer on this project that we've worked with over the past 6 years. We’ve set a delivery date that is real and attainable to ensure an on time delivery or early delivery
column2: even in the case that something unexpected occurs. Regardless, we’ll work to keep all supporters aware of changes or challenges if/as they happen.

column1:
YOUR OUTDOOR EXPERIENCE IS JUST THAT. YOURS.
YOUR APPAREL SHOULD BE, TOO.

The MADE hard shell ski and snowboard jacket and pants are waterproof, windproof, and breathable. They are super durable with a premium finish featuring welded seams, waterproof zippers, and a 3-layer waterproof fabric. But seriously, there's so much more to it than that.
These premium jackets and pants are made to measure with a guaranteed perfect fit and every detail is designed by you.
The traditional outerwear model takes an average of a bunch of people and designs patterns accordingly. By trying to fit everyone, they are effectively fitting no one.
Fit has been a compromise we have always dealt with and we may not even realize that our sleeves are way too long, the torso is too short, or there is not quite enough room for full range of motion.

Our patent-pending system starts and ends with you. Tell us about the style of fit you are looking for. Then with the help of our detailed instructions we get precise measurements of your body which are fed into our software to scale the patterns for the perfect fit. Every custom pattern is double-checked by a trained pattern-maker for consistency and accuracy leading to a guaranteed perfect fit.
Doesn’t fit exactly right? We’ll fix it. We want you to be psyched about your new gear, not feeling like what you got is just “good enough.”
You know your outdoor needs better than anybody. That’s why with MADE you choose every detail. Our whole system is designed around you. That’s kind of the point.

On your own or with the help of one of our design consultants, you choose your material between the durable waterproof Sympatex or a more lightweight waterproof Polartec Neoshell depending on your needs.

Then choose your colour, style, zippers, pockets, sleeves, hood design, everything. Want specific details like pit zips or a powder skirt? You decide all of this, not some designer thinking of you as part of a generic market segment.

As avid outdoor users and inhabitants of this planet we want to take the best care of it we can. We're realistic, though - we ARE starting an apparel brand. And this means we will be adding more ""stuff"" to the planet. We are addressing this in three primary ways: made-to-order manufacturing, responsible materials sourcing, and direct shipping.

MADE-TO-ORDER MANUFACTURING
Our radically different supply chain means we only make what we need. Traditional apparel seasonal turnover and the desire for fresh new things means left over materials and unsold goods make their way to the landfill every year. The general apparel industry is one of the world's largest polluters. We don't make gear that doesn't already have a home, and the gear we do make is going to be exactly what you want built to last a long time.

column2:
RECYCLABLE
With recycled and recyclable material we are excited to be a part of closing the textiles loop. Sympatex is PFC and PTFE free and completely carbon neutral. With Sympatex we envision a future where you can send your whole jacket back to us at the end of its life and we will turn it back into a brand new jacket.

column1:
POLARTEC NEOSHELL  |  DEADSTOCK
As industry professionals our team has seen first hand what happens when companies overestimate and overproduce their material needs. Brands want to inject new colours and new designs every season, but what happens when orders get cancelled and forecasts change? The sad truth is that a lot of those materials end up in the landfill. Sitting in factories and warehouses around the world are thousands of meters of leftover A-grade materials, known as deadstock. We have sourced this fabric directly from Polartec partners and can put it to use while keeping it out of the trash.

DIRECT SHIPPING
Every product we make will be shipped just once - directly to you. This not only cuts down on the emissions associated with the product, but we can also be creative with our packaging since your jacket isn't sitting on a shelf for months on end. Oh, and did we mention that shipping is free? We'll cover the costs, duties, etc. to get it wherever you may be.

Think about it. The first thing you do in any apparel shopping experience is identify your gender - Men’s or Women’s. That doesn’t make any sense to us. We want anyone and everyone to feel comfortable in their gear. And your gender has nothing to do with that. Your perfect fit and style choices are what we care about.
This marks the end of men's v. women's colours, the pink tax, and other common practices that have become the norm in the outdoor industry.

THE MINIMALIST
Trimmed down feature set for those looking to keep it simple, light, and fast. Oh, and you save a bit of cash, too.

THE MAXIMALIST
All the bells and all the whistles. With the Maximalist you can get anything and everything you have ever wanted out of your shell.

COLOUR (not a typo, we're Canadian)
Ideally, we would have every colour anybody wants, but we still need to order fabrics and meet minimum orders, so we need to be smart about it.
Here is a breakdown of the fabric and zipper colours available for the campaign perks. Just envision your new jacket designed with the exact look you want!

CAPRI PHILIP  |  Co-Founder, Design
Loves fishing, hasn’t yet caught anything.
Capri’s lifelong pursuit of knowledge in patternmaking, design, and development coupled with her passion for snowboarding, skiing, biking, and climbing has led to a career designing for leaders in the market including the past six years at Arc’teryx. She is driven to design the best performing, most sustainable gear on the planet.

CHERYL LEBARR  |  Co-Founder, Development
Played young Annie Oakley in a local figure skating production at age 7. Adorable, eh?
Cheryl got her start at 15 in a little outdoor shop on the Sunshine Coast, leading to a lifelong obsession with high quality outdoor gear. After mastering her craft at university and working for stellar outdoor brands including Arc’teryx, she is now focused on creating premium, personalized, custom gear.

DUSTIN BUTCHER  |  Co-Founder, Brand
Who invited him? He’s not even Canadian.
Born and raised at the foot of the Wasatch mountains of Utah, Dustin is deeply connected to the outdoors and skiing. During his professional career he has had the opportunity to work in-house and as a creative agency lead for some powerhouse brands in the outdoor industry including G3, Petzl, Gregory Packs, Pret Helmets, and others.

March - April: Indiegogo campaign
Late April: Campaign survey sent out for jacket designs and measurements from each backer
May - August: Fulfill Indiegogo orders based on first order in, first order out timeline
September: Launch the full brand - yes, we will have pants and softshell at this point

Not in the market for a new shell? Help us get the word out! Use the Indiegogo sharing tools at the top of the page (to the right of the BACK IT button) to share the campaign with your connections to support the idea and get us that much closer to creating something new and better in the world of technical apparel.
We have a lot more in mind for the future. Follow us on social @made.outdoor to stay in the loop!

We have been hard at work developing our systems and processes, but we don't yet know what we don't know. Our expert team has been in the industry for a long time, but anytime you introduce a change like this you are bound to run into some challenges. As we come across these challenges we will be fully transparent with our backers and solve them in a way that leaves you happy and proud to support our company.

Supply Chain Risk: We are kinda shaking things up here, but we are working with trusted partners in our software, manufacturing, shipping, customs logistics, and every other piece of the puzzle. But even the experts aren't immune to weather, port congestion, and other uncontrollable factors.
Whatever happens, we'll get through it together and keep you in the loop the whole time.
","YOUR OUTDOOR EXPERIENCE IS JUST THAT. YOURS.YOUR APPAREL SHOULD BE, TOO.

The MADE hard shell ski and snowboard jacket and pants are waterproof, windproof, and breathable. They are super durable with a premium finish featuring welded seams, waterproof zippers, and a 3-layer waterproof fabric. But seriously, there's so much more to it than that.
These premium jackets and pants are made to measure with a guaranteed perfect fit and every detail is designed by you.
The traditional outerwear model takes an average of a bunch of people and designs patterns accordingly. By trying to fit everyone, they are effectively fitting no one.
Fit has been a compromise we have always dealt with and we may not even realize that our sleeves are way too long, the torso is too short, or there is not quite enough room for full range of motion.

Our patent-pending system starts and ends with you. Tell us about the style of fit you are looking for. Then with the help of our detailed instructions we get precise measurements of your body which are fed into our software to scale the patterns for the perfect fit. Every custom pattern is double-checked by a trained pattern-maker for consistency and accuracy leading to a guaranteed perfect fit.
Doesn’t fit exactly right? We’ll fix it. We want you to be psyched about your new gear, not feeling like what you got is just “good enough.”
You know your outdoor needs better than anybody. That’s why with MADE you choose every detail. Our whole system is designed around you. That’s kind of the point.

On your own or with the help of one of our design consultants, you choose your material between the durable waterproof Sympatex or a more lightweight waterproof Polartec Neoshell depending on your needs.

Then choose your colour, style, zippers, pockets, sleeves, hood design, everything. Want specific details like pit zips or a powder skirt? You decide all of this, not some designer thinking of you as part of a generic market segment.

As avid outdoor users and inhabitants of this planet we want to take the best care of it we can. We're realistic, though - we ARE starting an apparel brand. And this means we will be adding more ""stuff"" to the planet. We are addressing this in three primary ways: made-to-order manufacturing, responsible materials sourcing, and direct shipping.

MADE-TO-ORDER MANUFACTURINGOur radically different supply chain means we only make what we need. Traditional apparel seasonal turnover and the desire for fresh new things means left over materials and unsold goods make their way to the landfill every year. The general apparel industry is one of the world's largest polluters. We don't make gear that doesn't already have a home, and the gear we do make is going to be exactly what you want built to last a long time.

RESPONSIBLE MATERIALS SOURCINGSYMPATEX  |  RECYCLED & RECYCLABLEWith recycled and recyclable material we are excited to be a part of closing the textiles loop. Sympatex is PFC and PTFE free and completely carbon neutral. With Sympatex we envision a future where you can send your whole jacket back to us at the end of its life and we will turn it back into a brand new jacket.

POLARTEC NEOSHELL  |  DEADSTOCKAs industry professionals our team has seen first hand what happens when companies overestimate and overproduce their material needs. Brands want to inject new colours and new designs every season, but what happens when orders get cancelled and forecasts change? The sad truth is that a lot of those materials end up in the landfill. Sitting in factories and warehouses around the world are thousands of meters of leftover A-grade materials, known as deadstock. We have sourced this fabric directly from Polartec partners and can put it to use while keeping it out of the trash.

DIRECT SHIPPINGEvery product we make will be shipped just once - directly to you. This not only cuts down on the emissions associated with the product, but we can also be creative with our packaging since your jacket isn't sitting on a shelf for months on end. Oh, and did we mention that shipping is free? We'll cover the costs, duties, etc. to get it wherever you may be.

Think about it. The first thing you do in any apparel shopping experience is identify your gender - Men’s or Women’s. That doesn’t make any sense to us. We want anyone and everyone to feel comfortable in their gear. And your gender has nothing to do with that. Your perfect fit and style choices are what we care about.
This marks the end of men's v. women's colours, the pink tax, and other common practices that have become the norm in the outdoor industry.

THE MAXIMALISTAll the bells and all the whistles. With the Maximalist you can get anything and everything you have ever wanted out of your shell.

column2: >ENGLISH VERSION IS BELOW, AFTER THE FRENCH VERSION!
column5:
>Soutenez-nous pour faire de la capuche Overcap une réalité !

Pour les amateurs de pêche, les observateurs de la nature et les sorties en pleine nature, nous avons conçu Overcap - un accessoire unique et pratique pour toute activité extérieure. Résultat de plus de trois ans de recherches, de développements et de tests en conditions réelles - avec une demande de brevet en 2018 - Overcap est la première capuche rigide amovible au monde adaptée à toutes les conditions météorologiques : pluie, vent, soleil et neige. Overcap offre un confort incomparable et s'attache à n'importe quel sac à dos grâce à ses sangles. Overcap se déplie en un seul mouvement et vous protège efficacement tout en vous garantissant une totale liberté de mouvement.
column6: >Pour ce produit de qualité, durable et made in Europe (à 50%) le seul moyen d'obtenir un prix de vente accessible est de le produire en série. Afin de financer ces coûteux investissements, nous avons besoin de votre soutien !
column7: >

column11: >Les quantités minimum imposées par les fournisseurs des textiles pour chaque couleur ne nous permettent pas encore de proposer des couleurs supplémentaires. Mais nous y travaillons. Revenez régulièrement ici, nous aurons peut-être une bonne nouvelle avant la fin de la campagne !

column2: >Support us to make Overcap hood a reality!

>For the fishing aficionados, nature observers and strollers in the great outdoors, we have designed Overcap – a unique and convenient accessory for every outdoor activity. Results of over three years of research, developments, and tests in real conditions - with patent application in 2018 - Overcap is the world’s first rigid removable hood suitable for all weather conditions: rain, wind, sun and snow. Overcap offers incomparable comfort and attaches to any backpack thanks to its straps, Overcap unfolds in a single movement and protects you effectively while guaranteeing you total freedom of movement.

For this quality, durable and made in Europe product (at 50%) , the only way to obtain an accessible sales price is to produce it in series. In order to finance these costly investments, we need your support!

Results of over three years of research, developments, and tests in real conditions - with patent application in 2018 - Overcap is the world’s first rigid removable hood suitable for all weather conditions: rain, wind, sun and snow. column2: >If you’re tough and strong, you’ll be even so when riding PATRIOT PRO. With this rugged open-air companion, your distinctiveness and toughness can’t be boasted more!
column3: >Inspired by the Iron Man, PATRIOT PRO stands for stronger power propelled by a 1500W motor and futuristic design of the biometric bike lock.  You’ll feel like riding on a wild beast that can take you wherever you wanna go wildly and freely. Speedy acceleration with fat tries 26X3.0 inch forms the robust and reliable adventures, much tougher to handle the rigorous demands of the roads. Wherever it leads you, it stays exactly yours.

column19: >The 1500W motor supplies this wild electric bike with beefy power to get your heart racing. It boosts the ride at a top speed of 31 miles per hour that gives you the pure enjoyment of speed and power.  Feel free to ride uphill, downhill or even stairs with full speed hands down. All the speed, all the fun!

column27: >Advanced built-in fingerprint recognition device doubles the safety and convenience of keeping your PATRIOT.  With a touch of your fingerprint on the sensor, the bike is locked and unlocked automatically. Gone are the days of bringing the key or cable lock for this smart keyless access.  Not only can this anti-theft system store your fingerprint but a few more of those you share this bike with so that multiple cyclists can be allowed to use it safely. Enjoy this exclusivity that just belongs to you, your friends and family members!

See the beauty in this beast and feel the sturdiness it gives.

column48: >PATRIOT isn't only a powerful electric bike but a very comfortable one to ride on as we have both front and rear suspension, which will absorb most of the shocks on the road. This not only gives you a more enjoyable ride but also lets you ride at a high speed without much frequency of braking. Comfort throughout the ride is never sacrificed!

column59: >26X3.0 inch fat tires provide maximum contact in any road condition for optimum traction and steadiness.  Instead of adopting 4-inch fat tires that are heavier, 3-inch fat tires are just right for easier control to deliver faster speed and complete the missions of the fusion of an MTB and a road bike like PATRIOT. Dirt, grass, gravel, and city streets are easily conquered with these exceptional tires, adding comfort and skid resistance to riding.

column67: >Located in the center and integrated with the frame, there’s no extra space taken for its Samsung battery 48V 14.5Ah battery, looking stealthy and stylish. Moreover, it is removable for easy charging.  Lithium battery has the best combination of total weight and capacity. Charging for 4-6 hours to get the battery fully charged and you’re ready to hit the road!

column84: >PATRIOT comes with both thumb throttle and pedal-assist for superb propulsion. If pedaling is not for you, push the throttle on the left.  You can choose either of the modes or, in combination at your discretion.  The max. speed can be up to 31 mph by throttle and 20mph by pedal assist. Coupled with Shimano 7 speed gears adapted to rough conditions as well as hydraulic disc brakes, PATRIOT PRO delivers an unprecedented smooth ride for you on varying terrains with perfect assistance from the firm and safe stopping power.  Riding data presented on the colorful LCD in sync wherever you go.  Come be the master of this unmatched all-around beast!

The exquisite truss design sustains heavy loads to deliver the ride safely. The battery resembles the heart for our long-lasting expedition, empowering the ride all the way.  Riding on SPLACH-PATRIOT PRO will give you power, speed, and the superhuman capabilities that no one else has.
