","If you’re tough and strong, you’ll be even so when riding PATRIOT PRO. With this rugged open-air companion, your distinctiveness and toughness can’t be boasted more!  Inspired by the Iron Man, PATRIOT PRO stands for stronger power propelled by a 1500W motor and futuristic design of the biometric bike lock.  You’ll feel like riding on a wild beast that can take you wherever you wanna go wildly and freely. Speedy acceleration with fat tries 26X3.0 inch forms the robust and reliable adventures, much tougher to handle the rigorous demands of the roads. Wherever it leads you, it stays exactly yours. Your strong personality just got to be matched up with this strong bike!      The 1500W motor supplies this wild electric bike with beefy power to get your heart racing. It boosts the ride at a top speed of 31 miles per hour that gives you the pure enjoyment of speed and power.  Feel free to ride uphill, downhill or even stairs with full speed hands down. All the speed, all the fun!   Advanced built-in fingerprint recognition device doubles the safety and convenience of keeping your PATRIOT.  With a touch of your fingerprint on the sensor, the bike is locked and unlocked automatically. Gone are the days of bringing the key or cable lock for this smart keyless access.  Not only can this anti-theft system store your fingerprint but a few more of those you share this bike with so that multiple cyclists can be allowed to use it safely. Enjoy this exclusivity that just belongs to you, your friends and family members!   The elaborate truss structure of PATRIOT renders larger strength to withstand more heavy and dynamic loads. The truss outlook not only shows off its unique and aesthetic shape but fulfills challenging missions whatever it can be for its amazing load-bearing capacity. See the beauty in this beast and feel the sturdiness it gives.   PATRIOT isn't only a powerful electric bike but a very comfortable one to ride on as we have both front and rear suspension, which will absorb most of the shocks on the road. This not only gives you a more enjoyable ride but also lets you ride at a high speed without much frequency of braking. Comfort throughout the ride is never sacrificed!   26X3.0 inch fat tires provide maximum contact in any road condition for optimum traction and steadiness.  Instead of adopting 4-inch fat tires that are heavier, 3-inch fat tires are just right for easier control to deliver faster speed and complete the missions of the fusion of an MTB and a road bike like PATRIOT. Dirt, grass, gravel, and city streets are easily conquered with these exceptional tires, adding comfort and skid resistance to riding.    Located in the center and integrated with the frame, there’s no extra space taken for its Samsung battery 48V 14.5Ah battery, looking stealthy and stylish. Moreover, it is removable for easy charging.  Lithium battery has the best combination of total weight and capacity. Charging for 4-6 hours to get the battery fully charged and you’re ready to hit the road!     We got 3 stunning colors to turn heads: Illuminating Yellow / Navy Blue/USA Flag Colors. You can choose the tone of color you want for your Patriot Pro to show your distinctiveness and personality.  Be bright, be cool and be trendy.   PATRIOT comes with both thumb throttle and pedal-assist for superb propulsion. If pedaling is not for you, push the throttle on the left.  You can choose either of the modes or, in combination at your discretion.  The max. speed can be up to 31 mph by throttle and 20mph by pedal assist. Coupled with Shimano 7 speed gears adapted to rough conditions as well as hydraulic disc brakes, PATRIOT PRO delivers an unprecedented smooth ride for you on varying terrains with perfect assistance from the firm and safe stopping power.  Riding data presented on the colorful LCD in sync wherever you go.  Come be the master of this unmatched all-around beast!    Being a big fan of Iron Man, we got inspired by its tough outlook and the bright heart at the center.  The smart biometric lock presents the high-tech feature. The exquisite truss design sustains heavy loads to deliver the ride safely. The battery resembles the heart for our long-lasting expedition, empowering the ride all the way.  Riding on SPLACH-PATRIOT PRO will give you power, speed, and the superhuman capabilities that no one else has.         We’ll make it again!Successful shipping is made as promised and guaranteed already for our e-scooter. This will apply the same to our e-bike, SPLACH-PATRIOT. We closely watch every step from production to shipping. Your trust in the purchase will be transformed to guaranteed delivery without compromising the high quality promised.Your commitment to us is a guaranteed purchase!  This means you'll get the bike guaranteed if you order a bike from us.   Not only are we making a brand and electric vehicles, but we’re also building a big family to have members joining in to create a rider-friendly environment to expand the use of green gadgets made by SPLACH.Our family members are happy riders that ride SPLACH for commute and for leisure, having much fun from our innovation and dedication. Tangible testimony of our guaranteed delivery are these happy smiles!                SPLACH has been a remarkable creator of stylish, practical, and eco-friendly vehicles which are ideal substitutes to cars and other means of transport.We offer premium electric vehicles that are cutting-edge and user-friendly. They embody quality, comfort, functionality and entertainment. SPLACH-PATRIOT PRO is a comfortable, versatile vehicle combining city and sport use. Commuting to work and hanging out with friends in a race can both be done on just one bike: SPLACH-PATRIOT PRO.SPLACH was established in Los Angeles and Taiwan by passionate entrepreneurs. Dennis, the CEO of SPLACH, is committed to designing products that fulfill customers' needs. Graduated from USC, he's well familiar with the US market. Born in Taiwan, he precisely maneuvers state-of-the-art technology in producing high-end e-scooters. With his and the whole team's great ambition and devotion, more advanced items are still to come!",59.0,1,"4 Campaigns

column1:
0,"

​Baan is a health and wellness eco retreat where guests can convene with nature, meditate under the stars, and experience community.

It is inspired by the joy of village living in Laos.  The word “baan” means “home” in Lao.  BAAN is a modern village made of sustainable constructed 3D-printed pods.  Each 570sq ft. pod is inspired by the desert landscape and daily rituals in Lao villages.   

As a part of our commitment to fostering community, each pod is situated apart to facilitate personal reflection, and arranged in a sphere around shared communal spaces.  Communal areas consist of yoga/meditation space, dipping pool, community herb garden and a multi-purpose space for hosting events and art shows. 

 

Each pod has every amenity needed for comfortable modern living, including a full kitchen and bath, king size bed and a creative work area. Indoor and outdoor living merge to stimulate the senses and connect us to nature.  Space planning is intentionally open to induce a state of “flow.”

In constructing the eco village, BAAN is partnering with companies that align with our core values of sustainability, diversity, mindfulness, and community.  As a part of our broader mission, BAAN is also working with organizations to spotlight Lao Villagers still suffering from undetonated ordnance dropped on the country during the ""Secret War.""  Laos is the most heavily bombed country in history per capita.

In Lao we say “Ma Der Ma Der “ a neighborly phase that translates to “come and join us.” BAAN welcomes ALL to experience mindfulness thru the Lao lens.  Let's use our strength as a community - and make Baan a place to celebrate and connect.  We invite you to join our movement.

​

 

​MEET THE FOUNDER 

 

​

​

​

","​Baan is a health and wellness eco retreat where guests can convene with nature, meditate under the stars, and experience community.It is inspired by the joy of village living in Laos.  The word “baan” means “home” in Lao.  BAAN is a modern village made of sustainable constructed 3D-printed pods.  Each 570sq ft. pod is inspired by the desert landscape and daily rituals in Lao villages.   As a part of our commitment to fostering community, each pod is situated apart to facilitate personal reflection, and arranged in a sphere around shared communal spaces.  Communal areas consist of yoga/meditation space, dipping pool, community herb garden and a multi-purpose space for hosting events and art shows.  Each pod has every amenity needed for comfortable modern living, including a full kitchen and bath, king size bed and a creative work area. Indoor and outdoor living merge to stimulate the senses and connect us to nature.  Space planning is intentionally open to induce a state of “flow.”In constructing the eco village, BAAN is partnering with companies that align with our core values of sustainability, diversity, mindfulness, and community.  As a part of our broader mission, BAAN is also working with organizations to spotlight Lao Villagers still suffering from undetonated ordnance dropped on the country during the ""Secret War.""  Laos is the most heavily bombed country in history per capita.In Lao we say “Ma Der Ma Der “ a neighborly phase that translates to “come and join us.” BAAN welcomes ALL to experience mindfulness thru the Lao lens.  Let's use our strength as a community - and make Baan a place to celebrate and connect.  We invite you to join our movement.​ ​MEET THE FOUNDER  ​​​",11.0,0,"1 Campaign

Why not just go in the bushes?

Using the restroom in the outdoors or in an area without restroom facilities is somewhat of a human right of passage. It can be embarrassing, stressful, and have varying degrees of success. While some people desire to go find a place in the bushes to relieve themselves, it is not for everybody. The InstaPrivy gives individuals a stable chair and a well ventilated privacy tent to take care of their needs without embarrassment. 

The United States is currently facing a poop crisis in National Parks. To combat this problem many National Parks and outdoors areas are initiating Leave no Trace and Pack it Out policies. InstaPrivy is an ideal solution for this mess!
Read about it:
Canyonlands National Park adds backcountry poop restrictions
America's National Parks Are Being Ruined by Human Poop

 

The Inventor

The InstaPrivy was created out of necessity by its inventor, Paul Mangum, for his own family.  In preparation for a family adventure off the beaten path, Paul looked for a portable toilet and found that products calling themselves portable, were not!  Paul created the first prototypes in his garage and with the help of a sewing friend.  Paul continued to improve on his early design for his family and eventually decided the product was needed by a lot more than just his family and shifted his efforts to create a commercially viable portable toilet kit that almost everyone in the world can use, anywhere, anytime.  The InstaPrivy is a game changer for any outdoor experience.  With full support of his 5 awesome kids who inspired this product, Paul has finalized the latest InstaPrivy design and is entering into the manufacturing phase of the project.  ""It has taken awhile to get to this point, but with the right team in place and support from our Indiegogo backers, we are bringing this long awaited InstaPrivy product to life and to people all over the world.""

column1:
InstaPrivy's place in the market (competitive products)

InstaPrivy has an MSRP of $149.00. The marketplace is filled with competitors, but nothing is as versatile as InstaPrivy and makes as much sense at the InstaPrivy.  Some cheaper toilet chairs cost less, but are not as functional or reliable as the InstaPrivy toilet chair.  Others cost more and weigh more than the entire InstaPrivy kit.  And other portable toilet systems with waste containment tanks can be very expensive, take up a lot of space and are really not what we consider ""portable"".   Competing privacy shelters are sold separately and can be expensive and take precious time to set up or can be near impossible to fold back up to put away due to their poor design.  The InstaPrivy is the only complete kit that is truly portable that you can easily take with you everywhere you go! 

 

 

Fold-Out Chair

column2: Portable Chair: Strong hinges and a strong plastic blend allow the chair to hold up to 250 lbs.  It folds down and easily stows inside backpack.

column1: • Leave No Trace Compatible: Enclosed waste bag fits under lid and complies with Pack It In, Pack It Out and Leave No Trace guidelines.
• Easy To Clean: Flat interior legs, and fold back seat allow for easy cleaning.

column2: Stowable Backpack Straps: Padded and adjustable straps to fit most frames, and can be stored inside back pocket to convert to hand carry from backpack.
Interior Pockets: Everything item has its own space

column1: • Fold-out-flat main compartment has double zippers, multiple compression straps, and large pouches inside for organization.
• Hortizontal MOLLE Webbing System: Capable of Modular Lightweight Load-carrying Equipment.
• Sturdy Handle: High quality military-grade sturdy grab handle 600D Water resistant high density nylon.

column2: Hands Free Privacy: InstaPrivy contains no zippers or poles and can be erected or put away in seconds and once expanded allows for hands free privacy.
Durable Fabrics: Made of durable lightweight coated material
Ventilation: Top breathable mesh line, allows the user a 360 degree view and allows odors to ventilate.
Expansive Space: Shelter provides complete privacy with ample room for most body sizes.

What is SAFE NUKE?

 

SAFE NUKE is an everyday carry tool that allows you to press buttons, touch ATM screens, door handles, self checkout screens and keypads, car park ticket machine buttons, elevator buttons and many more without direct contact with your hands.
column2: >

column1:
Pressing buttons 

 

Safe Nuke is designed to work with any buttons out there. The special groove makes it convenient to hold and ensures a secure grip.
column2:
>

The tip is well thought out to easily hit the smallest buttons and at the same time, it's strong enough for the big ones.
column3:
>

 

Opening doors

 

To avoid direct contact with door handles each Safe Nuke comes with a strong paracord that can be used as a loop to open the doors.
column4:
>

 

Adjustable length

 

The adjustable length of paracord makes it compatible with most door handles out there.

column1:
Compatible with Touchscreens

 

Safe Nuke is equipped with a high-quality stylus tip that allows it to work precisely with any touchscreen.
SAFE NUKE is designed to be as small as possible so you could easily carry it with you, fit in any pocket or next to your keys.
Additionally, we offer to get a leather sleeve to keep the Nuke in and to better protect it against scratches.
Cooper is well known for its antimicrobial properties. To bring it's best features we are not using any kind of surface treatment for SAFE NUKE. We proudly can say it is made of 99.9% pure copper.
column2:
>

Additionally copper has very unique visual features.  Its surface will gain some patina layer over the time that adds personal characteristics to your NUKE.

column1: Using SAFE NUKE will help you to avoid direct contact from dirty public surfaces. However, we suggest to wash it as frequently as your hands. It is made of very durable materials - copper body with stylus nib and US-made paracord. You can wash it with water and soap or disinfect with hand sanitizer. Don't be the one who comes into contact with all the dirt, let the SAFE NUKE do it.

Each Nuke is CNC machined and finished in our own workshop which makes us fully independent from outsource manufacturers. We pay special attention to every single detail because that's what builds quality.
column2:
>

 

We have gone through a lot of prototyping processes to achieve the perfect end result. You can check a few of our early prototypes below.
column3: >
column4:
>

 

We offer two surface finishes for the SAFE NUKE. You can choose between satin matte finish achieved by smooth brushing or mirror polished surface. Both look very nice and compliment each other.
column5:
>

 

Paracords

We offer three paracord designs: black, red and camo style.

column3:
> 

 

 

TIMELINE

OUR TEAM

We are a CNC machining workshop established 4 years ago and owned by three friends. It is our passion to create pocket size everyday carry gadgets that make our life easier and a bit more fun at the same time. We believe that Indiegogo is the perfect place for us to offer you our latest creation and we truly believe you will love it✌️

column3:
>

 

Thanks to our latest patent-pending technologies and its super-strong 275nm UV-C light, the Smart Bottle will turn your water pure in just one minute. It also incorporates a powerful flashlight and a powerbank!
column8:
>

 

We travel with a multitude of electronic devices that always seem to run out of battery just when we need them. iUVi has a Power Bank that recharges all of your devices.
column10:
>

iUVì uses a powerful white LED that transforms the bottle into a flashlight, a lantern, or a signalling device. Up to 6 hours with a full charge.
column12:
>

Distress signal in case you are in danger and need help.
column14:
> 

Two ports with the latest generation IP-67 water-resistant USB Type-C. iUVi cannot be immersed in water, but it is resistant to water jets.

iUVi already has a lot of great features, and thanks to our engineers it is also extremely lightweight.
column19:
> 

iUVì is a smart and multi-functional bottle that purifies water in just 60 seconds.  It utilises ultraviolet (UVC) LED technology.
column20:
>

Over the years here at idea3Di, we often found ourselves far away from home, both for business and leisure. So we realised that we should create something to ""make life easier,"" providing personal assistance in many different situations:
column21:
>

Everyone needs to drink water, but whether we're travelling in the mountains or to a foreign country, it is sometimes difficult to find clean drinking water.
column23:
>

For our daily commutes, many of us come home at night on foot or by bike, traversing dark and isolated streets or busy cities, but without safely indicating our presence to passing traffic.
column27:
> 

iUVì works in a simple and intuitive way.

It doesn’t have keys or buttons: it works through a touch sensor. All you need to do is touch the lid and select the function you want.

Stand-by mode prevents the accidental switching on of the lid’s functions, and it guarantees a battery life up to 30 days.

With one touch the four LEDs show the charge level of the battery.

Three touches activate the flashlight and the four LEDs stay on. 

One more touch and the strobe light signaling device is activated, and the four LEDs blink on and off.

With a long touch when the flashlight is on, it will turn off and the lid returns to its standby mode.

 

A long touch initiates the ultraviolet LEDs and the four LEDs blink in sequence showing the sterilization time. Once the sterilization is finished, the lid returns to its stand-by mode.

While iUVì is charging, the battery level is indicated.

iUVì's Power Bank level is indicated in the same manner as when it is charging.

The printed circuit board is perfectly suited and developed for iUVì.

iUVì has a 3,7V - 2200mah Lipo-Battery. It is also equipped with an integrated circuit board that avoids overheating and overvoltage, extending the battery life.

The printed circuit board (PCB) has two of the latest generation USB type C ports, which are waterproof.
column28:
>

One port is for charging the inner battery and the other port is for charging external devices such as cellular phone, Gopro, Ipad, etc.
column29:
>

iUVì has an ultraviolet (UVC) LED system with a 275nm wavelength. This kind of LED has a lifetime of over 10000 working hours.

iUVì has a white LED with a capacity power of 3 Watt.  The water inside the bottle and the particular lens-shaped bottom of the bottle allow its beam of light to illuminate up to several meters. With a full charge, we can have up to 6 hours of illumination.
column30:
>

iUVì’s small dimensions make it practical for any location, including bags and purses. Despite its small size, though, iUVì holds ml.750 of water.
column32:
>

The water bottle is made of the Tritan. This kind of material is among the most resistant materials for refillable bottles and, most importantly, it is BPA-FREE.
column36:
>

The prototyping and testing phase lasted over a year. Everything started from the drafts on paper. Thanks to our modelling and 3D printing skills, in a few months and after lots of prototypes printed, we have reached the most compact form able to perfectly contain all the electronic components and best reflects our original idea of iUVì.

Along with the 3D modelling and creation of the prototypes, we have designed iUVì's circuit board from the ground up.

Once we receiving samples we conducted many tests of the electronic components.  We were able to immediately identify all the problems and adopt solutions to those problems. Now we have a perfect final sample ready for mass production.
column37:
>

To obtain a prototype as close as possible to a product manufactured with serial printing equipment, we used a Formlabs 3D printer with SLA technology. This technology allowed us to work with a resolution of 25-100 microns, to obtain 100% functional engineered prototypes.
column40:
>

By our estimate of production time, we expect to ship your product by February 2021.

Please note that any import costs or fees will be borne by the purchaser. Each country, according to its own laws, applies fees to imported goods.  We are not able to eliminate or control these costs.

Thanks to our experience gained with our projects ""Geizeer"" and ''Levia'', we'll help you solve any problems with shipment, delivery and / or importation costs as quickly as possible.

Moreover, we want to assure you that despite difficulties encountered during the first production, we have been able to fulfil all 8000 pledges in our last Kickstarter and IndieGoGo campaigns, almost fully respecting the delivery time specified by us.

As exemplified by our successful past projects, we will continue working to create a product which reflects your expectations, respecting the estimated delivery time and keeping you constantly updated about production developments.

If you would like to write an article about iUVì for a magazine or your personal Blog, click the image ""MEDIA KIT"" to download Press Release and images in high quality. If you need more information or you have any questions, please contact us through the form on our website  www.idea3di.com
column41:
>

Our Team is made up of young professionals who constantly want to grow  and improve.
column42:
>

Our company was born in 2016 when our project, Geizeer - eco-friendly ice cooling, was launched on the international market, finding immediate success.

We have currently completed 7 crowdfunding campaigns on Kickstarter, Indiegogo, and Campfire with thousands of satisfied supporters, new projects in progress for the 2020s, and a great desire to never stop.

Please, follow our social medial channels @idea3Di to be updated about iUVì developments and share our posts with your friends by using the #iUVì #idea3Di hashtags.
column44:
> 

Risks and challenges

Thanks to our previous successful projects on Kickstarter and Indiegogo , we are very familiar with every step involved, and have contracts with reliable logistics, supply chains and other partners. An accurate study first, and a very long and meticulous prototyping and testing phase later have allowed us to get the final prototype ready for production. We have received and tested all the components. As soon as we receive the funds, we’ll move on to testing and getting certified. We plan to conduct water sanitation tests at specialized laboratories against various types of bacteria. The UVC tech is already scientifically proven, so we know it works and that our products are compliant. Furthermore, the supplier of our UVC LEDs has already tested its capabilities and approved it as germicidal LED. In addition, we will move to receive CE and FCC certifications to allow worldwide distribution. We’ve decided to use high quality electronic components from Texas Instrument, Wurth Elektronik and STMicroelectronics. These components are already FCC and CE certified, ensuring unmatched performance and durability. Something can always go wrong, but we promise to do our best and solve any problem quickly. We have everything in place to fulfill our orders and ship completed products on time.

column1:
0,"

We have engineered a durable, convenient option for rotisserie chicken. Taking up minimal space, ROTO-Q 360 self-rotating, automating the entire rotisserie process so that all you need to do is set it up, turn it on, and let it do its job. ROTO-Q 360 does not need any electricity, gas, or batteries to run, so you never need to worry about keeping any tanks filled or charged either. This is the ultimate in rotisserie convenience – putting healthy deliciousness always within your reach. You can enjoy rotisserie all day long if you want to, and if you are thinking about trying out a new, healthy diet, it may just be the right way to do so!

With today's busy lifestyles, people are always looking for ways to cook healthy and delicious meals as efficiently and conveniently as possible. Well, look no further- The ROTO-Q 360 is the solution you’ve been looking for.
Fits into Your OVEN - ""Everyone owns an oven!""
Breathe new life into your cooking appliances and start producing 5-star quality, rotisserie-style fare in your very own home with the ROTO-Q 360.

The ROTO-Q 360 has been engineered to fit into any home. If you own an oven – and everyone owns an oven – you can put ROTO-Q 360 into your kitchen. This is a portable device that you can set up as you need it, even carting it off somewhere else for the night.

The ROTO-Q 360 has achieved perfection in cooking the rotisserie cousins while cutting down cooking time by as much as 30%. Since the ROTO-Q 360 brings down the cooking time, energy expenditure is also less which in turn saves your money. Plus, as the ROTO-Q 360 can do all the work, you don’t have to pay for other machines that may make your beautiful kitchen counter look crowded. Thus, you save money again.

Traditional methods of rotisserie cooking require industrial-style appliances with electric driven motors. These devices are much more expensive (ranging from $250-$600) also not portable and take up a large amount of space in your kitchen not to mention the loud noise created from the fan and motors making cooking experience unpleasant.

Furthermore, cooking chicken in a crockpot or tray by roasting or baking takes a long time to prep 5-6 hours, and sometimes leaves it uncooked or soggy from the bottom side. ROTO-Q 360 will never cause this problem because it cooks the food from all sides through its 360 degrees rotating mechanism. So there is no need for adjusting, stirring or flipping in the middle of cooking, and no more rubbing more butter or oil.  A rotisserie chicken is likely to be moisture than one that has simply been roasted in the oven.

Utilizing a gearbox that stores kinetic energy when the knob of the device is turned, the ROTO-Q 360 does not require any additional electricity or fuel to operate. The cooking time can be set by manually turning the knob a specified number of rotations, to achieve the optimal cooking time for a wide array of food items.

As the food turns, unwanted fats and grease drip down into the drip tray for healthier results, now you can make golden-brown tender-crisp chicken wings and french fries. meanwhile keeping the finger-licking taste and texture of deep-fried cooking with less fat than traditional methods.

Completely non-electric, ROTO-Q 360 could not be any easier to clean. The components pull apart for simple rinsing, cutting down drastically on the clean-up time after every meal. Much easier to clean than a traditional rotisserie machine.

ROTO-Q 360 is also easy to store – even if your storage space is exceptionally limited. The ROTO-Q 360 is a portable device that you can set up as needed, even for chefs on the go.  It folds down into a size that will fit into any kitchen drawer as well, and it will not take up counter space, unlike other bulky food machines.
ROTO-Q 360 is made with durable materials so that you can count on it for the long term.

The ROTO-Q 360 can be used for more than just chicken, It is also suitable for preparing fish, poultry, meat, vegetables, potatoes, fries, and much more. Using our optional attachments, you can theoretically cook an entire meal for yourself on one rotisserie machine.

Simply place ROTO-Q 360 on indoor/outdoor grill or fire pit as a heating source and let the magic of the ROTO-Q 360 rotisserie do the rest. While your food is being cooked, the ROTO-Q 360 will continuously rotate to ensure that your food is evenly cooked throughout. The result is tender, juicy, restaurant-quality, rotisserie-style cuisine.

ROTO-Q 360 self-rotates, automating the entire rotisserie process so that all you need to do is set it up, turn it on, and let it do its job. ROTO-Q 360 does not need any power, gas, or fuel to run making it the ultimate in rotisserie convenience – putting healthy delicious cuisine always within your reach.

The entire unit weighs in just 5.5 lbs (2.5 kg), the super-portable size ROTO-Q 360 could easily fit in any backpack making it a perfect companion for hikers, campers, outdoor enthusiasts to carry around.  The compact design of the ROTO-Q 360, makes it convenient to transport the device and attach it to Gas/Charcoal grills, fire pits, etc. for use while traveling, camping, or tailgating. BBQ’s no longer have to consist of just hamburgers and hot dogs, now you can add rotisserie-style chicken, beef, ribs and more to your family gatherings and game day menus.

The ROTO-Q 360 can cook various types of meat, fish and poultry (up to 5 lbs.) in 60 mins. or less. Additionally, by utilizing one of the many accessory attachments available for the device, you can further utilize your ROTO-Q 360 to cook other non-meat food items, such as potatoes, fries, and roasted vegetables (accessory attachments sold separately).

Invented by Susie Wen, the ROTO-Q 360 is the product of years of ingenuity and innovation. Wen, the creative and innovative mastermind behind popular household appliances like the Jack LaLanne’s Power Juicer, Montel Williams Health Master Elite, and Power Cooker, has helped design, develop, and manufacture machines and appliances in tens of millions units to consumers around the globe.

The Shark Wheels allow for easier maneuverability in the airports, longer durability, and they're definitely a head turner!
Tired of fumbling for your boarding pass or your laptop? Try this magnetic front pocket for easy access to all your travel essentials.
Charge your phone as you roll through the airport with the secured Charging Dock.
We also have Dual USB Ports for those phones that don't have Wireless Charging capabilities (1 USB and 1 USB-C port).

column2: TSA compliant with our easily removable and portable battery pack — you'll have no problems at the gate.
column8:
>

We have studied and learned from previous campaigns in order to introduce smart luggage you can actually travel with.
column9:
>

SkyValet offers the first luggage collection with a patent-pending wireless phone charging dock that secures your phone in place while you’re rolling through the airport.

It features the latest Qi technology and delivers up to 7.5W fast - charging speeds to phones.

If your phone doesn’t have the ability to wirelessly charge, we have available a razor-thin adaptor (which can be added on after the campaign) that you can place on the back of your phone (it will even fit with a case on) and then any phone will have the ability to use the Charging Dock.
column10:
>

What you need to know about Shark Wheels

column1: • First featured on Skateboards. As seen on SHARK TANK!
•  A unique sine wave curved shape allows for wheeling easier around obstructions.
• Uses a double spinner for either horizontal wheeling or tilting (pulling) for the smoothest wheeling.
•  Cool aesthetic factor that is inherent in its revolutionary design.

column4: >Over the development process, we've all worked closely to perfect the revolutionary wheel in order for it to be suitable for Luggage, after starting out in the Skateboard industry.
column6:
>

Many of us have more than one device to charge at the same time. So, we also have built-in dual USB ports which are secure and protected by the “snap shut” cover which protects them from damage while in transit. Both the USB ports and Wireless Charger are all controlled by the single power bank included with you SkyValet. 

SkyValet comes with a removable 10,000 mAh power bank that fits into a specially built-in pocket on the carry-on and overnight business case.
column7:
wmode=transparent"" width=""459"">

Our power bank is sleek, lightweight and removable so you can use it whenever and wherever even when you’re not traveling. As long as the battery pack is removable, which SkyValet’s is, you will have no problems at the airport since you can easily remove it whenever needed — no screws or hammers needed, trust us!

Power Bank is not included in the Medium and Large suitcases, as these must be checked.
column8:
>

Our Patent-Pending Magnetic Front Pocket revolutionizes how you travel on the go.
column11: >Instead of struggling to get your electronics or papers out of the
column19: >e (especially while passing through security), the
column21: > one-touch push button
column23: > will have the front pocket glide open instantly.
column24:
>

The SkyValet dual locking system for the Carry-On and Overnight Business Case and single locking system on the medium and large suitcases are operated through the free SkyValet app by Bluetooth. 

On the smaller sizes, the lock controls the main compartment and the magnetic front Pocket.
column25:
wmode=transparent"" width=""459"">

The lock is easy-to-use and secure with interlocking zippers that can only be unlocked by you with the SkyValet App. 

In addition, if for any reason, connectivity through your phone or other device is not available, a key is also provided for backup to open your case. 

The lock is TSA approved for security screening purposes.
column26:
>

Only on the Medium (25"") and Large (29"") Luggage 

Our sleek built-in scale is integrated into the carry handle on our Medium and Large size suitcases only. 

The weight of the suitcase is quickly and easily displayed at the push of a button. The weight can either be displayed in Pounds or Kilos.
column27:
>

With all of the added features and benefits that are included with the SkyValet, we’re happy to say that packing space has not been sacrificed one bit! The Carry-On can comfortably accommodate your needs for up to a week-long trip.    

Step-by-Step Demo of Packing the Carry-On &
column30:
>

Athalon has been making quality outdoor gear for over 40 years for the ski, outdoor, and luggage industries. It's also the worldwide licensee for Harley-Davidson luggage and backpacks. In addition, we are also the Samsonite licensee for golf travel products. 

With this experience in luggage and our dedicated team, you can be assured that your SkyValet will be delivered.

MODELS
column31:
>

Our 22” SkyValet meets all size regulations for carry-on for all major airlines.  A zipper-less, one-touch opening front pocket for your essentials and a convenient split packing design for your clothes. Wireless Charging, dual USB ports, Shark Wheels and more, make this a great carry-on.  This will be your new favorite travel bag.
column32:
>

Overnight Business Case - The workhorse of business professionals re-designed. All of the unique new features of our 22"" Carry-On are translated into our uniquely designed Business Case, allowing you to access your computer and papers in a snap. You will love the ease of use to access your files and essentials. In addition, pack enough clothes for a one to three-day trip.
column33:
>

The Medium Check-In allows you more packing space for your longer trips.  A split compartment packing style allows for organization and easy access to your stuff.  An added feature of a built-in scale is included in this model so that you can know your weight in advance to avoid any excess weight fees.
column34:
>

The Large Check-In is your kind of bag for longer trips or when you just like to pack a lot. It is also good for sharing to cut down on those checked bag fees. Also included is a built-in scale so that you can know your weight in advance to avoid any excess weight fees.
column36:
>

1) Choose the SkyValet Luggage system fit for your travel needs style by selecting the SkyValet model you’d like and then clicking “Get This Perk.""

2) On the next page, input your shipping address and payment information and submit payment. Shipping is free for the US, EU, Canada, Japan, and China. 

3) Welcome to traveling smarter and in style with SkyValet. We will send a survey at the end of the campaign confirming your pre-order, color selection and shipping address.

All of the SkyValet luggage products are built with:

column1: • Each shell is made of Bayer “Makrolon” Polycarbonate hard side material which is lightweight and extremely durable. This material is the gold standard for high-end luggage.
• The interior is constructed with 100% Polyester Material.

column2:
>

Losing your luggage is the last thing you want to experience after a long flight which is why you can add the SkyValet tracker to your luggage. The SkyValet GPS Tracker will be available as an add-on after the campaign.
column3:
wmode=transparent"" width=""612"">

Included with your SkyValet is a Proximity Distance Notification feature. Within the SkyValet App, you can set your preferred notification of anywhere between 15 feet and 50 feet (5 meters to 15 meters). 

When your bag is out of that selected range, you will be notified via the SkyValet App.

column1: •  Powered by Trackimo, the industry leader for luggage tracking, it’s state of the art technology will track your case through the app through 3G GPS-GSM technology.

• The optional tracker is available for $149 as an add-on at the end of the campaign, and will include 1 year of free unlimited tracking which works out of the box worldwide in all countries, with no roaming charges. Then, a $5.00 monthly charge will start in the second year and can be canceled at any time.

column6:
>

Andy Nitkin — The Head Maestro (Founder): A luggage industry veteran and leader for over 30 years. Andy has brought to market many new and innovative travel products while also leading us all. A pioneer in the luggage industry that brought some of the most famous fashion names to the world of luggage.

Robert Goldner — The Number Cruncher (Founder): Another luggage industry veteran for over 25 years. Bob’s experience is finance and tries his best to keep everyone level headed. A graduate of New York University Stern School of Business, he has never left the city life while his gray hair imparts wisdom to us all.

Eric Goldner — The Idea Guy (Founder): A recent graduate of the Kelley School of Business specializing in Innovation and Entrepreneurship. His forward thinking of ideas helped get this all started. Eric has co-ordinated many of the different aspects of the development and campaign to bring it all together.

Zack Fleishman — The Wheel Guy: Zack is the COO of Shark Wheel and has been instrumental in developing many of the innovative SkyValet features. Before running the day to day operations of Shark Wheel (who appeared on Shark Tank season 6), Zack was traveling the world on the professional tennis tour. Don’t mess with Zack on the court as he was ranked in the top 150 worldwide. But, he still can’t roll as fast as a Shark Wheel.

Francis Ma — Tech Collaborator: Francis has designed our lock and our integrated wireless charger. He is a longtime manufacturer of sophisticated components to various products. His capability to bring our ideas and concepts from drawings to prototype has made this all possible.

Allen Lai — Factory Par Excellence: Allen is our manufacturer and is the second generation owner of this 35-year-old factory. The factory produces luggage for some very well known international brands. He has been personally involved in bringing this product from idea and concept to final product. Not to mention, that he works 24/7!

Andy — Electronics and App Developer: Our designer for our electronic lock and App has been in the electronics industry for over 10 years. He has developed apps for some of the major lock companies worldwide.

Sarah Kim — Designer: Sarah is the name behind all of our great SkyValet graphics. She is relentless in her pursuit of perfection and passion for all that she does.

The Others — Many other talented techies, and marketing people and luggage heads are a part of the great team at SkyValet that are working behind the scenes to develop our “Smarter Way To Travel.”

WE SHIP FROM OUR MULTIPLE WAREHOUSES (North America, EU, Asia an AU)
 
 
 

 

 

 

Gone are the days of carrying bulky towels!

And, gone are the days of NO-WIPE-JUST-PAT  Quick Drying Towels that feel unnatural to the skin.

Travoost Super Portable Towel 2.0 is a whole new category of towel which is pocket-sized, quick-drying and skin-friendly.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

I was already facing problems with my cotton towel when I decided to take the much popular Quick Drying Travel Towel along with me.

I took the towel to the beaches of Spain, to the water and wine festivals, La Tomatina festival and the parties at Ibiza. However, the experience at a campsite near Valencia was something truly challenging.

 

 

 

 

So what if they feel UNNATURAL and UNCOMFORTABLE to the skin? 

Or, have a SUEDE, RUBBERY feel? 

Or, SCRATCHY AND IRRITATING?

Many first-time users complain that these towels just slip too much on the wet skin and take longer to dry the body.

What is the point of a towel that doesn’t feel comfortable?

 

 

 

 

 

Super Portable Towel 1.0 was designed after hours of research, many deliberations and discussions with manufacturers, endless material testing, and a lot of trial and error.

The towel experience in Spain kept bringing the team back to the core issues we were trying to solve. And, the result was a towel that’s way more efficient, comfortable and durable than anything currently existing in the market.

 

 

 

 

While we thought of going the crowdfunding road with SPT 1.0, we didn’t want to rush with a product that’s even one step away from perfect. We wanted to present a product that had been already tested on-ground.

Our towels were tried and tested by different travellers in various outdoor locations. 

Some of them thought the size of the towel needed to be BIGGER 

Some wanted a THICKER towel

And, others needed more COLOR OPTIONS

We humbly accepted the feedback and incorporated it in our towel.

We call it, Super Portable Towel 2.0
column3:
showinfo=0"">

 

 

 

 

No More Smelly Towels  - Silver prevents the growth of odor-causing bacteria and fungi at the source, permanently. The longer a towel stays wet the more vulnerable it becomes to that musty  smell (which means bacteria).

","WE SHIP WITHIN 48 HOURS!! WE SHIP FROM OUR MULTIPLE WAREHOUSES (North America, EU, Asia an AU)      Gone are the days of carrying bulky towels!And, gone are the days of NO-WIPE-JUST-PAT  Quick Drying Towels that feel unnatural to the skin.Travoost Super Portable Towel 2.0 is a whole new category of towel which is pocket-sized, quick-drying and skin-friendly.         I was already facing problems with my cotton towel when I decided to take the much popular Quick Drying Travel Towel along with me.I took the towel to the beaches of Spain, to the water and wine festivals, La Tomatina festival and the parties at Ibiza. However, the experience at a campsite near Valencia was something truly challenging.    So what if they feel UNNATURAL and UNCOMFORTABLE to the skin? Or, have a SUEDE, RUBBERY feel? Or, SCRATCHY AND IRRITATING?Many first-time users complain that these towels just slip too much on the wet skin and take longer to dry the body.What is the point of a towel that doesn’t feel comfortable?     Super Portable Towel 1.0 was designed after hours of research, many deliberations and discussions with manufacturers, endless material testing, and a lot of trial and error.The towel experience in Spain kept bringing the team back to the core issues we were trying to solve. And, the result was a towel that’s way more efficient, comfortable and durable than anything currently existing in the market.    While we thought of going the crowdfunding road with SPT 1.0, we didn’t want to rush with a product that’s even one step away from perfect. Our 11th Rodeo

Taskin is a young startup based in San Francisco that loves travel and stylish gear. This is our 11th campaign here on Indiegogo. We have shipped thousands of products to backers in over 110 countries.

We are thrilled to introduce you to our latest creations.

 

 

Jumble-Free Jetting is Here

Road warriors rejoice: Stash V2 is here. Based on feedback from our original Stash backers and customer we have designed the ultimate upscale electronics bag that helps you keep all those dongles, drives, cables and connectors under control. Stash is stylish, compact and designed to perfectly fit all those small items that keep our personal and work life ticking. 

Below are some of Stash's cool and innovative features:

Stay-Open Design

Stash's unique design is meant to optimize storage and accessibility. One of its key features is the rigid stay-vertical mid section. Both sides provide options to store items of various shapes and sizes. The design also makes it easy to find what you need when you need it without having to fumble around. 

A Loop For All Sizes

How does Stash securely fit all these odd shapes and sizes? Stash features a unique adjustable storage system that allows you to create custom loops for all your multi-sized gadgets. Everything will have a place that fits so your gear doesn't slash around inside your bag.

Built-in Pencil Tray

Ball-point pens, ink pens, sketch pens, permeant markers, marker pens, stylus we all carry some of these with us and they seemed to be programmed to get lost at the worst times. We have you covered, Stash's magnetic shelves is the perfect place to store them. Its flexible mesh will expand to hold your growing collection. It is designed to be easy to see into and find what you are looking for.

Flexi-Pockets For All The Odd Sizes

One needs a mouse when one needs a mouse.. a dedicated pocket to fit one of those and another of similar size that can fit an Apple power adapter or something similarly sized. 

Large Flat Power Banks/Portable Drives Have a Place Too

Carry around a batter pack for those just-in-case situations? Or a portable hard drive? Stash's large flat pockets are perfect for those.  The flat pocket completely collapses when not in use so you don't waste that space.

Top-notch Quality

Specifications

 

 

 

 

A Dopp-Kit but better

We are big fans the easy accessibility of traditional dopp-kit design. One main zipper to access everything inside the bag makes it very easy to pack and get into. What we didn't like so much so much is the lack organization and visibility. The one big section means all your toiletries and accessories are all jumbled up. The lack of visibility can make the problem even harder. So we design the Doppler.. we are sure Charles Doppelt (inventor of the original Dopp-kit, would approve).

Stay-Open Design

The two halves of the Doppler opens 180 degrees, the magnets under each can hold it open flat so you can see and access everything inside. 

Organization Without Compromise

Multiple pockets in a variety of shapes help you well organize everything for small tweezers to full sized toothpaste. Everything has its place. When open, every one of those pockets are visible and easily accessible. So you get all of the organization without any of the hassle.

Look Ma.. NO Zippers

The Doppler features a lot of pockets to help you organize and keep your shaver away from your toothbrush. And is the really cool bit, Doppler's unique design ensures that everything stays inside its pockets when closed, so even without any zippers, you will find your stuff exactly where you put it.

Toothbrush Pocket

The middle, ## cms long, toothbrush pocket serve two purpose. The inside of the pocket is lined with waterproof material making it easy to wipe down and keep dry. The pocket can also be used to hold your toothbrush in an upright position to allow it to dry between uses.

4 Mid-sided Pockets

Store your mid sized toiletries, adapters etc. in one of 4 midsized pockets (# cms X # cms).  

6 Small Pockets For Everything Else

6 small pockets to fit all your small essentials be it eye drops, lip balms, clippers, floss and so on, now you have place for everything.

2 Large/Long Pockets

These large pockets on both sides can easily fit your shaver or even a large sized tube of toothpaste. What you need/choose to carry is up to you, Doppler is there to fit it.

External Pockets

The Doppler also features an external discrete pockets for those things you don't really want out in the open, lets say your chewing gums
column2:
)

Waterproof Materials 

Mess/accidents can happen, but it doesn't need to spread to consume your whole backpack/carry-on. Doppler is constructed using water resistant fabric and zippers to help contain any spills.

Specifications

Timeline

Addons

Below are some of our other awesome gear that you can add to your pledge.

Taskin Xplorer/ONE Backpack

Two best in class backpacks for all your travel needs.

column6: title=""Taskin Xplorer Wheeled Backpack + Taskin ONE Gen 2"">

column1:
Air Duo - Dual Sided Packing Cubes

On one side: An air-breathable 100% see-through section to keep fresh clothes wrinkle-free. On the other: An odor and water-resistant pouch to keep dirty laundry sealed up tight. Both sides: Packing perfection.

I’ve spent most of my adult life saving up every dollar I could possibly find so that I could travel the world -  I love the outdoors. While sitting on a beach in Bali (Indonesia), I grew fed up with hiding my valuables in the sand every time I wanted to get in the water.

 

My wallet would get full of sand, my cards would get scratched, notes would get wet and there were even times I forgot where my hiding spot was.

 

So I decided to do something about it.

 

Bringing together cutting-edge waterproof technology and sustainable materials in an ultra-secure - yet sleek - design, I’m excited to introduce: Submerge - The Adventure Wallet &
column2:
Card Holder.

 

The Perfect Companion For Every Adventure

 

 

No matter what your passion, no matter how extreme your adventure, Submerge gives you complete peace of mind.

 

A compact card holder for your cash, cards and keys, coupled with a sleek waterproof wallet ensures complete security and protection for your valuables, strapped securely on your arm at all times, no matter what.

 

Never Leave Your Valuables Behind Ever Again

 

Traditional wallets aren’t designed to be carried in the ocean or exposed to the elements - Submerge is.

 

Whether you’re out in the water or up a mountain peak, there are some things that just can’t be left behind.

 

Forget about leaving your car keys, house keys, credit cards or cash lying about at risk of theft or loss…

 

Take them with you and get on with what you love doing.

 

Whatever you do, wherever you go, Submerge will be right there with you.

 

 

The Submerge Wallet

column1: • Multiple ways to safely secure to your body and clothing, suitable for any activity. Waist strap attachment also available as a product Add On.
• Full detachable and adjustable strap - so that the wallet can be wearable or can fit snug in your pocket
• Can be attached to a carabiner to cling to your trousers - therefore avoiding pickpockets on your travels
• Fully secure strap that will not fall off - the velcro that we’ve used is secured twice
• It can be submerged up to a depth of 3m. It can be fully submerged underwater.
Submerge Card Holder
• Holds up to 10 cards, with plenty of space for cash and keys
• Hidden pockets for those items that don’t need to be on show
• Can be used on it’s own as an all-round wallet solution (no need to keep swapping cards around!)
• As minimalist as viably possible (we know how annoying it is to have a clunky leather wallet)
• Use with the Submerge Wallet or on its own.
• Made from high quality elastic and Vegan-approved faux suede, the Submerge card holder holds up to 10 cards across three divided sections, with two hidden pockets for notes, coins and keys.
• Lightweight, sleek, and small enough to fit inside any pocket. It is as small as we could have possibly made it - it is the size of a credit card.

Unparalleled Design, Ready For The Elements

 

 

WALLET

 

A perfect companion for any outdoor activity.

 

Our pocket-less pouch is built of TPU with a YKK airtight waterproof zipper, ensuring that your valuables stay dry at all times.

 

Run in the rain, swim in the ocean, climb up a mountain. Whatever your activity of choice, just strap your wallet to your arm and you’re good to go.

 

Even if you’re at a waterpark with the kids and don’t want to stop off in the locker rooms every 20 minutes to buy them an ice cream, submerge is for you!

 

Completely submersible - up to a depth of 3m

 

Use a carabiner to attach your Submerge Wallet to your pants or equipment

 

Product Add-Ons

 

Once you've selected your reward above, you will have the option to add on any of the following add-ons at a special Kickstarter price. Available exclusively to backers only.

 

Submerge Logo Tote Bag

Perfect for the beach or a day by the river. 

 

Submerge Waist Strap

Similar to the arm band, but bigger...  We have designed a strap for our Waterproof Wallet that you can attach around your waist or leg.

 

 

2 x Carabiner

Perfect for attaching your Submerge Wallet to your belt buckle or climbing/camping gear.

 

 

SOS Floating Whistle

Made to attach to your wallet and attract the attention of others on your adventures.

 

 

Credit Card Sized RFID Blocker

We will provide two cards, one for either side of your Submerge Cardholder. The RFID Blocking Card is designed to protect your credit cards from e-pickpocket thieves using handheld RFID scanners. The card is composed of a circuit board that disrupts the scanner from reading the RFID signals.

 

'

 

Environmental Commitments

 

It’s not often you see a wallet designed with the environment in mind...

 

Every part of Submerge is 100% degradable and recyclable with zero compromise made on  reliability and durability.

 

Sustainable materials

The waterproof wallet is made from TPU, a bridge between rubber and plastics, which is degradable and non-toxic.

 

The card holder is made from high quality elastic and Vegan-approved faux suede.

 

Both products are vegan: a true alternative to traditional leather wallets.

 

(Plus, traditional leather wallets are bulky and wear away quickly. The Submerge wallet is truly durable.)

 

 

Hi - I’m Ronan...

I created Submerge to solve a very real problem that we all face:

Keeping our valuables safe while submerging ourselves in activities!

 

Thank YOU for putting your trust in us, it’s supporters like you who will help make Submerge the no.1 choice for adventurers when it comes to peace of mind.

 

Ronan Finnegan, Founder @ Submerge

 

I've been turning ideas into businesses since leaving school. Watch my TEDx talk to learn a little bit more about my journey. I've built 5 businesses so far and with your help, I'm sure we can build Submerge into a successful brand!
column5:
utm_campaign=partner"" rel=""noopener nofollow"">

 

Shipping Information

 

Submerge ships worldwide.

The shipping rate to your country will be indicated in the check-out menu when making a pledge for this campaign. Our wallets are thin and lightweight, as a result, shipping will not be expensive.

Shipping rates change frequently however we expect that we can fulfil all orders with an estimate of £5 (UK), £10 (Worldwide).

You will receive a fair shipping price, we promise.

 

If you purchase more than one Submerge item, we will dispatch your entire order in the same box/envelope.

 

* Prices do not include taxes and VAT. That will be subject to the laws and regulations of each individual country.

** We use customs friendly shipping and we ship worldwide.

 

We will collate all InDemand orders at the end of the campaign.

 

Returns

 

We're confident that you will love our product, but if for any reason you don't, let us know and can talk it through...

 

In the event that you receive a faulty item, you are welcome to contact us at team@submergewallets.com
column6:
body=Hi%2C"" rel=""noopener nofollow"">

 

Submerge: Behind The Scenes

Early prototypes

Early concepts, design exploration...

First gen pre-production run...

Ronan (Founder) - Product Testing (Bristol, United Kingdom)

 Dedfish Co.’s knife and cutting board/case helps you carry less and prepare meals more easily while saving both precious space and time! The chef-grade quality knives and full-size cutting board allow you to prepare meals without having to worry about carrying excess kitchen equipment with you. And the best part? We’ve kept everything sustainable! From the cutting board and case material to the wooden handles of the knife – everything is ethically sourced. 

 

 

Reinvent outdoor cooking or simply maximize existing kitchen space with the Ultimate Dedfish knife/cutting board. Easily prepare fresh food with the tools you carry with you wherever you go.

 

Think about it…When was the last time you took an actual cutting board outdoors and prepared your meal with ease? For far too long, we had to pack our kitchen knives with cardboard and duct-taped sheaths wrapped in sweatshirts, which we then stuffed into our gear bag. And that's why we created a cutting board that transforms into a case, so you can focus more on the meal prep and less on the tools while enjoying the outdoors.

 

We needed a way to safely store our knives while carrying them with us wherever we went. With that goal in mind we developed this bamboo cutting board with a minimalist design packing maximum functionality to transport premium chef knives like never before. The best thing about this board is that it’s extremely durable, scratch-resistant, and lightweight. And that’s not all! This board folds in half and locks in place featuring an ultra-strong magnetic closing design. Oh, and guess what? Since it’s super compact it makes for a great organizer that saves space in the kitchen and makes outdoor cooking easier and more accessible.

 Knives that Cut Through Fruits, Vegetables, and Meat Like Butter Thanks to our highest quality Japanese Damascus &
column2:
German Steel blades.

 

Our knives offer amazing functionality and design so you get to slice through your food without any force. How? We source the highest quality steels and got help from the best knife smiths to ensure exceptional strength, durability, and stain resistance. With these knives, you get beauty and sophistication packed in one!

We started Dedfish Co. 4 years ago with the only goal of equipping outdoor adventurers and meal preppers with the highest quality products at an affordable price.

 

 

 

 

 

Tested In The Outdoors and Vacation Destinations Across the Globe!

For the past few years, we've taken the Dedfish set with us on the road, camping, and even to our Airbnb vacation destinations across the globe. We love to eat, we love to cook, and finding ourselves stuck with dull knives was less than ideal! We started a knife company, but carrying a knife across the globe is not easy! That is why we came up with the ultimate carry case/cutting board.

Meal prep made easier - The world's most versatile cooking bundle has the most unique story!

Dedfish came into being when two outdoor lovers, Blake &
column3:
Mara, started venturing on adventures one after the other. Like most adventurers they wanted to carry the least possible cooking equipment with them. Blake combined his passion for knives with Mara’s love of cooking and they ended up creating Dedfish Co after 4 years of iterative design and sampling.

Since it’s super compact it makes for a great organizer that saves space in the kitchen and makes outdoor cooking easier and more accessible. Knives that Cut Through Fruits, Vegetables, and Meat Like Butter Thanks to our highest quality Japanese Damascus & German Steel blades. Our knives offer amazing functionality and design so you get to slice through your food without any force. How? We source the highest quality steels and got help from the best knife smiths to ensure exceptional strength, durability, and stain resistance. With these knives, you get beauty and sophistication packed in one!We started Dedfish Co. 4 years ago with the only goal of equipping outdoor adventurers and meal preppers with the highest quality products at an affordable price.     Tested In The Outdoors and Vacation Destinations Across the Globe!For the past few years, we've taken the Dedfish set with us on the road, camping, and even to our Airbnb vacation destinations across the globe. We love to eat, we love to cook, and finding ourselves stuck with dull knives was less than ideal! We started a knife company, but carrying a knife across the globe is not easy! That is why we came up with the ultimate carry case/cutting board.Meal prep made easier - The world's most versatile cooking bundle has the most unique story!Dedfish came into being when two outdoor lovers, Blake & Mara, started venturing on adventures one after the other. Like most adventurers they wanted to carry the least possible cooking equipment with them. Blake combined his passion for knives with Mara’s love of cooking and they ended up creating Dedfish Co after 4 years of iterative design and sampling.",30.0,0,"1 Campaign

column2: Berlin and their opinions on Turn Signals were split: many requested the feature while many others assured they wouldn’t use it.

column1: Since we don’t want half of you guys stuck with (and paying for) an accessory you don’t want, we decided to make it an Add-on and as a bonus, make the helmet itself more affordable.

column1: ","Helmets aren’t exactly stylish, we get it - add some lights and it only gets worse.

So we set out to design an urban helmet that is safe, comfortable & ventilated but also sleek & stylish. Every inch of this thing was thought out like a proper product, including the lights: they were integrated in a way that they’re truly part of the helmet.
Cycling accidents on the street are often caused by lack of visibility and unclear communication: drivers and other riders not seeing you well enough or not knowing what you’re going to do next.
FARO has powerful front & rear lights to ensure you get noticed.
This is what we call 'Active Safety': a helmet that works for you all the time (not just if/when you crash) by making you visible and helping avoiding accidents in the first place.

And what about cycling lights? Well, they help, for sure! But 80% of riders who use cycling lights still don’t feel safe. Why? Because they’re small and sit quite low. On top of that, they are easily lost, forgotten or even stolen!  FARO's lights sit at eye level and are much larger & more visible.

Every FARO was designed up to International Certification standards. To take it up a notch, we partnered up with MIPS - a Swedish company at the forefront on helmet safety - to take FARO to the next level in terms of safety.
Tear-proof, Water-proof fabric that looks & feels amazing. But wait! It’s hiding something...

So how do you put lights on a helmet without making it look like sci-fi? You cover them up with a classy fabric liner. During the day you rock that fabric that looks & feels amazing. At night...the magic happens.
Take FARO from Visibility to Visibility + Communication: let drivers and other riders know what you're up to!

Cycling is very different for everyone. The cycling infrastructure in your city, how experienced of a rider you are, your equipment...it all comes into play. We talked to over 300 riders from London, Copenhagen, L.A, Hong Kong & Berlin and their opinions on Turn Signals were split: many requested the feature while many others assured they wouldn’t use it.
Since we don’t want half of you guys stuck with (and paying for) an accessory you don’t want, we decided to make it an Add-on and as a bonus, make the helmet itself more affordable.
The FARO App allows detailed customization of FARO's light features and sensors.
From your office outfit, to casual everyday clothes to a night out with friends, FARO will work with your outfit, not against.
The electronics are fully sealed and the fabric - in case you were wondering - is the same fabric used on bluetooth speakers you can thrown in the pool.
*Based on internal testing. Final Certifications will happen after tooling.
Our 3 sizes can accommodate a wide range of heads and make sure everyone gets a snug, comfortable fit. Remember, the fitting system will get you that final 5% to reach perfect fit.
Here's a quick & dirty overview of our first prototype back in 2020.
You should see the real thing today.
UNIT 1 is an American Company built by a team of designers, engineers & entrepreneurs committed to creating amazing products that make an impact.
We’ve designed, developed, manufactured & shipped thousands of products to backers in 22 countries.

This is not our first rodeo - we have a long standing relationship with our (very) experienced manufacturing & logistics partners and the 1st production Batch of FARO is coming out amazingly well.",45.0,3,"3 Campaigns
• Ditch the high cost of hotels - stay in a modern shipping container home at an affordable price.
• Easily access the local Blue Ridge Mountain trail heads, swimming holes, and downtown Asheville NC charm.
• Our goal is to raise $70,000 to complete the full build of both shipping container homes.
• Reserve your stay today - reservations will be made available for booking through Airbnb once we complete the build in Summer 2018.
• Refer to our perks chart for a list of packages - the more nights you reserve, the more you save!
• Spread the stays you reserve over time - no need to spend them all at once!
• Join the growing Tiny Home Community by reserving your next stay with SHIP'D!
• Support Asheville NC, a city steeped in culture, art and tradition.
• Give Mother Nature a break and commit to a sustainable housing cause - SHIP'D uses 100% recycled shipping containers.
• Traditional banks will not finance this project because of the unique nature of a shipping container home.
• Your contributions will help us scale SHIP'D across the country.
• Regardless of if we hit our goal, your reservation is guaranteed, no exceptions! Completion is expected, with available booking dates, in the Summer 2018.
• Even if you don't contribute, please help us like and share this campaign with the whole world!

Sto Mahoney, Co-Founder - Sto was raised in Chicago, IL before exploring the world when his family moved overseas. Eventually, he returned to the United States and graduated from Lehigh University, where he received B.S. degrees in Finance and Industrial Engineering. Sto enjoys the lake, yoga, basketball and a compelling book.

Evan York, Co-Founder - Evan was raised in Seattle, WA before eventually relocating to Charlotte, NC to pursue a career as a motorsport athlete and an entrepreneur. He later graduated with a B.S. in Systems Engineering and Engineering Management at UNC Charlotte, and works in an industry that thrives on an international supply chain using - you guessed it - shipping containers. Evan likes driving cars fast (at racetracks), traveling, fitness and a good bourbon.

Thanks for Cruisn Canada and Packing Less's review for EVO SHAVER:

column2:
>

An electric shaver is an essential men’s grooming item. However, the size of traditional electric shaver is big and not easy to carry. Some electric shavers even require to be charged with a special battery charger before continues using. Of course, you can use a razor instead when you travel but it often takes longer to shave with a manual razor. As you will have to apply grooming products such as shave cream and aftershave solution which is a waste of time, and you can only use a razor in the bathroom.
column3:
>

If there is a shaver that can be small enough, then you can clean up your beard anytime, anywhere to maintain your best image and look good all the time.
column4:
>

The blade of EVO SHAVER is composed of stainless steel outer mesh blade net and inner blade. The mesh thickness of common shavers is more than 0.15 mm, and for EVO SHAVER is only 0.07 mm. Generally speaking, the thinner the blade net the cleaner it can shave. EVO SHAVER provides a closer and more comfortable safe shave. Also with the 6000 RPM motor speed which is 1.5 times that of common electric shavers, EVO SHAVER can provides a speedy and smooth cut. Help to achieve the cleanest shave and more effective hair removal.

column2: >EVO SHAVER is only the size of an egg and you can easily put it wherever you want, such as in the car, your backpack or even in the pocket on your jeans or pants. You can  prepare a few more EVO SHAVER for spare use and put them wherever you may need them. Shave at any time you want!

>EVO SHAVER will continuously run for 35 mins on one single full charge. Each shave only takes about 1.5-2 mins, meeting your need of shave for at least 20 times which is ideally for long-term travel.
>EVO SHAVER has a Type-C USB port that you can charge it with a wall charger, power bank or even your laptop through a USB cable. So you don't have to worry about the battery dying wherever you go.

>Many devices may stop working when charging with the cable plugged. This will never happen to EVO SHAVER. Perhaps one morning when you are about to shave but you find that your EVO SHAVER battery is running down. No worries, as long as you plug in the Type-C charging cable, you can use EVO SHAVER immediately even while it is being charged.

>It is interesting to shave with EVO SHAVER as you can hear a beautiful sound while shaving. With exclusive technology, you can tell if you are getting a perfect clean shave on your face by the sound. Now you can shave anywhere, anytime, even without a mirror around. Don’t believe? Click on the video below to hear:

>Hold the power button for 3 seconds to enter the Travel Lock Mode, which can prevent the EVO SHAVER from accidentally powering on and makes it perfectly safe in your bag or pocket. You can simply hold power button for 3 more seconds to quit the Safe Lock Mode. With this feature, you will never worry about it starts by itself in your bag or luggage.

>There is virtually no clearance between the blade and the steel mesh. Apart from getting a cleaner shave, it’ll also repeatedly grind between the blade and the mesh blade net to keep sharpening the blade.

>EVO SHAVER is easy to clean, how easy will it be? Just twist to remove the blade mesh and wash it under the tap, or use the brush included in the package to clean those tiny stubble stuck in the shaver blade. Easy-Peasy!

column1: Take EVO SHAVER anywhere with FREE BAG provided in the box

column2: >EVO Series provides the smart solutions to common travel problems. Everyone needs travel. When you leave home and travel, you may have to face a lot of inconvenience. How to deal with them? How to make your travel easier and more comfortable? All these are what we think about.

>EVO SHAVER is the 2nd product of the EVO Series. Our first product was the EVO Charger, a gadget to solve the power problems while travel aboard. We successfully raised more than $165K on Indiegogo 1.5 years ago and all the perks were delivered to 4637 backers. We did our promise. And now, we start our second project — the EVO SHAVER — which is designed to meet Men’s shaving requirement while travel and for daily use. We greatly appreciate the support from our previous backers and give you our sincerest thanks for backing us. We hope you will continue to support us and help us achieve the goal again this time. Once again, thank you for supporting our dreams and being so amazing!
>Thanks for your support to EVO SHAVER. We’ve already achieved $1000 in just 15mins!!! It is amazing!!!

>To show our appreciation, we have developed a REFERRAL PROGRAM. We are grateful for your valuable sharing and recommendation as they will be super helpful for the success of our campaign. We will offer you: A FREE Razor Head if you share our link on your social media, such as Facebook, Twitter, then post the link of your sharing post in our comment section.
>You can directly click and copy the link, please don’t miss your privacy ID, the last several digits:
>2. Post the link on your social media with captions, like:

>3. After you share the link on social media, please copy the link of your sharing post and paste it on our comments box. Then, we will know you have joined our REFERRAL PROGRAM. We will do record and add on the Razor Head into your package.
>So are you ready? Quickly share the campaign and get the FREE gifts today! Go, go, go.
