>DECEMBER BATCH IS SHIPPING. PRE-ORDERS NOW OPEN ON BIKTRIX.COM

We're super excited to let you know that super early bird eBikes that had dates promised for December 2020 are shipping out. We're now processing pre-orders dated March 2021, and April 2021 is now open. Just click the above link. Some pictures:

The warranty period varies per product and begins on the date of delivery:

column1:
During the warranty period, Biktrix guarantees products or parts of a product are free from defects in material or workmanship, under normal use and maintenance.

Biktrix will either repair the product at no charge, provide a new product, or refurbish replacement parts. Some repairs will be serviced locally to the user and the customer will be reimbursed their local bike shop fees.

This limited warranty does not cover any problems caused by: conditions, malfunctions or damage not resulting from defect(s) in material or workmanship. Parts and features not mentioned in the specs list are not covered under warranty.

Our new design

At Polar metals, we've always strived to bring you the best quality titanium products at the best price. Introdocuing our latest product: an ultralight and portable tactical pen. Only 6.5 grams (less than 1/4 ounce)!

Engineered from a solid piece of Ti6Al4V grade 5 aerospace Titanium, it is shockingly light, durable, and lasts forever!

An innovative hollowed-out design for an ultralight build. Only 6.4 grams!

Screw these two pieces together, you will get a pen that's a normal-sized 106mm (4.17 inches) long.

Perfect size for writing. Super convenient!

When stored, it becomes ultra-portable. You will have a pen at hand no matter where you go.

Simple but functional. Full titanium construction ensures this pen will outlast you! We will offer the refills on our website after the campaign ends and you can get them whenever you need them at a reasonable price.

The top part is made of premium tungsten steel, designed for self-defense/glass breaking. 

A very effective tool for any emergency!

It matches our Titanium Carabiner 2.0 perfectly. You can keep on your keyring.

Each Titanium Pen comes with a 27"" steel chain for free. Keep it on your person for instant use.

It is also a very cool and unique necklace pendant, matching any modern style.

Get yours and help us bring our ultralight titanium pen to life!

The name of this innovative rear-view mirror is Corky / MTB . Designed by a winner of the Red Dot award, one of the three major design awards in the world, this rear-view mirror is optimized for cycling and can be mounted on a drop bar. A 360-degree angle control mirror allows you to see up to 100 meters behind you. If you close the lid, you can protect the rear-view mirror. The wing of the CORKY / MTB body is designed to minimize the rear-view mirror's air resistance so as to interfere as little as possible with riding.  Riders!! Give it a try!!

Corky is a rear-view mirror for cycling mounted on the drop bar. As the mirror can be opened and closed, riders can use it as an end cap by closing the mirror when it is not in use. It has a 360-degree angle control function which allows riders to be able to notice an approaching car or bike from up to 100m behind you.
•Bright Mirror ( 30Фmirror, range of view: cars from 100m, bikes from 20m)
•Can be mounted on all drop bars
•Color: Red, White, Neon Green, Gray, Sky Blue

column2: > Simply close the lid to keep the mirrors safe and sound
>Open the cap to expose the mirrors

column1: 360 degrees of rotation so you can view everything around you
Designed for cyclists, by cyclists. Made in South Korea.

It is the rear-view mirror for MTB or Flat bar. A rear view mirror attached to both ends of the handle allows the rear view to be secured by using a folding mirror. The mirror is folded into the body and can be opened. When the mirror is folded, it can be used as a bar grip.
•Bright Mirror (Mirror Size 57mm*38mm range of view: cars from 100m, bikes from 20m)
•Can be mounted on all drop bars
•Component: Rear-view mirror X 2, six angles wrench X 2
Choose between the road bike or mountain bike version.
The number of people who die in a bicycle accident every year is about 500,000. 60% of bicycle accidents are in rear-side accidents. This is why bike riders need a rear-view mirror. However,
Many riders do not mount rear-view mirrors because of the cumbersome design of conventional rear-view mirrors designed to prevent accidents.
We have designed the safest and minimalist rear-view mirror in the world to solve these problems.
We use premium quality materials and thus are able to offer a warranty. In the rare case of a faulty product, we will replace this at no extra expense. 100% money-back guarantee – Again, no risk.
Based in Paris - France / Manufactured in South Korea
Check your mailbox!! your rear view mirror is probably there

We’ve made a FAQ section below. We’ll be adding new FAQs as we go along, and we’ll be keeping you up to date with Kickstarter Updates, messages, and via the Comment wall. And please, feel free to reach out to us!
Nous remercions chaleureusement la communauté francophone pour son soutien. Nous sommes une société française, n'hésitez pas à nous contacter en français si vous avez des questions sur notre produit.

Now we are ready for manufacturing and our most challenging barrier concerns project funding. We now required YOUR financial SUPPORT for the final tooling costs and the first batch of Rear-view mirrors we'll be yours.

We are confident that we overcame the most significant challenges and our determination for the project's success is stronger than ever. We will be fully transparent and will keep our backers up to date with any development.
A: Worldwide shipment will be available via air transport. Shipping charges may vary depending on destination. You can check the fee on the shipping cost chart.

A: Shipments will start in Jun 2018. Shipments will be sent in the order listed. We will provide you with the shipping notification and tracking code through your email address immediately after shipment.
A: For CORKY Yes. You can choose the color you want. For the MTB mirror, we will only have the black color.
Q: Is it a set of two pieces?
A: Yes. CORKY and the MTB  is supplied in a set of two pieces for both end caps.
Q: Can I order different colors for one set?
A: No. CORKY is supplied as a set of two pieces of the same color, and for the MTB mirror there's only black color
Q: Is it possible to order personal colors or engraved products?
A: No. CORKY is mass-produced. Personal customization may be available in the future. but there are no plans to make it available for now.
Q: Can CORKY and the MTB mirrors be used for all types of bikes?
A: CORKY is optimized for all type of road bikes. And the MTB is optimized for all MTB handlebars
Q: Can use any CORKY road on any side of the handlebar?
A: Yes, you can install any corky mirror on any side of your handlebar.

A: If you choose the “Distributor” option, you will receive 100 sets. 50 sets of CORKYs and 50 sets of the MTB mirror. You can become a CORKY distributor in your purchase area, enjoying a 55% discount from regular retail prices.

B: If you choose the “Wholesaler” option, you will receive 1000pcs you can choose between the sets of Corky and sets of MTB's black color at an exceptional price. You can become a MTB distributor in your purchase area, enjoying a 55% discount from regular retail prices.
We have identified and locked top an export company who will be able to ship within 20 days of successful project funding, so you can enjoy your very own CORKY / MTB at the beginning of the SPRING.

We have faced some technical difficulties that made us find better solutions, but we are happy to say that we are over them !!! Most of these issues concerned with how to make the SAFEST and MINIMALIST rear-view mirrors as trustable that it is today, without compromising its easy remarkable functionality.

I am Astghik,outdoor enthusiast and founder of ARI Hiking Club.

With this campaign I would like to put a smile on our displaced kids` face from Arstakh, to bring them a bit of sunshine in this terrible period for all Armenians.

The goal of my campaign is to create opportunities for 100-120 displaced kids from Arstakh to participate in 1 day outdoor activity.
column3: >During Artsakh war 69 displaced kids have participated in our organized outdoor activities...
column4:
> 

Your support will help us to create opportunities, which can offer 100 up to 120 displaced children:

column1: • Outdoor recreational activities (such as hiking and cycling)

column3: >Hike to Aparan reservoir, in front of the church Saint Peter and Paul
column5:
>Hike to Gosh lake in Tavush region

 

Meet Alen who wants PEACE and only PEACE for humanity

 

 

He is Lyova, who asked us to take him another hike...

ARI has been founded as a bridge between you and mother nature. Our hiking club helps you to explore Armenian Highland with its majestic mountains and steep canyons, sparkling rivers and hidden waterfalls, consecrated medieval churches and impregnable fortresses, villages on the slopes of the mountains and people living in remote communities  through hiking, tracking and campaings.

Another very important goal of the club is to be in contact with different centres operating in the regions of Armenia, to visit and to get to know them, to use the services they offer in order to contribute to the development and recognition of communities.
column6: >The aims of ARI Hiking Club are
column7: >To develop soft skills in children
column8: >To build lifelong habits of physical and mental wellness
column9: >To incorporate outdoor activities in Curriculum
column10: >To make outdoor activities fun experience
column11: >To raise awareness about ecological issues
column12: >To educate participants on ethical approach  ‘’Leave no trace ‘’
column13: >To contribute to different communities by using their services
column16:
>Your support shows  your dedication to playing a vital role in connecting kids to nature

 

 

You can support us

- by sharing our campaign

- by donating towards its realization

-by sending us positive vibes

 

Follow us

On Facebook page

https://www.facebook.com/groups/324933588496621

 

On Instagram

https://www.instagram.com/ari__tours/

Introducing the GPCA Carabiner from California

The Minimalist Utility Carabiner /Patented

Refining a carabiner by carving material out to build the most-used utility features, adventurers can do more with less. 

EDC (Every Day Carry) is about adapting your gear to your needs. Striking a balance between utility and ease of carry means a lot of choices between tools to get everything just right. 

The quick and easy way to maximize the utility of your EDC is with a minimal carabiner but with the most-used essentials. 

To preorder and bring it to life, click Back This Project. Or scroll on:
column2:
>

GPCA Carabiner, this basecamp for your EDC is carved from a solid block of fine *steel.  Simple practicality and quality craftsmanship go into every one. Patent Pending.

Reviewed by Globo Surf - https://www.globosurfer.com/muncher-titanium-mu...
column4:
>

The Muncher packs a punch with 10 functionalities. Made from AEROSPACE GRADE TITANIUM, it is amazingly strong and light-weight at just 0.7oz / 20grams. The ideal companion on any trip where weight and space are a consideration. The Muncher's versatility makes it an everyday carry for any adventurer or traveller, be it camping in your back yard to backpacking around the world.
column5:
>

 

A Gift Certificate is available for download here to print at home, so you can give The Muncher as a gift.
column9:
>

Both spork and serrated knife are highly polished for an easy to clean finish. Because it is made of titanium you will experience no metallic smell or taste. Also, it does not rust like other metals.

column1: A hypalon pouch keeps the utensil safely stowed away. The carabiner allows it to be attached almost anywhere for safe keeping. The pouch stores a ferrocerium fire starting flint that can be used in conjunction with the angled edge of the can opener to create a spark to get your fire going wherever in the wilderness you might be.

In the middle of the utensil you will find a bottle opener which also functions as a handy potato peeler. Next to this is a can opener and chord cutter. The end of the utensil can be used in a variety of ways, be it a flat head screw driver, ply-bar for opening lids or even a box cutter for opening food packaging.

We are all set up with our manufacturing partner in Hong Kong that we have worked closely with for the last 5 years. They are experts in original equipment manufacturing, specialising in metal engineering. The Muncher will be stamped from 1.5mm sheet titanium and then CNC'd. It will be finished by polishing and sandblasting, giving it its unique high quality finish.
The pouch is made from a durable laser engraved hypalon material double stitched along either side with a riveted hole for the carabiner to attach.
The money raised from kickstarter will allow us to make the tooling and place an order for the initial production run.

With the ""Kiwi No.8 wire mentality"" (basically you can fix anything with a piece of fencing wire) Mark (Full Windsor founder) looked into how he could reduce the amount of gear you need when heading out into the whop-whops / outdoors / wilderness / whatever you wanna call it. He decided the spork was a great jumping off point, but surely more could be done! Listing the most commonly used tools involved around food and its preparation whilst in the middle of nowhere, he began the design process.

With functionality at the top of the checklist, every function of the multi utensil had to work great in its own right. With weight also being a major consideration, titanium was an obvious choice of material. After a year and a half of design and hundreds of tweaks later The Muncher (or the ""Kiwi Army Spork"" as we like to call it) was born.

Full Windsor is an outdoor and cycle accessories brand working out of both San Francisco and the UK. We make unique gear that embraces the outdoors. Whether it be bike-packing around the world or your next micro-adventure out of town, for everyday use or into the wild. Our team is made up of curiously minded designers looking to create high quality gear that is unique and well thought through, both functionally and aesthetically. Founded in 2011 by award winning Kiwi product designer - Mark Windsor.

We have successfully launched both our Nutter and Breaker cycle multi tools previously on Kickstarter. We can't state how much we appreciate all the backers sharing the journey with us and allowing us to do what we do.
Kickstarter - Nutter Cycle Multi Tool
Kickstarter - Breaker Cycle Multi Tool
Get Cash Back on the Projects You Love!

column2:

WICOMM  WI5 is a small, portable and global pocket MiFi  router. It adopts a unique and secure barrier-free global virtual SIM card network technology that is suitable for anyone who needs an Internet connection for business and travel. Its network services cover 127 countries around the world and support 4G LTE dual-channel uplink and downlink. WICOMM WI5 pocket MiFi  provides a global roaming data service, so even in countries with restricted access, you can access any website through any network you need. (such as high-definition movies, games, etc.).For details, please enter: https://www.wicomm.io/

 

WICOMM WI5 uses the virtual SIM card technology. Even when you’re travelling across different countries, WICOMM WI5 enables you to connect to the local servers instantly without fuss and it doesn’t require you to change SIM cards for internet access. The convenience of having a built in international roaming technology saves you money from buying sim cardscost and helps you to stay connected to the internet at any time and wherever you are. For details, please enter: https://www.wicomm.io/

WICOMM WI5 is great for:

column1: <li align=""left"">Flight attendants, pilots and flight attendants of international flights
<li align=""left"">International trade and international business personnel
• International students and academic exchange personnel.

When it comes to affordability, WICOMM WI5 is the best among competitors. We provide the longest validity period and it is by far the most affordable international roaming package for international users. As long as you’re a WICOMM user, you are eligible to the services provided by our company. Thus, our plan is the optimum package for frequent business travelers.
column2:
/>

WICOMM offers high speed global reach to remain connected to the strongest network signal at your destination. It covers network coverage of 127 countries and continues to add more international internet coverage from different countries.

The working principle is: WICOMM is a virtual network secondary operator. We cooperate with telecom operators around the world and purchase a large amount of global roaming data from them and store it in our self-built database. Registered users of WICOMM Wi5 could order the data packages through the APP and send order instructions to WiCOMM cloud server. WiCOMM cloud server would then distribute various data packages from the database to the user accounts accordingly. After the transaction has completed, users could control and use the data package in the account.

 

WICOMM WI5 adopts Qualcomm 4G chipset to ensure high-speed and stable internet connections. You could download and upload your work anywhere and run your business meetings without any lags. WICOMM WI5 allows you to maximize your business travels with strong, fast and smooth worldwide connectivity.

The 4G LTE network is more stable and data transmission is extremely fast.

 

WICOMM WI5’s stable internet and fast connection enables up to 8 devices to connect at the same time. Like a high quality Wi-Fi router, the internet speed would not be affected when connected to 8 devices, making WICOMM WI5 a great tool for small groups.

Besides that, users get to enjoy the best and strongest internet connection when connected devices are within 20 meters range from WICOMM WI5. The strong Wi-Fi range ensure smooth and strong internet connections, along with a pleasant browsing experience.

 

WICOMM WI5 adopts a sim card encryption technology that protects personal privacy and business data, along with safety features for virus and malware intrusion. The server jump also prevents IP tracking to ensure private browsing.

 

Get unlimited data and unlimited speed with WICOMM WI5 app. You could also track, manage, and purchase more roaming data anytime you want. WICOMM WI5 App supports IOS/Android, and it’s made available on Google Play Store.

Besides the convenient data management app, WICOMM is providing free 2GB of international roaming data to all new purchases of WICOMM WI5 International Pocket Wifi.

 

The powerful and compact built in battery could last up to 10 working hours. When the pocket Wi-Fi is in idle mode, it could last for 30 hours without charging.

The batteries are safely certified by UL, so rest assure that the device has stable power and circuit connections.
column3:
/>

WICOMM WI5 batteries are detachable and it is convenient for businessmen that are constantly travelling. If you do not have enough time to wait for the battery to be fully charged, an extra battery in hand would help you stay connected to the internet for a longer time and work for a straight 20 hours.

 

WICOMM WI5 comes with a compact design of 15.6mm thickness and 148g weight. This weightless and compact design allows you to bring WICOMM WI5 wherever you go, and it could easily fit in your trousers without affecting your fashion. Feel at ease and take WICOMM  WI5 wherever you go.

WICOMM WI5 comes with a LCD display that allows you to keep track with the status of your device. It shows you the internet data usage, the amount of battery left on the device, and status of the connection. You could know the amount of device connected with WICOMM WI5 and prevent others from stealing your internet connection.

column1: WICOMM WI5’s stable internet and fast connection enables up to 8 devices to connect at the same time. Like a high quality Wi-Fi router, the internet speed would not be affected when connected to 8 devices, making WICOMM WI5 a great tool for small groups.

Besides that, users get to enjoy the best and strongest internet connection when connected devices are within 20 meters range from WICOMM WI5. The strong Wi-Fi range ensure smooth and strong internet connections, along with a pleasant browsing experience.

Network, air, water and food are indispensable parts of human life. It is impossible to imagine a world without Internet.
Wicomm Technology International Limited was established in Hong Kong on February 28, 2017. It is the main operating company of the project. We focus on the research and development of communication products and global network services. We are the second operator of global network services, targeting global business travelers. We are providing the most suitable products and services for global business travel customers.
Wellcome Technology International Co., Ltd. was established on February 28, 2017, focusing on the R&
column2: D and production of network and communication products. It is mainly engaged in global network operation services and is a secondary operator of network services.

column1: The networks in many countries are not interconnected, or the tariffs of networks in different regions are high and inconsistent. As a result, we often go to a country to prepare in advance to purchase local SIM cards and roaming data. So we developed WICOMM, a product that helps you overcome international network barriers, and at the same time, allows you to enjoy the world's most affordable international roaming traffic, so that you can surf the Internet, work, and entertain anytime, anywhere, no matter where you go.

To show our appreciation, we have developed a REFERRAL PROGRAM. We are grateful for 
 your valuable sharing and recommendation as they will be super helpful for the success 
of our campaign. We will offer you:A FREE Storage Bag if you share our link on your social  media, such as Facebook, Twitter, then post the link of your sharing post in our comment section.
You can directly click and copy the link, please don’t miss your privacy ID, the last several digits:

     Mini and compact

3. After you share the link on social media, please copy the link of your sharing post and paste it on our comments box. Then, we will know you have joined our REFERRAL PROGRAM. We will do record and add on the WICOMM WI5 into your package.
So are you ready? Quickly share the campaign and get the FREE gift today! Go, go, go.

column2: >* We have just completed our second production run of Freestate and can now offer free 7 day Worldwide delivery on all new pledges...….Bring on the Summer!
>Freestate is the perfect travel partner - It really does just about everything could ever want a lightweight travel shoe to so, all with a sense of style.

column9: >
column12: '>When designing Freestate we removed the regular shoe heel support and replaced it with a soft feel elastic that holds and cushions the heel of your foot engineered not to lose shape or grip wear after wear. We didn't stop at that, we then removed the regular shoe upper panels and replaced them with a durable outer skeleton that sits on top of a very breathable mesh fabric that helps circulate the air around the foot for a fit and feel like no other shoe.

column2: >Freestate looks like no other travel shoe, the low profile sole design not only helps to keep the weight down but also helps Freestate look great In any location, its a shoe designed to be worn with or without socks and works with any combination of outfit your travels require.

column3: >

column9: >
column10: >Immerse yourself in the endless summer experience. Each pair of Freestate comes with:
column12: colour matching laces (in case you wanted to change things up a little),
column13: >- Shapers - so when they are wet you can insert the shapers to keep the shape for years
column14: >- Optional: Beach bag - and you can also opt in for our branded pool print water resistant beach bag.
column17: >Shoes can be a bulky heavy necessity when packing to travel for a week or a weekend – So why pack them? Freestate has been designed to be worn and not packed away, with such a level of comfort and lightness (8oz) they become the perfect travel partner well before you arrive at your destination, and we should know – we have been testing Freestate all over the world this year and we wouldn’t travel anywhere without them!
column21: >Our journey began with a simple idea - we wanted to create a lightweight travel shoe that looked great and felt like nothing else. It had to be breathable and flexible yet totally at home in water. In a nutshell our simple idea was to create the 'go-to' summer companion….not so simple after all.
column25: >Sole blue prints, pattern trials and prototypes have been our reality for the past 18 months. We have taken our trials around the world for over 12 months now, putting them through all kinds of extreme wear tests in some of the Worlds toughest infinity pools and some of Europe’s most stunning deserted beaches all in the name of extreme product testing, and when these trials have been completed we have returned back home to put our well-travelled trials through one last test ….a 30 degree machine wash.
column27: >Please see the options below.
column32: >Please see the sizing guide below to know what sizes we will be supporting. Once we start shipping we will make sure to remind you to amend your selection to make sure it is correct.

column1: The best and most reliable method that we know of is the measure either foot yourself and check the size chart we have published on our campaign page by checking the CM length. To do this simply:
1. Place a sheet of A4 paper on the ground facing away from you with your back up against a wall or a door to hold yourself steady.
2. As carefully as possible, draw around your foot with a pen or a pencil - paying attention to the edge of your heel and the tip of your largest toe.
3. Once drawn around, lay a rule from the furthest part of the heel to the edge of your big toe and measure in CM how large your foot is.
4. Cross-reference this with the sizing guide below and use the CM length to establish your perfect size for Freestate.
If you notice that your measurement sits between two sizes, then please use the larger size to establish the size you should be looking to request.
column4: >Freestate Is the very first shoe from the Manchester UK footwear team called Ten Thousand Islands. In a town known more for rain than sun we wanted to put our combined expertise (and love of sunshine) to use in creating a footwear brand aimed at all things travel. We have designed and developed shoes for many other brands for over 20 years, but this time we wanted to create our very own brand that would enable us to make footwear we felt we would all wear when we get away to sunnier places. Freestate is a shoe we have all had the chance to wear test over the last 12 months in all kinds of climates and conditions and it’s a shoe we have all come to love. Our brief was to create the perfect multipurpose shoe that looked as good as it performs...we think we succeeded.
column7: >
column9: >
column10: >
column11: > ","* We have just completed our second production run of Freestate and can now offer free 7 day Worldwide delivery on all new pledges...….Bring on the Summer!

column1: Freestate is the perfect travel partner - It really does just about everything could ever want a lightweight travel shoe to so, all with a sense of style.

When designing Freestate we removed the regular shoe heel support and replaced it with a soft feel elastic that holds and cushions the heel of your foot engineered not to lose shape or grip wear after wear. We didn't stop at that, we then removed the regular shoe upper panels and replaced them with a durable outer skeleton that sits on top of a very breathable mesh fabric that helps circulate the air around the foot for a fit and feel like no other shoe.

Freestate looks like no other travel shoe, the low profile sole design not only helps to keep the weight down but also helps Freestate look great In any location, its a shoe designed to be worn with or without socks and works with any combination of outfit your travels require.

*This is an animated image, please wait a few seconds if it doesn't load automatically. Immerse yourself in the endless summer experience. Each pair of Freestate comes with:- White & colour matching laces (in case you wanted to change things up a little),- Shapers - so when they are wet you can insert the shapers to keep the shape for years- Optional: Beach bag - and you can also opt in for our branded pool print water resistant beach bag.  Shoes can be a bulky heavy necessity when packing to travel for a week or a weekend – So why pack them? Freestate has been designed to be worn and not packed away, with such a level of comfort and lightness (8oz) they become the perfect travel partner well before you arrive at your destination, and we should know – we have been testing Freestate all over the world this year and we wouldn’t travel anywhere without them!   Our journey began with a simple idea - we wanted to create a lightweight travel shoe that looked great and felt like nothing else. It had to be breathable and flexible yet totally at home in water. In a nutshell our simple idea was to create the 'go-to' summer companion….not so simple after all.  Sole blue prints, pattern trials and prototypes have been our reality for the past 18 months. We have taken our trials around the world for over 12 months now, putting them through all kinds of extreme wear tests in some of the Worlds toughest infinity pools and some of Europe’s most stunning deserted beaches all in the name of extreme product testing, and when these trials have been completed we have returned back home to put our well-travelled trials through one last test ….a 30 degree machine wash.  Please see the options below.  Please see the sizing guide below to know what sizes we will be supporting. Once we start shipping we will make sure to remind you to amend your selection to make sure it is correct.
The best and most reliable method that we know of is the measure either foot yourself and check the size chart we have published on our campaign page by checking the CM length. To do this simply:
1. Place a sheet of A4 paper on the ground facing away from you with your back up against a wall or a door to hold yourself steady.
2. As carefully as possible, draw around your foot with a pen or a pencil - paying attention to the edge of your heel and the tip of your largest toe.
3. Once drawn around, lay a rule from the furthest part of the heel to the edge of your big toe and measure in CM how large your foot is.
4. Cross-reference this with the sizing guide below and use the CM length to establish your perfect size for Freestate.

If you notice that your measurement sits between two sizes, then please use the larger size to establish the size you should be looking to request.  Freestate Is the very first shoe from the Manchester UK footwear team called Ten Thousand Islands. In a town known more for rain than sun we wanted to put our combined expertise (and love of sunshine) to use in creating a footwear brand aimed at all things travel. We have designed and developed shoes for many other brands for over 20 years, but this time we wanted to create our very own brand that would enable us to make footwear we felt we would all wear when we get away to sunnier places. Freestate is a shoe we have all had the chance to wear test over the last 12 months in all kinds of climates and conditions and it’s a shoe we have all come to love. Our brief was to create the perfect multipurpose shoe that looked as good as it performs...we think we succeeded. Partners",45.0,1,"1 Campaign

column2: >The Best thing to happen to camping since s'mores! Get your discounted membership and make this tech happen.

>Imagine if you could drive through a campground and check out all the sites before committing to a campsite. Now you can! CampgroundViews.com Virtual Tours allows you to virtually drive through a campground with 360 views.
>By making it easier for people to escape into camping and into the outdoors we are doing our small part to make this world a little better.
>But we also know the pressure and uncertainty that comes with finding and booking the perfect campsite for your next camping trip.
>We’ve heard too many stories of campers and RVers who never end up taking that camping trip because it’s just too hard to tell if they are picking the right campsite or even the right campground.
>The struggle is real! But it doesn’t have to be anymore. We’ve taken the guess work out of booking your next campsite.
>We've traveled thousands of miles with our VR camera and filmed 400 Recreation.gov campgrounds in some of the most visited areas in the U.S.
>With your support these campgrounds will be available for you to virtually tour &amp
>Originally founded by Mark Koep, CampgroundViews.com, is a successful search engine that already has loyal users, as well as thousands of new users everyday.
>SELECT THE MEMBERSHIP OR PERK THAT WORKS BEST FOR YOU!
>Or, if you are unable to contribute but think this is a really neat tool here are some things you can do to help anyways:
>Go to CampgroundViews.com and join as a ""free"" member. This will enter you into our email list.
>Use the Indiegogo share tools to tell others about this campaign. Even if you do not have the ability to financially help someone else may.

column1: ","The Best thing to happen to camping since s'mores! Get your discounted membership and make this tech happen.

Imagine if you could drive through a campground and check out all the sites before committing to a campsite. Now you can! CampgroundViews.com Virtual Tours allows you to virtually drive through a campground with 360 views.
By making it easier for people to escape into camping and into the outdoors we are doing our small part to make this world a little better.
But we also know the pressure and uncertainty that comes with finding and booking the perfect campsite for your next camping trip.
We’ve heard too many stories of campers and RVers who never end up taking that camping trip because it’s just too hard to tell if they are picking the right campsite or even the right campground.
The struggle is real! But it doesn’t have to be anymore. We’ve taken the guess work out of booking your next campsite.
We've traveled thousands of miles with our VR camera and filmed 400 Recreation.gov campgrounds in some of the most visited areas in the U.S.
With your support these campgrounds will be available for you to virtually tour & book this season!
Originally founded by Mark Koep, CampgroundViews.com, is a successful search engine that already has loyal users, as well as thousands of new users everyday.
SELECT THE MEMBERSHIP OR PERK THAT WORKS BEST FOR YOU!
Or, if you are unable to contribute but think this is a really neat tool here are some things you can do to help anyways:
Go to CampgroundViews.com and join as a ""free"" member. This will enter you into our email list.
Use the Indiegogo share tools to tell others about this campaign. Even if you do not have the ability to financially help someone else may.",11.0,1,"1 Campaign

column2: rugged outdoor projector by FILMATIC. With an all-metal body design, IPX6 water resistance, and Bluetooth speaker outdoor lantern built-in, FILMATIC is a great portable projector you need for outdoor activities or daily leisure.

column1: FILMATIC's design is inspired by armored vehicles and incorporates elements of ammunition boxes. The combination of a classic, retro and industrial style created the FILMATIC.

Amazingly lightweight yet powerful, FILMATIC is a super portable wireless outdoor projector that's smaller than an avocado!  Only 200g, easily throw the FILMATIC into your bag or a pocket for every outdoor adventure.

column8:
s=55191c791be06d347a5be0a65d677c45"" src=""""/>

 

A real outdoor device is capable of handling various harsh environments. The shell is made of high-density aluminum alloy with one-time die-casting process, making FILMATIC sturdy and seamless. It is more  durable than traditional projectors with plastic casings.

Drop resistant &
column9: IPX6 waterproof, take away your worries.
column23:
s=690e39a0bdf4babdc9743c5bd7468cd8"" src=""""/>

 

Traditional projectors usually use a fan to dissipate heat. They  might be noisy after  long periods of being switched on, which greatly affects your experience.  FILMATIC uses a brand-new structural heat dissipation system. By using heat dissipation surfaces on both sides of the casing, it ensures a controlled working environment temperature, and it doesn't make any noise to ensure you'll fully enjoy using it.

FILMATIC powered by DLP technology delivers a sharper, more crisp image with true FHD 1080p resolution. Take the cinema with you wherever you go. Just open the FILMATIC and enjoy your favorite shows and movies on up to 120 inches of picture size.

FILMATIC delivers a remarkably bright 200 ANSI-lumen image with its mini body. The FILMATIC projector also uses diffuse reflection technology, without a direct light source. This makes it easier on your eyes and prevents you from too much eye strain.

Equipped with auto focus and auto-keystone technology, the FILMATIC automatically adjusts the focus of the image and any distortions within +/- 40 degrees within a few seconds. It makes ceiling projections super easy.
column30:
s=8033d80caa7c455eb4c8c58b34d7d8b1"" src=""""/>

Tailor your entertainment to suit you.  You can use any streaming services on Android 8.0. Choose from more than 5,000 apps, including favorites like YouTube, Netflix, and more on your mini projector.

No Wi-Fi nearby? Just connect your devices or put the TF card into the FILMATIC to project your favorite media onto the big screen - you can even connect devices wirelessly via Airplay, Miracast or Bluetooth.

Micro HDMI interface is very easy to connect TV Box, allowing you to enjoy the games, and watch the wonderful content on YouTube  at any time. 

FILMATIC is also a portable, outdoor and wireless device that uses Bluetooth. It can connect to external speakers as well as with your smartphone. It's a great tool to use at  parties &
column31:
outdoor activities or at home or in your yard. 

 

FILMATIC comes with an ultra-bright lantern with a brightness of 100 Lumens to up to 300 Lumens. It can light the way and guide you in the dark which could come in handy when you're camping or walking around in the outdoors.
column36: gif-q=50&amp
column38:
s=7a2af45fece385fee285806051c4f19d"" src=""""/>

 

The built-in 5000mAh battery makes it very portable. You can watch up to 2.5-hour movies or listen to 6 hours of music  or illuminate at 100 Lumens for 15 hours on a one-time charge, which is usually long enough for any outdoor activities.
column40: showinfo=0"">
column42:
showinfo=0"">
 
 

A busy life usually does not give us extra energy and time to pursue the so-called ""sense of ritual""  Who says you can't take household items outside? We have tried to redefine the projector! FILMATIC is not only a portable projector, but also an outdoor projector that adapts to a variety of outdoor environments and is waterproof, drop-proof, rugged and durable.  Our team focused on innovation and a premium user experience. We hope that every outdoor enthusiast can have a ""Nature Cinema"", and everyone who participates in outdoor activities can enjoy outdoor life as at home. Nothing is easy in product development. There are always ups and downs. And after 1 year, we are so excited and extremely pleased to present to you our newest product - FILMATIC- we hope you'll love it as much as we do!

Solving the problem of needing serious tools that are also seriously convenient. The CTAX is built to be lightweight, portable, and easy to use so you always have the right tool for the job.
3. Gas Valve Wrench: Both ½ and ¾ sizes

Strong Enough To Get The Job Done. Tanto blades were originally designed to pierce armor with high, exceptionally strong points. We used that inspiration to create an axe blade that is optimized for piercing power.  Pierce/chop/cut aluminum, metals, plastic, safety glass, wood, trees, car hoods, and sheet metal to rescue yourself or others.

Break Through Or Fix What Stands In Your Way. Having a lightweight hammer on your belt is never a bad thing. Remove padlocks or residential door handles to quickly gain access. Perform field-expedient repairs with nails, brads, and other fasteners.
Don’t Let Busted Utilities Catch You Unprepared. Turn ON/OFF residential gas &
column2: water valves in both ½ and ¾ sizes when utilities are down but still have power.

column1: Lift You Need, Convenience You Want. At 18 inches in total length, the CTAX is convenient to carry on your belt while still providing powerful leverage. Free yourself or someone else by lifting heavy items or prying open doors, windows, trunks, and more.

No Moving Parts Means Extra Reliability. Made from exceptionally tough 4130 steel that has an impressive strength to weight ratio. The CTAX has no moving parts to break after excessive use, so you can trust it to be ready when you need it.
Lighten Your Load Without Leaving Anything Behind. Designed and optimized to be a personal carry option, the CTAX is a convenient way to breach obstacles, save time, and save lives.
Lightweight, easily accessible tools all in one place for hiking, biking, boating, and camping with peace of mind.
Have The Right Tools As A First Responder
The CTAX bridges the gap between arrival at the scene and waiting on expensive, cumbersome equipment to breach barriers.
Carry the tools you need to prepare your home for a natural or man-made disaster—and escape if you need to.
Drive A Car? You Need The CTAX
Don’t waste time waiting for rescue. Free yourself through the windshield, windows, locked doors, or trunk after a collision.
Have a question? Contact us directly at info@stonegryphontactical.com, and we'll get you what you need.

Brian Carrington joined the US Army as an Infantryman in 1998. After completing Airborne School he was assigned the 4th Ranger Training Battalion at Fort Benning Georgia. He transitioned from active duty to the National Guard in 2002, joining the 111th Air Defense Brigade in Albuquerque, New Mexico. After a stateside deployment in 2003, he volunteered to deploy to Iraq in 2005. Brian separated from the military in 2007 and became a police officer in southern California in 2009. He has been a police officer for the last 10 years serving the diverse communities of a major metropolitan city.

In that time, and on several occasions, he needed to breach a door but had to do it without the proper tools or wait the extra minutes for the specialized tools to arrive. It’s a gut-wrenching feeling to want to help someone but not being able to. So, he decided to do something about it.
He started Stone Gryphon Tactical to help first responders save lives by designing a multi-tool axe that is lightweight, portable, and easy to use.

Stone Gryphon Tactical’s mission is threefold: enable first responders to save more lives, improve the safety of their customers, and contribute to America’s economic development with a product made in the U.S.A.

Quality
We consistently strive to provide safety and rescue products that meet the highest standards for our customers. We will pursue ever-improving quality through domestic manufacturing (‘Made in America’) and partnerships with veteran-owned businesses supporting the employment of more American workers, incl the purchase of materials.

Integrity
We live by our core values and its ethical principles: conduct business with honesty &
column2: fairness, maintain highest level of integrity in sales and service, engage in active and fair competition, provide clear and honest advertising, provide for fair and expeditious resolution of customer complaints and disputes, and maintain a system of supervision designed to achieve compliance with these principles of ethical market conduct to build trust.

column1:
Innovations
Accountability, self-motivation and solution-driven approaches are encouraged which in return fosters positivity, creativity and innovation. With forward-thinking through continuous improvement, we seek and value ideas from our team and customers that improve our products and services, and provide meaningful benefits and increased safety to our customers.

Safety
We are conscientiously working for the well-being, safety and health of our teams and customers with empathy and affection. People’s lives are the most valuable on this earth. Our goal is: preventing injuries, preventing deaths. This is embedded in our company’s culture and supported through our values and rules. All employees, including our subcontractors, are expected to take these values seriously.

We understand there are always risks and challenges in the production process which is why we perform rigorous testing of our products before launching them to market. We have established relationships with experienced contract manufacturers to mitigate the risk of delays by material suppliers and to ensure quality control is implemented to the highest level. We have built test prototypes and fully understand our product, specifications, and production timeline. Unexpected issues may arise and if they do we always deal with them with our customers’ satisfaction at the top of our priorities list. We promise that should any unexpected issues arise, we will handle them with clear communication, transparency, and care.
Ship Date: We have built-in extra time for the manufacturing process and are confident we will ship by the projected dates. We will always keep you informed if things take longer than planned.

Supply Chain: We are very proud of our supply chain and are confident that we can create the product with the highest quality and on time. We promise to put our energies and focus on ensuring our customers’ satisfaction, product quality, and meeting deadlines.
Packaging: We are in the midst of finalizing the optimal packaging for the CTAX, but if something goes wrong here, we have our current solid solution we can use.
Long-lasting design: We used one solid piece of 4130 American-Made steel. A broken CTAX isn't something you're likely to see. This is the kind of tool you pass down through the generations.

Disclaimer/Buyer Responsibility: The purchase, use, and ownership of certain types of knives and blades are subject to a wide variety of local laws and regulations. Use any SGT edged tool only in a safe and legal manner, consistent with all applicable laws and recognized safety rules. It is the responsibility of the buyer, not the seller, to ascertain and obey all applicable local, state, federal, and international laws in regard to the possession and/or use of any edged tool purchased. It is further the responsibility of the buyer to familiarize themselves and comply with the laws and regulations that apply in their specific area regarding the owning of an SGT tool, specifically, the laws and regulations for close grip, edged tools, and blades. Some areas may have more restrictive laws concerning such tools and you are responsible for knowing and obeying those laws. SGT does not represent or warrant that any specific purchaser may legally purchase, own, or possess our products. SGT offers no legal advice regarding laws applicable to your purchase of our rescue multi-tool. It is your responsibility, as the buyer, and not SGT, as the seller, to ascertain and obey all applicable international, federal, state, and local laws regarding your purchase and use of such tools and blades.

INTERNATIONAL BACKERS: We are proud to have Stone Gryphon Tactical fans all over the world. We will ship the CTAX worldwide for an additional fee of $39.00 per unit for the 1, 2 or 3 CTAX rewards. Please note that you may be responsible for duties, other fees, and taxes applicable when ordering to your region.
If you are interested in 4 or more CTAX to be shipped internationally, please contact us directly at info@stonegryphontactical.com and we'll get you what you need.

Intro

Bison Gears (formally a successful Kickstarter) and O.K.Made collaborated to create a handmade leather stool.   O.K. Made is a leather handmade specialist brand that trained and studied under Italian Leather Crafter.  

The Tripod Leather Stool we created uses premium quality cowhide, full-grain leather for the seat and is 100% hand-made from the cutting to the stitching.   The handmade process of our items, along with the superb quality of our design, creates a life long product that only improves with time. 

 The team of developers in Bison Gears tested many prototypes to create the final design.  Our goal is to create a long lasting product that is both functional and aesthetically pleasing.

1. BISON GEARS Bush Craft Leather Top

2. BISON GEARS Tripod Leather Stool (Legs included)

- Leather Color Options

 -  All backers will receive this certification that has their number each leather. 

-  Legs Color Options

Black, Orange and Natural wood (None color)

Thank you!

www.bisongears.com

Eclipse HLE-2: Hyper Limited Titanium Morphing Knife 

The most stunning knife ever made. Black Lotus, anyone?

Precision Engineered. Proudly Designed and Assembled in the USA.

Eclipse HLE-2 Choices:

Blue on Titanium: 50 Pieces Worldwide

Titanium on Titanium (2018 Limited Reissue): 50 Pieces Worldwide 

Copper on Titanium: 50 Pieces Worldwide 

Black on Black (2018 Limited Reissue): 50 Pieces Worldwide 

Black On Silver: 25 Pieces Worldwide

The Eclipse HLE-2 is slightly larger than a silver dollar, yet morphings into a grippy, useable everyday carry knife.

The Titanium and Copper gracefully patina with age and use, evolving into a truly one of a kind look for each knife.

 All Eclipse knives feature a robust 440C blade, G10 handle and premium bearing washers.

The Eclipse HLE-2 looks visually stunning, opened or closed.

Specs:

Blade Length: 0.7 inches 

Blade Material: Hardened 440C Stainless Steel (58 HRC) 

Blade Stock: 0.08 inches (2 mm) 

Handle Material: 440C Stainless Steel or Titanium

Grip Material: G10 FR-4 

Closed Diameter: 1.8 inches 

Open Length: 2.9 inches 

Knife Thickness: 0.24 inches (6 mm) 

Weight: 1.1 oz 

Lock Mechanism: ""Button"" lock, frame lock

Bulk Purchases = Wholesale Pricing

If you would bulk, you can save an additional 20%, with Minimum 10+ Pieces. Message us privately, and we’ll create a special tier for you.

The E-Lunch box is a perfect on-the-go lunch prep gadget, which can be used as a compact and convenient lunch box, microwave and cooker. Kickstart your healthy eating lifestyle and create efficient lunches, packed with nutrients that fuel your body giving you an extra energy boost throughout the day. The must-have gadget for meal prep convenience when at work or on the move.
✅ Compact 3 in 1 unit (Lunch box + microwave + cooker)
✅ Includes 4 anti-bacterial, stainless steel containers and 4 sealed covers, perfect for keeping food fresh.
✅ Versatile and customizable – can be used with 1 container level or stacked with an additional container level for extra capacity.

E-Lunch box is ideal for use as a meal prep container, assisting with portion control and helping you to pack and transport exactly the amount of food you need for work or outdoor meals. We developed E- Lunch, the 3-in-1 lunch box as a cost-effective way to cater to the fast-paced demands of modern-day life, where attention to nutritional health and wellbeing through food often gets overlooked.
Whether you want to heat up your food with the microwave feature, cook and prepare food on     the go or simply use it as a handy lunch box to transport food whilst keeping it warm
column2: E-Lunch is just what you’re looking for.

column1: E-Lunch has 4 removable Stainless-steel containers making it easier to enjoy variety in your mealtimes. Each container comes with a waterproof lid to ensure freshness of food, thorough heating and minimal spillage.

E-Lunch is versatile and convenient to set up and use virtually anywhere! Weighing just 2lbs, it also includes a discreet cutlery compartment at the top enclosure, so that you’re always ready to dine out wherever you are.
E-Lunch has 3 durable layers which comprises a top, middle and bottom section. The middle section can be removed to suit your needs and the amount of food capacity required.
CONTACT US for even more discounts and to learn more about E-Lunch today.

","The E-Lunch box is a perfect on-the-go lunch prep gadget, which can be used as a compact and convenient lunch box, microwave and cooker. Kickstart your healthy eating lifestyle and create efficient lunches, packed with nutrients that fuel your body giving you an extra energy boost throughout the day. The must-have gadget for meal prep convenience when at work or on the move.
✅ Compact 3 in 1 unit (Lunch box + microwave + cooker)
✅ Includes 4 anti-bacterial, stainless steel containers and 4 sealed covers, perfect for keeping food fresh.
✅ Versatile and customizable – can be used with 1 container level or stacked with an additional container level for extra capacity.

E-Lunch box is ideal for use as a meal prep container, assisting with portion control and helping you to pack and transport exactly the amount of food you need for work or outdoor meals. We developed E- Lunch, the 3-in-1 lunch box as a cost-effective way to cater to the fast-paced demands of modern-day life, where attention to nutritional health and wellbeing through food often gets overlooked.
Whether you want to heat up your food with the microwave feature, cook and prepare food on     the go or simply use it as a handy lunch box to transport food whilst keeping it warm
column2: E-Lunch is just what you’re looking for.

We believe that it is every American’s patriotic duty to be prepared for all kinds of emergencies. Look no further than the past 15 months and recount all that has happened.

 

Between COVID shelf shortages, civil unrest, street protests and life-threatening freezing in Texas (of all places), our beloved land has suffered more than its fair share of extreme emergencies lately!

 

You and your loved ones cannot afford to be caught unprepared for the next extreme emergency. These dangerous events of late have proven once again how important it is to have a good, complete, reliable emergency preparedness/survival kit/bag in your home, auto, or workplace for the safety, protection, and peace of mind of your family, friends, grandparents, grandchildren, spouse, and caregivers wherever they are.

 

Below you will see the greatest, most innovative, totally comprehensive, and ultra-user-friendly emergency preparedness/survival kit/bag ever created! We call it our BLAZnTECH Go Bag. You will know it as your “Peace of Mind Go Bag” for you and your loved ones!

Risks and challenges

BLAZnTECH has long been a provider of cutting-edge, innovative, and reliable products to our military and law enforcement communities. Now we are creating and building the most comprehensive, complete, and state-of-the-art emergency preparedness/survival kit/bag ever made and assembled anywhere on earth.

You and your loved ones' protection and safety are our highest priority. We created and assembled our BLAZnTECH Go Bags with our own families and loved ones in mind. We have partnered with some of the finest, most affordable, and effective survival and emergency preparedness folks and organizations on the planet.

We’ve produced a fabulous sample product prototype Go Bag here because now is the time for emergency preparedness
column2:
not when we have everything perfect. Make sense?

That said, this is our first Go Bag production run. Everything that you see in this campaign is a pre-production prototype item.

Like many startups with new company offerings, we may have some assembly and/or production hiccups or setbacks along the way. But please be rest assured that we’re here for you. And if something is delayed or we need to make a change, substitute a component, or any other changes, we’ll communicate the facts to you ASAP and keep you up to date on our production progress.

Thus, our Go Bags are specifically designed and created so that everyday folks could use them in an emergency or survival situation until qualified and properly trained emergency people arrive.

Please be advised:

Ordering our BLAZnTECH First Aid Kits warrant that the user holds BLAZnTECH harmless for any adverse medical or health situations that may occur from using any of our Go Bag components. Buyers/users also warrant that they have the required training and authorization to use the medical supplies contained within our Go Bags.

We also need to make clear to our buyers/users that BLAZnTECH assumes no liability for the misuse of our products. BLAZnTECH holds no responsibility for injuries and/or outcomes of medical care as a result of using our BLAZnTECH products. All buyers/users are solely responsible for their medical training and treatment.

Should you have any questions or concerns, please email support@blazntech.com or call (704) 800-1202. Thanks for protecting your family and loved ones with a BLAZnTECH Go Bag!

column1: While delivering life-saving medicines to remote communities around
the world, Kapil Dev Singh realized that his ""high-end"", waterproof gear
conditions. Challenged by the discomfort, and inspired by the zest for
life he saw in these communities, Kapil started Mishmi Takin to make
gear so breathable that it could work even in high humidity
conditions. Since our products BREATHE better even in
challenging, rainy and humid environments (like Seattle, London and
Tampa), they OUT-PERFORM in other more colder or drier environments also
- like in New Hampshire, Utah or Southern California!
Takin boots and jackets focus on enhanced user comfort by maximizing air
exchange between the inside of the gear and the outside.
Ventilation-focused product design, highly breathable, air permeable
eVent fabrics, and Vibram Megagrip rubber, give our Footwear and Jackets
the power to keep you comfortable in hot, cold, humid, soggy, or any
WET conditions … yes, even SWEATY conditions.

Click Here for More Info About Our Hard Shell Jackets

As you may have noticed by now, we have many ways to customize our products to be perfect for each user. Do not feel pressured to choose your specifics right now. Simply claim the shoe or jacket style you want from the perks listed in the sidebar, and after our campaign we will contact you with a survey to determine your exact size and preferences.

Almost all hiking boots (and most shells) on the market today feature
a 'Wet System’ solid Polyurethane (PU) membrane. For a 'Wet System’
membrane to start working, the temperature and humidity inside the gear
must increase first. The increased humidity inside triggers condensation
on PU membrane, which is followed by a 3-step process of absorption,
diffusion, and then evaporation to pass through the membrane.
process is painfully SLOW and makes you feel sweaty before beginning to
work. So, even in colder and drier climates there is a period of
discomfort before the gear starts to breathe. In rain or high humidity,
this process shuts down completely because the humidity inside and
Mishmi Takin uses DRY-SYSTEM membranes and fabrics that are
micro-porous and air permeable, resulting in expulsion of water vapor in
a single-step. This is supplemented by use of multiple, additional
physical ventilation features that enhance air exchange and keep you
comfortable. No other hiking footwear or jacket offers this level of
In other words: We breathe even in conditions where others don't!
The critical difference between our technology and traditional
waterproof and/or breathable fabrics lies in the millions of microscopic
pores built into the eVent proprietary membrane that works instantly to
vent water vapor that builds up inside your gear. Because of this
Direct Venting™ Technology, and unlike others, you don't need to get
sweaty for it to start to work. It’s a 'Dry System' that allows eVent
fabrics to be fully waterproof and fully breathable – keeping you dry
and comfortable in the widest range of temperatures and conditions.
Developed for the user who frequently encounters slippery
surfaces, VIBRAM® Megagrip is suitable for trekking, multisport, fly
fishing, as well as all season hiking and travel. It offers an
incomparable combination of grip and durability which helps define
VIBRAM® Megagrip as the ideal high performance rubber compound for
extremely demanding activities such as backpacking, canyoneering,
Our idea for an outdoor brand grew from our Founder Kapil Dev Singh’s
experiences delivering medicines and hiking in his native India as well
While in the tropical forests of Eastern Himalayas and West Africa, he
realized that he couldn’t find boots or outerwear that worked properly
in high humidity conditions. After multiple soggy and slippery
experiences, he saw an opportunity to create ultra-breathable
performance hiking boots designed to perform in tropical conditions. It
helps that he’s also an MIT grad.
desire to highlight the passion for life and resilience that is often
found amidst adversity in the poor parts of the world by promoting
health and wellbeing in regions that are not always comfortable and hard
Kapil searched the globe for the best designers and
factories, then engineered a product to perform equally well across all
wet climates. He knew that no corner could be cut, and every detail had
to be perfect. The result is a footwear line Made in Europe from best
materials designed to solve the simple problem of staying comfortable
when the conditions are at their worst.
We chose our name after a rare goat-antelope found in Eastern
Himalayas at the junction of India, China, and Myanmar. Mishmi Takin
lives far away from mankind on remote, forested slopes, and many of our
original concepts were born in their hometown.
Mishmi Takin inherently have the great traction needed to go up and
down the steep slopes, as well as an oily coating on its fur to ward off
We wanted to bring these little known champions into the spotlight,
and also learn from their strengths as we designed our products. In
total we have 12 different styles of boots and jackets, which you can
view on our website ... WWW.MISHMITAKIN.COM.
We are constantly dreaming about the range of products we would like
to bring to you. We are already working on future purpose-built products
to target other specific climates. Future shoes could include a “desert
runner” designed for speed on sandy surfaces.
We will be posting the size chart for boots and apparel shortly. In case, there are issues with fit after delivery, we will exchange the products to get you the right fitting product.
The products come with a 3 year warranty. If you are unsatisfied for any reason or there are any performance issues, we will do an exchange or refund as needed.

Utah is a preeminent venue for outdoor, adventurous athletic events.

Is it ""outlandish"" to connect the Valkyrie's seven sports to a 100-mi racecourse in Utah’s beloved Wasatch Mountains? No similar race is happening in the West right now, and yet this inaugural annual event is drawing athletes from all over the United States.
Communities who aspire to great things, deserve nice things.

Having competed in a similar event in the northwest, we think other active communities deserve nice things, too. It’s exceptionally hard to launch a new, co-present, grand event - even without a pandemic – It’s felt at times, insurmountable. But nothing truly worthwhile is ever easy. The Valkyrie aspires to be a community rally-point and destination annual event. Having partnered with the Wasatch Community Foundation and their mission, the Valkyrie can be a great vehicle for their causes.
This relay race has a place – at home.
Co-Founder, Dan Merkley has clocked a 25-year career, mostly abroad, planning and operating unique accommodation services for major international sporting events - notably Winter &
column2: Summer Olympic and Paralympic Athlete Villages. While the Pandemic has crushed those prospects, the planning and operating of sporting spectacles still draw him as a moth to flame - and for a chance to devote everything to a project of his and Co-Founder, Shawn Snow’s own making. Shawn has been active in the endurance sports community as an event promoter. He was a founding member of the Endurance Sports Show, an endurance sports-focused expo in Salt Lake Valley. The show brought together manufacturers, retailers, coaches, educators, and event companies, in an expo-style setting. Shawn was also the event director of the Mt. Nebo Challenge, a road bike 100-miler that crossed over Mt. Nebo, the southernmost and highest mountain in the Wasatch Range of Utah. It is their mission the Valkyrie belong to the Wasatch community of Utah for its love of outdoor recreation, and its generous volunteer spirit.

column1: If there were ever a non-sport metaphor for endurance sport, planning the Valkyrie is it.

We have been promoting and shaping the Valkyrie Relay for three years. Permitting, pandemic, and surprise road-work obstructions have smacked us down twice already without a chance at something to show for this great relay race - until now. But we and the Valkyrie are better for it. We are COMMITTED to proving the concept of this race in Utah, THIS YEAR. A self-financed endeavor, we have pivoted and responded boldly to every obstruction.

We have been realistic and responsible stewards. While launching this new event concept, we have kept our goal modest: DO THE RACE. PROVE THE CONCEPT. HAVE SOMETHING TO SHOW NEW PARTNERS. We ask the Indiegogo community to help fund our assurance of a safe race, and one that shows respect for competitor and volunteer welfare. Won't you help us get it over the finish line?
The Valkyrie Relay needs foremost: course safety and competitor &
• $60 pays for 8 miles of driver caution signs
• $85 pays for 1 mile of safety barrels
• $100 pays for 1 day of electric driver advisory signs
• $75 pays for 1 hr of course safety by local law enforcement
• $30 pays for 1 hr of med-evac ATV
• $50 pays for 1 hr of course EMT support
• $200 pays for 1 hr of ambulance support
• $35 pays for on-shift food and gas card for a team of (5) volunteers
We do not yet have a wide array of merchandise, but we do offer:
• All donations: patron love on social media and Race-Day Finishers’ Podium announcements
• $50-$99 donation: Valkyrie Gearhead T-shirt
• $100-$199 donation: (2) T-shirts plus (1) free registration for the Valkyrie Marathon or Half Marathon, 2021 or 2022
• $200-$399: (2) T-shirts plus 50% off (1) team registration for the Valkyrie Relay, 2021 or 2022
• $400+: (2) T-shirts plus FREE team registration for the Valkyrie Relay, 2021 or 2022
Any contribution that cannot be used for the operation of the 2021 Valkyrie shall be donated to the Wasatch Community Foundation, our 501(c)3 non-profit partner.
Your contribution helps secure the launch of an eminently productive destination race event.
• The Valkyrie will be an annual stimulant to local economy
• It brings hundreds of people from out of county and state to compete, enjoy the natural and community surroundings, and to tell their friends.
• The Valkyrie, a LIVE team relay, is a means for natural, interpersonal, and community connectedness. Real group celebration, real group recognition, real connection.
• It is a vehicle for fundraising for non-profit and social impact causes.
""The first one through the wall is always bloodiest.""
SUCCESS: event permitting in the uncertainty of a pandemic, with the ""moving target"" of public health policy

OVERCAME: recent, sudden road closures and historical drought conditions, creating the need to reroute and reconfigure nearly the entire racecourse, its operations, permits, service contracts, and staffing.
THE RAZOR'S EDGE: Recruiting enough volunteers to staff a 100-mile course, including donated time from specialized skill and knowledge to manage sport-specific courses and operations.
THE BRINK: Cash flow to execute the version of this race event that early-adopting participants deserve, and is equal to our tenacity and belief in it.

PREVAILING ANYWAY: Two dads with ""day jobs(?),"" boot-strapping the launch of a new brand and a new race concept that is largely unfamiliar to, and demanding of its participants, venue owners, and public agencies.
If you live near Wasatch County, Utah:
• There is still time to form a team and compete! Go to www.valkyrierelay.com and register now for the Valkyrie Relay, Marathon or Half Marathon.
• Please join us and get your event flow-state going by volunteering! You can sign up at www.valkyrierelay.com. Invite a friend to join you!
The more the Valkyrie Multisport Relay is seen and reacted to on social media, the greater we succeed in all aspects on June 19, 2021.
Won’t you please consider the following call to action in support of the Valkyrie Relay?
• Promote the race to friends who might like to compete or volunteer
• Like and share our Facebook Page
• Like and Subscribe to our YouTube Channel
• Like and share our posts, stories, reels, etc.
• Indicate your engagement (going, interested) of our Events (see fB link), and invite others to the events.
• And please use the Indiegogo share tools!

We are determined that the Valkyrie be among the first this year to post a safe return to the interaction and exuberance for sport and our great outdoors that only live events experienced TOGETHER can generate.

It is a vehicle for fundraising for non-profit and social impact causes.

SUCCESS: event permitting in the uncertainty of a pandemic, with the ""moving target"" of public health policy

OVERCAME: recent, sudden road closures and historical drought conditions, creating the need to reroute and reconfigure nearly the entire racecourse, its operations, permits, service contracts, and staffing.
THE RAZOR'S EDGE: Recruiting enough volunteers to staff a 100-mile course, including donated time from specialized skill and knowledge to manage sport-specific courses and operations.
THE BRINK: Cash flow to execute the version of this race event that early-adopting participants deserve, and is equal to our tenacity and belief in it.

PREVAILING ANYWAY: Two dads with ""day jobs(?),"" boot-strapping the launch of a new brand and a new race concept that is largely unfamiliar to, and demanding of its participants, venue owners, and public agencies.
If you live near Wasatch County, Utah:
There is still time to form a team and compete! Go to www.valkyrierelay.com and register now for the Valkyrie Relay, Marathon or Half Marathon.
Please join us and get your event flow-state going by volunteering! You can sign up at www.valkyrierelay.com. Invite a friend to join you!
The more the Valkyrie Multisport Relay is seen and reacted to on social media, the greater we succeed in all aspects on June 19, 2021.
Won’t you please consider the following call to action in support of the Valkyrie Relay?
Promote the race to friends who might like to compete or volunteer
Like and share our Facebook Page
Like and Subscribe to our YouTube Channel
Like and share our posts, stories, reels, etc.
Indicate your engagement (going, interested) of our Events (see fB link), and invite others to the events.
And please use the Indiegogo share tools!

We are determined that the Valkyrie be among the first this year to post a safe return to the interaction and exuberance for sport and our great outdoors that only live events experienced TOGETHER can generate.
Thank you for your support!",0.0,0,"1 Campaign

column10:
s=493257a0a4fb72dbaebcd1525917bfac"" src=""""/>

 

Today, more and more cyclists have stopped using traditional bike locks. They are cumbersome, hard to use, expensive, and just not that secure. Not to mention the fact that they often leave you locked out if you forget your keys, lose the combination or fail to keep the lock charged.

column9:
s=679dd1de8422ff8d0a8effc7603e8da7"" src=""""/>
 

 A bicycle lock is supposed to make your life easier, not harder. That’s why we invented Weeylock, a smart, secure, and solar-powered bike lock that offers active protection with an always-on theft alert, reliable smart features, and a tamper-proof case.  Leave your bike to Weeylock and enjoy a carefree riding experience.

s=1e3ccb654f4d782541adb20519d05457"" src=""""/>
 

Say goodbye to losing keys, forgetting lock combinations, or facing a dead battery. Weeylock supports both smartphone keyless entry and key fob unlocking.
column17:
s=427dff259e174605d28dd513a6ba503d"" src=""""/>
 

Unlock Weeylock with one simple tap using the smartphone app in seconds. Get going before everyone else.

column1: Weeylock maximizes keyless convenience for you. Each lock also comes with a key fob that offers automatic unlocking.

Meet the lock that never runs out of battery. Weeylock is solar-powered. The built-in solar panel automatically recharges its battery in both outdoor and indoor light, so you can recharge your bike lock on the go.
Designed with a built-in lithium battery, Weeylock lasts for up to 3 months on one full charge.
Having your precious bicycle stolen is a heartbreaking experience. Weeylock has an always-on theft alert that prevents it from happening.
Equipped with a sensitive motion sensor, Weeylock detects any unauthorized movement instantly. When someone tries to tamper with your bike, Weeylock initiates a shrieking 110 dB alarm.

Weeylock resists attacks of all kinds. Built with reinforced glass fiber and aluminum alloy, the case is rugged, shockproof, and tamper-proof.  Its Bluetooth connection is equipped with AES 128 encryption that effectively prevents any virtual attack.
When pairing Weeylock with the phone Bluetooth, a 4-digit passcode is required. Adding an extra layer of security for your bicycle.
Weeylock is more than a bicycle lock, it is your personal cycling assistant. It keeps track of your real-time cycling data such as current speed, maximum speed and cycling routes.
Want to share your bike with friends and family, but you are not around to give them the key?  Simply use the app to grant access remotely without the need for passcodes.
When the battery life is low, you will receive a low battery reminder through the app. Forget the dread of returning to a deadlock situation and streamline your daily activities.
Unlock endless possibilities with Weeylock. You can use it on motorcycles, RVs, scooters, canoes, front doors, garage gates, and any situation that requires convenient reliable security.
Weeylock is waterproof and weatherproof, so you can use it even in extreme weather.
column17:
s=fb58750f797d6d995560e39e7bed90a8"" src=""""/>

What's even better? Weeylock is much lighter than most other smart bicycle locks while remaining secure and durable. So you can forget about security and enjoy the simple joy of riding.
