column3:
/>

Love the outdoors but don’t like the heat? We have a solution for you. Airable provides a refreshing breeze at the touch of a button.

Airable is lightweight and portable. You can enjoy a cool breeze wherever you are. Whether it’s for work, sports or leisure, you’ll feel cooler with Airable. Giving you an advantage in hot situations.
column8:
/>

 
We have tested Airable with the public and received a fantastic response. It has been praised for its great design, cool airflow, and stable fit. With Airable, this summer will no longer be a problem.

column20:
/>Chilling at home, Office

With Airable, you can go on a run, hike, be at the beach, play sports, travel, and more. The possibilities are endless!

Don’t let the heat stop you from doing something you love.
We want you to accomplish more with Airable. Be adventurous and let Airable work its magic.
column21:
>

If you’re the kind of person who likes to stay cool both literally and figuratively, then you are going to love Airable. (Airable's design is patented and has received an award for its design.)
column23:
/>

Airable is the only wearable fan in the world that has a magnetic fastener for your clothes. This allows Airable to remain securely attached even with rough movements. (E.g.: Running, boxing, doing front/backflips, and more)
column24:
/>

Airable was designed ergonomically so it rests comfortably around your neck and shoulder.  It was also designed and tested to be aerodynamically effective. The air passes by the neck and cools down faster.
column25:
/>

Airable fans turn 180 degrees, making it easier for you to customize the airflow.

 

Our propeller was not built in a day. We've built and tested over 500 propellers. Instead of simply changing the angles, we modified the pressure applied to each wing, used different materials, calibrated the noise according to the shape of the wing, and developed the optimal propeller to apply to Airable.
column26:
/>

Airable is not only hands-free and wearable but also detachable. It’s straightforward to detach and assemble.
column28:
/>

Use Airable to make a fire, to share with friends, and much more.
column29:
/>

Did your neckband get dirty? Don't worry.  
Our neckband is made from a flexible material that is durable and easy to clean. 

 

Airable weighing a mere 5.7oz(about 161.6g), which is just a little more than a shirt. 
It gets lighter by distributing the weight using the magnet.

 

Airable uses a safe, dedicated battery certified by UL, CE, KC, and PSE.
In addition, a dedicated cable with two USB-C ports can also charge both sides of the Airable simultaneously. 

 

Connect Airable with a power bank and take out the battery if you want to experience a lighter Airable.

column1: UK Met Office scientists predict that 2021 will be one of the top six warmest years on record. Overcome this summer with Airable and beat the heat. A perfect product for this summer. If you know anyone who gets hot easily and sweats a lot then this could be the perfect gift.
Everybody complains about the scorching weather but nobody does anything about it. Now, VOILA!

We developed and tested over 500 different propellers, and it is 1/10th the size of our competitor's propeller. We have visited our manufacturers and worked hard to get the best material and components.
We're a small team (South Korean) of dedicated individuals who've been on a rollercoaster.

We researched, developed, and applied a technology that minimizes loss of airflow to the back of the neck based on the Coandă effect. The Coandă effect is the tendency of a fluid jet to stay attached to a convex surface.

We researched, developed, and applied technology that can minimize the loss of airflow towards the back of the neck. This loss of airflow is caused by the Coanda effect, which is when a jet flow attaches itself to a surface and remains attached even when the surface curves away towards another direction.
It needs to be wearable, so the design was VERY important.
Making a small and beautiful product that fully contains a fan's function was a lot more complex than I thought.
If I made it bigger and not worry about the design, I could have made it without any trouble. But would I be proud of my product? The answer would be NO.

The big reason why companies have not been able to successfully make small-sized wearable fans is most likely because of the noise. The noise generated can be loud and unpleasant because the fan needs to rotate at a high speed in order to create airflow within a small area.
We tried various methods such as applying a vibration pad to the mount that holds the motor, changing the mount's material to hard and soft, and creating a vibration dispersion shape.
Just as a small car engine has less power than the engine of a tank, it is difficult to make a strong airflow if the propeller is small.

In order to create a design that is both small and efficient, we have tested a wide variety of fans and propellers such as a wingless method, a blower fan, an axial fan, and a reverse dual fan. Airable's propeller is about 1/10th the size of our competitor's propeller.

Rather than just changing the angle, we designed it by changing variables such as Camber, Skew, Chord, Lake, Pitch, and NACA airfoil, which are complex variables of the propeller. We developed it by conducting CFD and wind tunnel experiments.

In addition, the battery's compatibility (voltage, electric power), the motor, and the wind intake are all more important than the propeller alone. We tailored the exclusive motor and the whole battery to balance the product, and tested it after making numerous changes to the mechanical parts.

The three men above have contributed greatly to our campaign. They have contacted us first through our advertisement and since then have shown great love and helped in many ways like strengthening our content, writing skills, and giving us honest feedback. To show our appreciation we wanted them in our campaign.  Thank you, guys! We couldn't have done it without you.
We need to raise additional production funds through Indiegogo and make up for the somewhat low marketing budget through your help by word of mouth.
Tell your friends and family around you who are struggling with the heat. Every word from you will be of tremendous help in getting Airables into the market.
My dream is to make good products that can make people's lives more worthwhile. I know with your support I can be closer in achieving this dream.
To show our support, backers will get Airable for a discounted price, and the earliest deliveries. Airable’s final MSRP pricing may change when it’s officially available on the market.

Indiegogo is full of innovators and early adapters just like us. We’ve identified a stumbling block in our own lives and we’re not going to settle for the status quo. To make our lives cooler, easier, and more fun, whenever the opportunity strikes. With your support as Indiegogo’s community, we can bring this amazing idea to life.
Be prepared for the summer heat with Airable!

The 1st prize will go to one person who has referred Airable's contest the most. We will keep track of who has followed our social media and how many shares, likes, and RT it has got. You must follow one of the ""How to enter"" rules to be entered. You don't have to follow all three social media. The posts much be public. The winner will be announced on the 17th of May 2021 on our social media. If there is a draw the winner will be the person who has posted first. The shipping is free of charge. If you have any questions feel free to email common@sprint-elite.com

Meet Poogdy’s 'Tactical Portable EDC Tool'- A Personal Safety tool which enables the user to lock the door mechanically from INSIDE and offers 10+ EDC tools alongside. 

The EDC has been designed to offer safety for Adults and Children who are INDOORS. The Metal Bit (Stopper) is made of Hardened Carbon Steel, which makes it practically impossible to break. This ensures that the door remains locked and the person inside is safe &
column2:
protected from an unauthorised entry - even with a KEY.

 The Metal Bit (Stopper) is designed to withstand a load of over 500 Kgs or 1100lbs. The length of the Metal Bit is adequate to obstruct doors of all types.

Hex wrench for M6, M8 and M10 Nut size. A quick fix for your Skateboard or Wheels of your Travel Bags.

 Wire Stripper to peel off the PVC Insulation for removing the Copper wires of the cable for on the go requirement or for a quick fix around the house.

 A small projection at the end of the EDC, but strong enough it break a glass of 6mm Thick.

 Pry Bar a flat small Iron bar used from Opening Packaging to Opening Lids. Ideal  where accessibility becomes a challenge.

 The Metal Bit along with being a Stopper for the Portable Door Lock also acts as a Flat Screw driver.

 The Metal Bit also acts an Allen Key, the hex screw driver which otherwise is not very handy, but required for your Bicycles, Travel Luggage Bags. 

 A handy tool for quick fixes during a mountain or city biking.

 A handy Cable Tie Cutter when you need the most after shopping, recieving your check-in baggage.

 An EDC will be incomplete without a Bottle Opener

 This is an Add on reward, Fire Steel produces enough sparks to light up wood powder or small twigs of wood or plain cotton.

Finally a provision for it to be included in your key-chain

It can make your daily tasks or not so daily task a mere breeze to complete.

The entire EDC is Laser Cut with precision of 0.1mm or less. All in one ergonomic Door Safety Lock, Pocket Friendly and a Lightweight Tool.

 The EDC is suitable for almost any Door Thickness or any Wall Thickness, the user can do away with the plug in magnets altogether depending on the door / wall thickness.

The EDC is a step up in every way from the lessons we learned in our previous projects, incorporating better materials, better finishes and solid raw materials which shall stand for generations to come.
column4:
showinfo=0"">

 

Risk and Challenges

We have been in the business of designing and manufacturing since 2018. We've had our fair share of manufacturing hiccups during the second campaign and we've dealt with them in a transparent, responsible way by keeping our backers updated and we’ve always delivered all of our commitments towards our backers. This time around we are offering a complete Unbreakable product and most importantly we are making it totally in-house hence dependency on external factors gets reduced to ZERO. Should any issues come up, you can be confident we will handle them with transparency and utmost care for you. Supply Chain Risk: We have worked a lot on our supply chain, and are confident that we can fulfil our commitment of guaranteed deliveries. If anything should arrive late we will get through it together. We're deeply committed to and excited about delivering a high-quality product, on time, that we know you'll enjoy for a long time to come. Feel free to reach out to us at support@poogdy.com and our team will be happy to assist you.

column1: Buoy is on a mission to replace single-use products made from virgin materials with modern-design and highly-functional reusable products made out of recycled materials. Our first product in our foodware line is the Buoy Bottle - a reusable water bottle made out of 100% recycled ocean-bound plastic.

The oceans generate up to 70% of the oxygen we breathe - therefore we need to protect them. Buoy Bottle is the most environmentally sustainable water bottle made from 100% ocean-bound plastic intercepted from beaches and rivers. Purchasing a Buoy Bottle directly helps out ocean life all while providing you a functional and stylish product.
Buoy's 3-part design was created by award-winning architect and industrial designer Pascal Schaller. Minimalist and simplistic design meets functionality and sustainability.
Buoy bottle’s 3 part design means you get a bottle and a cup in one. It also makes it a breeze to add ice for a hot day.
Washing your bottle at the end of the day couldn't be easier - just unscrew and wash by hand, or pop it in your dishwasher.

Buoy Bottle isn’t only functional, good for the environment, and made to the highest quality - it also looks beautiful. Designed by award winning designer Pascal Schaller, our minimalist design and bold colors fit in at home, the office, on the go, and while playing your favorite sports.
The top of the bottle acts as both the lid and also a finger loop for easy carrying. Clip it on to a carabiner to carry on your bag, utility belt, whatever you want!
Buoy Bottle is a full size water bottle that can carry 27oz/820ml, but comes in super lightweight at only 250g
Buoy Bottle is made from recycled HDPE, food-grade certified, BPA free plastic, which is high quality, safe, and super tough.

Buoy bottle can withstand heads of up to 302°F - which means it's dishwasher safe and can handle hot drinks! It's got a thick 3mm wall so has pretty good insulation - but if you're looking to carry around your morning brew, watch this space! Buoy's next product will be a coffee tumbler!
Every year - over 100,000 marine animals die from plastic ingestion.

If your bathtub was overflowing, you wouldn't immediately reach for a mop, you'd first turn off the tap. Beach-cleanings are good but have not much effect if we don't stop the flow of trash into the oceans.
We need to intercept plastic in rivers and coastal regions before it reaches the ocean, this plastic is called ocean bound plastic.

Buoy Bottle is made from 100% recycled ocean bound plastic recovered from these coastal regions with poor or no waste management. We are recovering plastic before it ends up in our oceans destroying our precious eco-system.
Plastic pollution has caused 5 giant plastic islands to form, floating around our oceans and harming marine life. Learn more about these ""Gyres"" from Buoy's mini team member - Alexa!

8 million tons of plastic enter the ocean every year - Buoy aims to reduce this amount by making a circular economy. We only use 100% recycled post-consumer plastic, and once your bottle has reached the end of it’s life, whether it’s old or broken, send it back to us. You receive a discount on your next purchase with us, and we can recycle your bottle into a new one!
Even if you put your Buoy Bottle in your recycling bin, it will most likely get recycled alongside everything else.
Buoy Bottle is launching with a bright and colorful primary color scheme.
Buoy Bottle's 3 part design means you can mix and match colors to make a fully unique bottle. Whether you buy a single bottle or more, you can customize it fully to your liking.
In the future - Buoy aims to bring our new colors and exclusive designs - watch this space!

We have shirts and a cap using Buoy's cool whale tail logo! Our men's shirt will have a red and blue whale tail design on the back, and our women's shirt uses a red and yellow design on the front. Our shirts will be available in any size (including kids!) and you will be able to choose what shirt and size you'd live after the campaign.
We've been hard at work creating Buoy Bottle prototypes and securing our production.

To prove our functional design, the Buoy Bottle prototypes were 3D printed and hand-painted. The colors of the bottles were inspired by real ocean buoys. Our production partners are high quality American plastic manufacturers located in California.
We are not carbon neutral nor is it possible at this point to completely eradicate it.

Every production process has a carbon footprint on the environment. And we cannot just be big polluters and excuse ourselves to be so by simply donating. We all need to be a part of the solution and take our responsibilities in every step of the production and waste processes.

At the very least, we can try to reduce the carbon footprint to a minimum instead, and this is what Buoy does by recycling existing materials. It reduces carbon emissions by 80%. Local production reduces it even more.
We also make sure that it isn't a one time recycling, our products can and will be recycled, again and again, we create a circular economy, no waste ever!

Our partners, Envision Plastics, recover the ocean bound plastic from regions with no or poor waste-management. The product you buy from us already had a positive impact on the environment, less plastic entered the oceans.

Buoy, the creator of the Buoy Water Bottle, is a Los Angeles-based company - founded by celebrity photographer, avid diver and environmentalist Rene Hallen, co-founded by award-winning designer Pascal Schaller and veteran Biotech operations and business executive Adrian Colesberry - that aims to make a positive impact on the world by creating modern design and highly functional products made of recycled material for a circular economy.

Buoy Bottle is just the beginning. We are already producing high quality recycled food packaging for restaurants and take-outs. Working with a small deposit, consumers return the packaging for their refund, and we help to make single-use packaging a thing of the past.
Buoy actively supports these NGOs in the mission to help save the Oceans:

With the current pandemic, shipping is tough to nail down! We are in close talks with our shipping companies to get the best prices possible for you. If we can sell enough bottles, we can use distribution centers to get better prices for you. For this reason, we will charge shipping information after the campaign is over.
To be completely transparent with you, here are our current estimated shipping costs:

Depending on your country, you may be responsible for paying duty, taxes, or other applicable fees before you can receive your package. These policies are set locally, so please check with the relevant sources where you live for the most accurate information.
We need to create molds which are expensive, however our manufacturing and supply chains, all US based are ready to go, it's all a questions of financial support.
We invite you to contribute anyway you can

• And that's all there is to it.
","Introducing Buoy Bottle

Buoy is on a mission to replace single-use products made from virgin materials with modern-design and highly-functional reusable products made out of recycled materials. Our first product in our foodware line is the Buoy Bottle - a reusable water bottle made out of 100% recycled ocean-bound plastic.

The oceans generate up to 70% of the oxygen we breathe - therefore we need to protect them. Buoy Bottle is the most environmentally sustainable water bottle made from 100% ocean-bound plastic intercepted from beaches and rivers. Purchasing a Buoy Bottle directly helps out ocean life all while providing you a functional and stylish product.
Buoy's 3-part design was created by award-winning architect and industrial designer Pascal Schaller. Minimalist and simplistic design meets functionality and sustainability.
Buoy bottle’s 3 part design means you get a bottle and a cup in one. It also makes it a breeze to add ice for a hot day.
Washing your bottle at the end of the day couldn't be easier - just unscrew and wash by hand, or pop it in your dishwasher.

Buoy Bottle isn’t only functional, good for the environment, and made to the highest quality - it also looks beautiful. Designed by award winning designer Pascal Schaller, our minimalist design and bold colors fit in at home, the office, on the go, and while playing your favorite sports.
The top of the bottle acts as both the lid and also a finger loop for easy carrying. Clip it on to a carabiner to carry on your bag, utility belt, whatever you want!
Buoy Bottle is a full size water bottle that can carry 27oz/820ml, but comes in super lightweight at only 250g
Safe for Oceans, Safe for You
Buoy Bottle is made from recycled HDPE, food-grade certified, BPA free plastic, which is high quality, safe, and super tough.

Buoy bottle can withstand heads of up to 302°F - which means it's dishwasher safe and can handle hot drinks! It's got a thick 3mm wall so has pretty good insulation - but if you're looking to carry around your morning brew, watch this space! Buoy's next product will be a coffee tumbler!
Every year - over 100,000 marine animals die from plastic ingestion.

If your bathtub was overflowing, you wouldn't immediately reach for a mop, you'd first turn off the tap. Beach-cleanings are good but have not much effect if we don't stop the flow of trash into the oceans.
We need to intercept plastic in rivers and coastal regions before it reaches the ocean, this plastic is called ocean bound plastic.

Buoy Bottle is made from 100% recycled ocean bound plastic recovered from these coastal regions with poor or no waste management. We are recovering plastic before it ends up in our oceans destroying our precious eco-system.

“Nothing behind me, everything ahead of me, as is ever so on the road.” 
                                ― Jack Kerouac, On the Road
At Wayfarer, we look at roads as opportunities to engage with the world.  Our goal is to turn every highway in America - and beyond - into an unforgettable entertainment and informational experience.

We blend travel guides, world-class entertainment, and deep local culture to give you your very own Ken Burns documentary experience. Wayfarer is a GPS-enabled guide to the road. For a tiny fraction of the cost of a guided group tour in a van or bus, Wayfarer will make you feel like a VIP getting the story from a local insider who’s always charming, extremely knowledgeable… and on your schedule. You provide the car, we provide the story.
You can learn more about us at https://www.wayfarerjourney.com
• Ric Arthur:  TV writer, naval officer, superfan of Friday Night Lights and Joan Didion.
• Noelle Cope:  Writer and actor by day cat lover, avid crafter, and art meme enthusiast by night

When we’re not making tours for Wayfarer, we’re writing some of the world’s biggest TV shows and movies – like NCIS, The Last Ship, and Hawaii Five O ---- we know how to keep you on the edge of your seat.

""A few years back, the Navy stationed me in Naples, Italy for a few months. During my post there, I drove to Rome several times, which is a beautiful 2 hour drive through the countryside. I was sure that tons of amazing things happened thee: in that exact field of tomatoes...perhaps Dante lived for a season, or perhaps that was where Hannibal's elephants steam-rolled the Roman army?  Who knew? I certainly hadn’t a clue.  It was that experience – being in perhaps the most interesting spot on earth – and not being able to connect while driving – that convinced me that I had to build Wayfarer.""- Ric
• We are raising $10,000 to build new tours in California  and Texas

• We're grateful for support  - and give you back various options for free tours you can take in the months and years ahead. In a sense, by supporting this Indiegogo campaign, you're prepaying for your future adventures.

• Wayfarer is a bright spot in the post-COVID travel sector.   COVID-19 has made many parts of travel impractical or worse, dangerous. Nowhere is this reality more clearly problematic than the tour bus services in which visitors would be forced to endure extended periods of time in enclosed spaces with strangers. Until there is a proven vaccine, it is unlikely that anyone will want to get onto a crowded tour bus?
At Wayfarer our goal is to change the way we travel - as a community.  Thousands of people a year set out on the open road . But this journey doesn't have to be all on you to go on alone.
Through our Facebook group we have brought together 100s of Wayfarers from all over the world to share their stories, trips, tricks, and adventures.

Our goal is help bring back that spark of exploration to travel.  COVID-19 has made many parts of travel impractical or worse, dangerous. Nowhere is this reality more clearly problematic than the tour bus services in which visitors would be forced to endure extended periods of time in enclosed spaces with strangers. Until there is a proven vaccine, it is unlikely that anyone will want to get onto a crowded tour bus? That’s where Wayfarer comes in. Wayfarer is

Wayfarer is a self-guided GPS tour app that plays from your phone and functions like a private travel guide who happens to be a cross between Ken Burns and Ira Glass. Our motto is: “where the story meets the road” – and we blend the guided tour experience, world-class entertainment, and deep local culture. As the future of the travel industry stays uncertain during the COVID-19 virus pandemic, Wayfarer believes it delivers a service that promises a family friendly and safe travel experience.

Our first tour is Malibu - and this is ready to launch in the coming days.  Our second tour is Hollywood - and this is set to launch in early August.  But our goal is much bigger than this - 22 tours in California and Texas by 2022.

We need your help to pay tour writers and create even more special features in the app. This year more than ever people are going be hitting the open roads looking for a safe escape and an adventure to take their minds off everything they've left behind.

So be it Los Angeles locals seeking a change of pace driving Hollywood, or road trippers from San Diego, Arizona, and Oregon looking for a new way to experience the PCH, Wayfarer Journey will have you covered.

There is no technology risks. We are currently launching this into the world. We just completed beta testing and the tech works.  However, building out each tour does take a lot of time and loving attention - it is actually a lot like making a documentary film, including researching, writing, rewriting, test driving,  writing and recording original music, sound design, tech improvements and rebuilds.
Supporting this crowdfunding campaign will give us the boost we need to guarantee that Wayfarer Journey becomes an enduring friend to the traveler.
If you can't donate at this time your word of mouth is everything to us! Every single donation brings us one step closer to our goal of bringing the story of the road to life.
Sharing links to this campaign and following us on social media go such a long way in helping us reach our goal.
Please follow us out on Instagram and Facebook:

We are creating oversized boutique campsites in untouched native north Florida with an ample amount of forested space between each site, just a mile from the Gulf of Mexico in the Florida Panhandle. Perfect for paddlers, fishing, and scolloping or just enjoying the great outdoors. The 1 acre undeveloped land has just been cleared and the driveway installed. We're anticipating to be up and running before the spring, just in time for scollop season and to host you, our backers. Once the internet and utilities are installed, building a common fire pit area thats all decked with LED festoon lighting and adding many bug repelling plants around the grounds will get us up and running. We are running this campaign to get us to the finish line in time for spring.

We are husband and wife entrepreneurs who have, separately and together, started a handful and businesses. A few of which we still run presently. We have extensive experience in the hospitality/restaurant industry as well as real estate law, sales &
column2: marketing, technology, and the power sports industry.

column1: • Bring in electric service, including 30/50 amp hookups at all sites
• Drill a water well and install a fresh water connections at all sites
• In the long term (or if we exceed our initial goal) we will be adding a common area enclosed barn with a shower, toilet, laundry facility and fish cleaning station.
• Also in the long term (or if we exceed our initial goal) Solar energy to assist in powering our grounds.
You'll get up to 45% off your stay:
• $27 One night camping stay              Valued at $49
• $79 Three night camping stay          Valued at $147
• $179 Seven day camping stay           Valued at $270
• $449 One month camping stay        Valued at $700
• We've already acquired the property and have selectively cleared the campsites and installed the driveway.
• We intend to offer WiFi to all of our guests.
• Each site will have water, sewer and 30/50 amp hookups as well as standard 20 amp outlets to accommodate tent campers.
• Festoon lights will adorn the sites as well as the common areas.
• On top of each site having their own fire ring, a large enchanted campfire in the common area will be available for use and will be fantastic for socializing with the other campers.

We feel our biggest challenges are timing to have the campground open for the local season, which is summer, and getting material to install the power and septic.
The supplies we need are in very high demand right now as camping has increased by something like 1600% since the start of the pandemic, however we are confident that with our connections we will be able to source the materials that we need.
The reality is, we can do it on our own but the campground won't be finished in time for scollop season this summer if we don't get that boost to be able to open sooner.
We understand that you may not be able to contribute monetarily, but there are many other ways you can help:
• Share this campaign with your camping loving friends with the the Indiegogo share tools.
• Like and share our Facebook page https://www.facebook.com/CaptainsHideawayCampgr...
• We also have a Teespring store https://teespring.com/stores/the-captains-hideaway

The Neighborhood

This area is very popular for boating, fishing, hunting and kayaking. You can even drop your kayak at the beach 1 mile away. A proper boat, ramp for larger vessels, is less than 10 min away. When leaving the street, if you turn right you will find The Beach Bar which is the local watering hole with karaoke and pool tables. If you turn left there is Wlater B's, a gas station and convenience store with all the essentials as well as a deli. Town is a 15 min drive up the road and has a quaint downtown area with restaurants, shops and such as well as a many hotels, Walmart, Wynn-Dixie and Tractor supply to name a few. Steinhatchee is a 25min drive south and has marinas, boat rentals, restaurants and bars.

The Future

Our goals for the very near future will be to grow. We will always trying to find ways to upgrade the grounds and provide more amenities and comforts as well as acquire additional land to expand our campsites and vacation rentals to provide exceptional southern hospitality. Our hopes is to also have the volume where it will be conducive to provide additional services such as glamping tents, cabins, events and homestyle cooked breakfast to name a few. Electric vehicle charging stations and solar power is something we not only would love to do but absolutely plan to incorporate at our campgrounds when the time is right and the funds for investing are there. If this campaign does better than we expect, the solar will happen much sooner than planned.
column2:
>We encourage you to watch the video we put together for you!

Your help will not only be greatly appreciated, but rewarded with a steep discount while staying at our campsites, once we open, along with our sweet southern hospitality. We just need that initial boost! Thank you for giving us your time! Stay safe and we hope to see you at The Captain's Hideaway.

See why all the features built into the travlwear ERA Backpack make it the perfect travel and photography backpack.

column3:
>That Has Your Back

ShieldTek™ is our proprietary material that was engineered to handle shocks, weather, and anything else you can throw at it (or throw it off of).
column4:
>Focus On The Journey

The ERA Backpack is an elegant solution for traveling like a minimalist, while packing like a pro.
column5:
>Our Mission

We are a team of engineers who are also avid travelers and photographers. We wanted to make the best travel bag possible and spent months designing, testing, and developing the features that make the ERA Backpack the perfect travel and photography backpack. Our unique combination of backgrounds and skill-sets allowed us to make the ERA Backpack a truly innovative piece of luggage. We used our experience with machine learning and mechanical engineering to bring never before seen features to a travel backpack. Our first-of-a-kind and peak design process has ensured that the travlwear ERA Backpack is true game changer, and will be the go to backpack for travelers, photographers, and adventurers everywhere. So whether you have a nomatic lifestyle, are a content creator, or just enjoy capturing the world around you, grab an ERA Backpack and enjoy the journey.
column6:
>Follow Us On

So whether you have a nomatic lifestyle, are a content creator, or just enjoy capturing the world around you, grab an ERA Backpack and enjoy the journey.   Follow Us On",44.0,1,"1 Campaign

We have been successfully funded in Kickstarter!!

https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/eesens/shield-smarter-taillight-better-protects-you-and-your-bike#

 

INTRODUCING SHIELD

SHIELD is a new way to get safer bike rides at night with automatic turn signals, brake lights and a host of other smart features like a bike alarm and a bike-finder.

SHIELD can trigger turn signals when you do shoulder check. Its hardware consists of two parts – the taillight installed on your bike and the wireless sensing controller installed to your helmet.

Simply install the SHIELD taillight on your bike, and install the controller on any standard helmet, and you’re ready for safer, smarter rides.

SHIELD by EESENS is the first bike taillight equipped with this “automatic turning signals” function. Our patented sensor algorithm in the controller detects your gesture of “shoulder check” correctly by the motion of your head. When your head turns to check the traffic behind you, the controller on your helmet will check your turning angle, speed and stopping time. If these factors meet the criteria, the controller will trigger the turn light. We have optimized the ability of the turn-head algorithm over time. Now, the algorithm can detect FOUR different gestures: look at side, glance backwards, scan backwards and stare backwards over your shoulder. The later three of them have include most cyclers’ shoulder checking patterns. You can simply select in the EESENS APP which gestures best fit your riding habit, to avoid falsely triggering turn signals.

Here’s how it works:

Depending on your personal preferences, SHIELD can automatically indicate your turn direction based on your head movement. If you’re glancing over your shoulder to check for traffic, SHIELD will turn on the indicator to that direction.
column5:
showinfo=0"">

Anti-theft alarm

Never worry about your bike being stolen. Guard mode of SHIELD will protect your bike. If someone is messing with your bike a 110-dB alarm will sound to deter bad guys. A warning is also instantly sent to both your wireless controller on the helmet and the EESENS app.
column7:
showinfo=0"">

SHIELD is securely mounted on your bike with a mount made with the toughest materials and secured with five screws. You can then choose to either permanently secure your taillight with an additional screw, or keep it as a detachable light you can take with you.

Everything you need to mount your SHIELD is included in the kit!

Find-bike

After a long day, you may forget the exact location where you parked your bike and feel frustrated when you search for your bike on the street or in the parking lot. SHIELD can assist you in searching for your bike efficiently. You can easily turn on “FIND-BIKE” feature by pressing the wireless sensing controller or virtual button in EESENS APP. A bright light and loud sound of SHIELD will guide you to your bike’s location.
column9:
showinfo=0"">

Other features

A smarter taillight for you

SHIELD has other automation functions.

column1: • Light is turned on and shut off automatically depending on your motion.
• Guard mode is automatically enabled, when the bike is parked for 3 minutes.
• Daylight mode adjusts light to be brighter according to ambient brightness.
•  ... there will be more in the future.

EESENS APP helps you configure the light conveniently, with selections for light mode, disarm passcode, speed levels of turning head and so on. New software features will be added to SHIELD through the EESENS APP. Send us your needs. The EESENS team is looking forward to your feedback, allowing us to upgrade our product to improve your experience.

Easy-to-use and stylishly bright

SHIELD’s many functions allow the device to be used easily. Users can check the status, such as the battery and wireless connection, from the system LEDs in the devices. Frequently used features, such alarm or find-bike, can be enabled by device. You don’t need to check the APP frequently, unlike other general smart gadgets.

SHIELD by EESENS Inc really looks like a shield for your bike, an idea which its shape originated from. The light components consist of 5 LED strips. Their brightness boosts visibility of you and your bike, even in the daytime. 220-degree visibility make you be seen from wide direction.

 

Long range

The wireless sensing controller connects to taillight 200 meters / 656 feet far, four times as long as mobile Bluetooth does. The long-range connection of controller has better Finding-my-bike function and Anti-theft alert.
The taillight mount fits standard round seat post with diameters from 25 to 34mm.
Fastening wireless sensing controller on bike helmet has two options:
• Fix to size adjustment wheel with rubber band*
• Fix to back vents with cable tie*

Current taillights in the market only enhance your visibility. But SHIELD by EESENS Inc does more than that. With advanced wireless and sensor technologies, it provides three additional safety functions better protecting you and your bike.

Hardware Specification

(UPDATED)

 

Timeline

(UPDATED)

Shipping and taxes

Due to difference of regional regulatory compliance, SHIELD is allowed to be used in limited regions (see table below). We are sorry for not supporting all regions at first place. We will do our best to accelerate the regulatory compliance in other regions. If you want to receive the update of our progress, please back the Keep-Me-Posted reward. We will notify you when new market is open. Thank you.

Below is the shipping estimation table in December 2020. The shipping fees are very high now, due to COVID-19 pandemic and peak demand season. Our logistics expert expects that the fees will go down next year. So, we decide to charge you shipping and tax before we ship product to you, to save your expense.

 

About the team

I’m Tejen Kung, founder and CEO of EESENS Inc. Before starting my own company, I have worked on electronic product development for more than 10 years. I love the job. As a daily bike commuter, I regard safety in a ride to be the most important. I recruited my former colleagues, a team of excellent engineers, and started EESENS Inc. We design innovative smart products for cycling lovers. SHIELD has finished a prototype with proof of functionality. It has been tested by our team every day. Now, we plan to put the product in the market. With your help, SHIELD can finally reach bike commuters like you. Thank you.

We will use the funding to spend more on product and less on advertising. Please share this Indiegogo campaign with your family and friends, if you also agree with our perspective. Your kind sharing will help us to innovate better products. Thanks a lot.

Our mission is to make the ultimate travel playing cards. After the success of our first two Air Deck and three Nanobag campaigns, and more than 37k backers later, we’re now ready for our sixth campaign.

column3:
>

 

With the Air Deck 3.0 we did not want to compromise on quality. We went to several of the world’s best manufacturers of premium casino cards and asked for the best materials they could provide. In the process of creating the ultimate travel deck, we tried out over 50 different high-end plastic materials. The materials were taken through scratch, bending and handling tests to identify the best candidate. Finally, we ended up with a premium ‘casino quality’ PVC that has all the properties we want for our deck.

column4: >The Air Deck is made of a casino quality PVC
column5:
> 

 The Air Deck is incredibly resistant to tearing and bending, and is 100% waterproof. You can play with these in the pool, in the boat, in the tub, in the rain, at the beach, pretty much wherever you can think of.
column7: >Regular paper playing cards tear, stain, and break easily, but Air Deck 3.0 is extremely durable

column4: >The cards are 100% waterproof, so you can use them in the pool, bathtub or even the beach.

column4: >You can also wash the cards.

column2:
> 

In the process of selecting the material we sought advice from several playing card professionals. The end result is a deck that shuffles and handles like you expect professional cards to do. The cards are slightly textured on both sides to provide cushioning and excellent handling.
column6:
>

 

We created the new designs for Air Deck 3.0 with the wonderful supportive feedback we’ve received from our community. Despite their smaller width, the cards are as easy to read as standard sized decks. The full-sized length ensures that they also handle much like regular cards, and the narrower width makes the deck fit nicely in the palm of your hands.
column8: >The narrower width makes the deck fit nicely in the palm of your hands

column2:
> 

Blue Classic, Aqua Mandala, Night Sky and Red Classic comes with traditional looking face cards, while Retro, Geometric and Electric has a more minimalistic look:

column6: >

column4: >Each deck consists of 52 standard playing cards and 2 jokers
column6:
>

 

We love traveling this beautiful blue ball we call home, and we believe we should care for it as best we can. There’s only one planet earth after all. We consider the Air Deck 3.0 to be an environmentally conscious product to begin with, as it contains half the materials of its competitors, and is made of durable materials which provides a long product life. However, with this campaign we’ve upped our commitment to the planet by planting one mangrove tree for every two decks sold with our tree planting partner, Eden Reforestation Projects.

Mangrove trees are one of the most effective tools to bind CO2 to the soil, thus preventing it from escaping into the atmosphere. A mangrove tree can sequester up to a ton of carbon dioxide by the time it reaches 40 years old. As a bonus, they also help sustain coastal ecosystems, protect shorelines from damage by storms and acts as a filter to maintain water quality.
column8: >We will plant mangrove trees with Eden Reforestation Projects
column10:
>

 

The idea for the original Air Deck was conceived by fellow globetrotters Ursus Negenborn and Rune Kippervik while traveling South East Asia. We love playing cards, and we just couldn’t find a deck that was perfect for carrying at all times. As we’re big fans of optimization, we decided to create the ultimate playing cards for travelers ourselves.

column1: Most outdoor gear companies outsource their manufacturing to foreign sources because of the lower cost of labor and materials. We don't do that.
We believe in putting people before profits and employing folks with good pay for the hard work and dedication they put into making these amazing products.

We're a ""cottage shop"" with a small environmental footprint, making durable products with the highest quality materials and offering repair or replace guarantees so our products won’t end up in a landfill, or worse left on the trail.

column1: I refused to buy a backpacking chair simply because it wasn’t light enough, felt wobbly, had no lower back support, or its feet sunk down into the ground or snow. I had literally flipped over and dumped out on more than one occasion when trying out other backpacking chairs. I couldn’t stand that these other chairs would only ever be just a chair. I set out to design a chair that was ultralight, no, Adaptive Light, incredibly stable, supported my back, and didn’t feel like I was sitting on the ground or squatting with my knees up to my chest. The goal was to minimize overall weight carried while using every piece of equipment to its fullest extent possible.
Providing the most comfortable, dependable, and durable chair ever made for the backcountry.

It all started with the first full size trekking pole chair, the MUHL, which uses a set of 3 piece telescoping trekking poles and pairs it with a freakishly strong yet lightweight frame. It’s then covered by a durable fabric seat with unique shaped pockets (holsters) that fit the trekking pole handle into.
We couldn’t stop there and our testing and development led us to even more interchangeability. Again, we wanted the most capability that we could possibly get out of a single frame.

That’s when the other camping chairs evolved into the CAPRA lightweight backpacking chair with a full frame. The HINNY Recon lightweight backpacking stool, and the SEAGOAT ISLANDER beach chair. All sharing the same freakishly strong frame.

column1:
Building on our success of running and fulfilling to our Backers from over 13 different countries. All in the middle of a COVID zombie apocalypse. We guarantee delivery, and we have a proven Track Record. This is not a scam.

Because we manufacture these ourselves in our shop, we control the quality of our product, and the schedule of our manufacturing. Rest assured, we'll keep you informed of our progress every step of the way. You may even get sick of hearing from us.

Our worst case scenario would be that our demand exceeds our capacity, but we already have a mitigation strategy, and in place, within our supply chain to help us ramp up for additional demand.

Our team has over 20 years of professional design, manufacturing, and supplier sourcing across the globe for both military and the aerospace industry. We've seen crazier things than you can imagine when it comes to the safety of the public. We take it seriously, but we love what we do.

ACTS OF NATURE - OR OTHER

We'll let you know if we have a hurricane (frequent here in Charleston), that may cause a delay. We do have a mitigation for interruptions however within our supply chain.

We aren't asking to fund an idea
Because international exports are incredibly complex and the charges are so specific to each country shipped to:
International Shipping Fees will be charged through our Shopify checkout after the campaign ends and you'll receive a draft order with your items in a cart for review.
** 72% Savings shipping international DHL & UPS Worldwide through Shopify **

NOTE: The United States has free trade agreements in force with 20 countries: Australia, Bahrain, Canada, Chile, Colombia, Costa Rica, Dominican Republic, El Salvador, Guatemala, Honduras, Israel, Jordan, Korea, Mexico, Morocco, Nicaragua, Oman, Panama, Peru, Singapore
Rest assured we will do everything we can legally do when filling out our customs forms to reduce the cost to you.

A tracking number will be sent to you when the order is pulled to fill. Updates to your delivery address can be made whenever you need, prior to shipment. You'll have access to real time delivery data all the way to your doorstep.
Yet Softer Than A Kitten's Paw
Seats So Tough And Durable, Even Chuck Norris Secretly Agrees
The Original Trekking Pole Chair - Pair with your own 3 piece telescoping trekking poles
*Seat Only, Using your Existing CAPRA Frame - Select as ""add on perk"" at Checkout
A light stool for quick deployment
*Seat Only, Using your Existing CAPRA Frame - Select as ""add on perk"" at Checkout
Relax with a laid back Beach Lounger
*Seat Only, Using your Existing CAPRA Frame - Select as ""add on perk"" at Checkout
And there is so much more to this story

I refused to buy a backpacking chair simply because it wasn’t light enough, felt wobbly, had no lower back support, or its feet sunk down into the ground or snow. I had literally flipped over and dumped out on more than one occasion when trying out other backpacking chairs. I couldn’t stand that these other chairs would only ever be just a chair. I set out to design a chair that was ultralight, no, Adaptive Light, incredibly stable, supported my back, and didn’t feel like I was sitting on the ground or squatting with my knees up to my chest. The goal was to minimize overall weight carried while using every piece of equipment to its fullest extent possible.
Providing the most comfortable, dependable, and durable chair ever made for the backcountry.

It all started with the first full size trekking pole chair, the MUHL, which uses a set of 3 piece telescoping trekking poles and pairs it with a freakishly strong yet lightweight frame. It’s then covered by a durable fabric seat with unique shaped pockets (holsters) that fit the trekking pole handle into.
We couldn’t stop there and our testing and development led us to even more interchangeability. Again, we wanted the most capability that we could possibly get out of a single frame.

That’s when the other camping chairs evolved into the CAPRA lightweight backpacking chair with a full frame. The HINNY Recon lightweight backpacking stool, and the SEAGOAT ISLANDER beach chair. All sharing the same freakishly strong frame.

ISO EN 581-3:2017 & ASTM F1838 CLASS BFINITE-ELEMENT SIMULATIONS AND SAFETY MARGIN CALCULATIONSSTRENGTH, DURABILITY, AND STABILITYULTRA-LIGHTWEIGHTMÜLIBEX® “THE CAPRA™” CONVERSION CHAIR  And Here we Are...Ready to Do it AgainMinimalist, Adaptive light designs, that combine leading edge technology and multi use component versatility. There is much more to come, and we cannot wait to share it with you.

Building on our success of running and fulfilling to our Backers from over 13 different countries. All in the middle of a COVID zombie apocalypse. We guarantee delivery, and we have a proven Track Record. This is not a scam.Because we manufacture these ourselves in our shop, we control the quality of our product, and the schedule of our manufacturing. Rest assured, we'll keep you informed of our progress every step of the way. You may even get sick of hearing from us.Our worst case scenario would be that our demand exceeds our capacity, but we already have a mitigation strategy, and in place, within our supply chain to help us ramp up for additional demand.Our team has over 20 years of professional design, manufacturing, and supplier sourcing across the globe for both military and the aerospace industry. We've seen crazier things than you can imagine when it comes to the safety of the public. We take it seriously, but we love what we do.ACTS OF NATURE - OR OTHERWe'll let you know if we have a hurricane (frequent here in Charleston), that may cause a delay. We do have a mitigation for interruptions however within our supply chain.",82.0,6,"1 Campaign

Our EDC BamPen is an irreplaceable thing for each person and one of the most practical and interesting things. Our handle is perfect for any pocket, and its stability on the surface will amaze you! You no longer have to worry and fuss. 

The shape of bamboo perfectly combines with ergonomics. The elegant arc fits fingers and is easy to control. Each arc of the body and corner angle is calculated accurately and tested for measurement bringing your writing to life! 

 

EDC BamPen uses a bamboo bud design and refillable long life German ball-pens that can fully meet your daily use. The pen looks and feels so good in your hand. The Bamboo Pen and Graver Knife combination is a working piece of art.  Everyone you know will want to borrow it! 

 

Unlike the pens on the market, EDC BamPen's caps are designed with a magnetic cap to prevent the cap loss. You can magnetize the other end of the pen in instant. 

Magnetic forces pull the cap onto the pen.

We designed the EDC BamPen to have a perfect balance in your hand. So your writing will always be in maximum comfort. 

From creative minds comes a creative pen - natural and unique. Write your legend. 

The G2 Refill is a very large refill that can be written to 10,000 meters long and 25 times that of a regular refill. We used a G2 refill because we love the way it writes. With the G2 Refill bringing you an experience of quite smooth writing. Who doesn’t like variety, right?

The refills by German company ensure that the EDC BamPen provides a smooth ink flow and the best writing experience for you.

 

 

We added anti-slip beads to the broken window cap,  No matter what kind of table you put the EDC BamPen on, it won’t slip. 

We wanted to design a pen different from others. Not just for the exquisite workmanship and appearance, but also does more than just a precise writing tool. We combined Paper Carving and a well-writing pen together that allows you to excite inspiration and release stress in your everyday life.

 

The blade of the engraving knife can be taken down at any time, and the new blade can be replaced when the blade is broken. We will give you 10 blades for free.

 

The other end of the pen is a window breaker. You only need to open the cap to use it as a window breaker. Whether in the car or in any dangerous situation, you can protect yourself as a tool.

 

 

 

EDC BamPen is precision machined from brass. These remarkable materials have the highest durability.

 

3The finishes consist of hand blasted, hand polished and PVD. Of those three surface techniques, we offer you four different colors: Silver, Rose Gold, and Black. A different choice for whatever moods you happen to be in. You can give a friend, girlfriend or family. Or just make an original gift to yourself.

column2: >The Grilliant is a perfect size for outdoor barbeques and gatherings of 3 - 4 people.
column4:
/>

Grilliant is the must-have portable charcoal outdoor barbeque grill, with a unique adjustable dual-venting system to control air flow whilst cooking. This portable grill also features an adjustable smokestack and built-in thermometer, to ensure your grill has accurate temperature control to transform any food into easily cooked perfection.
column6:
>Portable

Grilliant weighs only 9lbs, its portable size means that Grilliant can easily fit into your car trunk, the sturdy wooden handle on the top of the grill allows you to lift with ease, making it easy to get the party started and keep your guests well fed throughout.
column7:
>Precise Cooking 

The cylindrical design of Grilliant creates a three-dimensional heating environment that is great for cooking whilst retaining the moisture inside the food. The adjustable dual venting-system and smokestack enable you to have control of air flow, allowing multiple cooking modes. Whilst the inbuilt thermometer allows you to cook the food at an accurate temperature.
column8:
>Separated Cooking area including Warming rack

Although Grilliant is a portable grill, it has a robust cooking area with 2 separate sections. One section is for cooking the food and the other section is a warming area, which means the food stays warm, and you can serve your guests with no need to rush. Keeping your guests well fed throughout the party.
column10: >What's in the box
column11: >From Our Customers
column13:
>CONTACT US for even more discounts and to learn more about Grilliant today.

column1: Hello! My name is Yeves Perez. My team and I need your help to bring a new Booking travel platform to market.

We founded the “Workbnb App Coalition” Facebook Group , which consists of real Hosts, Co-hosts, and investors from 23 states (including NV, OK, IL, NC, GA, AL, TX, CA, WA, FL, LA, CO, MI, NJ, MIN, MA, TN, NY, VA, OH, UT, AZ, PR) and 6 countries (Canada, Malta, France, UK, Italy, South Africa). Doing this helped us take remarkable steps to prove our concept is valuable and necessary for this industry.
Join the Workbnb Movement - Pledge Your Support Today!
We took remarkable steps to prove our team's ideas, business plan, policies, and target market data And hosts agree - it’s the right niche and the timing is right to build our App!
However, we’re not technical founders! We’re Hosts banding together to take on giants!

All vacation rental platforms/apps on the App Store don’t take into account all the nuances that Companies (and governments) require for their essential workers. This leads to countless hours of unnecessary coordination, low morale amongst employees, and lessens productivity.
Why do Essential Workers need us? Why not use Airbnb?

“Airbnb appeals to the lowest common denominator like a Motel 6. Workforce and executive clients that choose Workbnb (in the near future) will expect something better,” say Donald Beken, a Corporate Talent Acquisition Manager, frequent business traveler (and my advisor).
How did I discover this underserved client?

My experience with essential workers started in spring of 2019 when my mom called and said she bought me a plane ticket to come to Reno! She was telling me about all these companies that were moving there because of the great tax incentives and affordable housing. Plus Tesla and other big companies were all relocating here at the same time. She just started her business, PKL Homes, with 3 Airbnb’s and was doing pretty good until a company offered her a contract to house 65 people for three months. Now, please understand, Reno is a small market But it’s a growth market and it’s on every list of growing cities in America.

There was no corporate housing giant in town and the contract had to be filled quickly. So it was my task to help her scale up to 23 apartments in three weeks. My mom had carpel tunnel surgery so I had to be her hands as well as her marketing guy. Since I had marketing experience, she was able to get free marketing expertise included. But then I began to notice a trend… More than half of our bookings on Airbnb were business travelers and essential workers.

So after months of collecting data, conducting surveys, and working with economic development officials, I started direct marketing using the term “workforce rentals.” That’s when we became the solution company.

column2: >Join the Workbnb Movement - Pledge Your Support Today!

column1: But we had to adjust our model completely from the vacation rental model. We gave all of our clients the right to extend at the same price without marketing the unit from under them. That gave our clients confidence that if something happened during their trip or a project delays, they could stay in the unit that they enjoyed with these longer extended stays.
Reno, Nevada’s rapid expansion means construction projects and corporate relocation, but less housing for the workforce making it happen.

The article presented serious questions: So when construction crews move into the area to build much-needed housing, where do they live? How do they find flexible short term housing that can accommodate scope creep and project delays?

When corporations relocate to Reno and need to find luxury temporary housing for C-suite executives and project managers who are in the area to lead change management and enterprise relocation, who understands their unique needs?
We scaled our operation to 40+ units throughout Reno Sparks and Carson City to meet workforce housing demand!

""PKL's dedication to providing the highest-quality workforce housing in Reno has saved me countless hours of coordination, improved the morale of employees and has provided exceptional value to my organization,"" said Seth Alexander, project manager of Ames Construction, the 74th largest Industrial General Contractor in the United States.

Then it dawned on me, If I could build an app for this demographic, we could mobilize the short term rental industry and train them to cater to an underserved market. That’s when I left my cushy job at PKL to write the business plan with Daj’Anique Staples.
The name came to me late in the development of the business plan. I needed to capture the essence of what we do in one word. I need the name to stick.

column2: >Join the Workbnb Movement - Pledge Your Support Today!

column1: RENO, NV May 20, 2021 --- “This is a once-in-a-lifetime opportunity,” said Daj’Anique Staples, Workbnb, Inc’s 23 year old President. ""There are millions of vacation rental hosts worldwide and a very large number are upset due to lack of support and grotesque treatment from the larger platforms. There are many other hosts simply open to diversifying their income sources. Plus there's an underserved traveler seeking whole homes with extended stay options and that have better terms and conditions,” said Ms. Staples.

Workbnb promises to be “the better booking platform” designed for the nuances of Corporate travel and companies sending out their most valued employees in droves to conduct essential projects, meetings, and tasks. Employers, eager to resume growth, are actively seeking solutions to increase employee satisfaction and the key is whole homes with extended dates.

During the pandemic, construction was one of several industries deemed essential by every Governor. Growth states such as NV, CA, TX, WA , NY, and FL all permitted record construction projects while Americans were on lockdown. “This is not a trend, essential workers led the way at great risk and many did contract COVID. Now, it’s time for them to be properly accommodated.  Short term rentals are just as necessary as long term leases, apartment complexes should want to support this client , rather than ban STR operators eager to facilitate,” said Ms. Staples.

In order to service this client base, Workbnb requires property managers of whole homes to be Workbnb Certified as a Hometelier. After the 2 week certification course is complete, Homemakers (definition below) will be able to list their units, according to Workbnb standards. Owners will be able to request services from and visibly see who is a verified Hometelier through the app.  “Creating mandatory guidelines and training for this title gives professionals in this industry a sense of purpose for what we do. Being a hometelier is the foundation for these short term rental businesses to succeed and continue to thrive."" Homemakers will have access to millions of trained professionals that can help start their business or get it back on track through the platform, ""I can’t even find Hosts to co-host for without sending a fake booking request on Airbnb,” Daj’Anique Staples ended.

column2: >Join the Workbnb Movement - Pledge Your Support Today!

column1: “The Company will charge a 5% service fee per booking and an affordable listing fee, however the mobile application will operate within a Freemium business model,” said Yeves Perez, the Company’s CEO. “We know we're up against Goliaths, however this is not the vacation rental lane. Traveling workers, employees relocating, construction workers, executives...they all need a platform just for them,” said Mr. Perez. Airbnb is reported to have over 4 million active hosts according to a recent article by Airbnb News.
According to the Economic Policy Institute’s May 2020 comprehensive, ""Who Are Essential Workers?"" , California identifies 55 million essential workers in the entire industry.

column2: >Business Travel Data by the U.S. Travel Association

column1: Starting in Q2 2022, users will get basic features at no cost and access to richer functionality, tools, and resources for a monthly subscription fee. To date, the young tech company based in Reno, Nevada, is launching a strategic crowd-funding campaign aimed at Hosts worldwide. “We want to show proof of concept, we need 100,000 hosts to back us at $100...us hosts spend that on pillows,” Mr. Perez said.

The Company is 100% minority owned and 50% of the Board of Directors are made up of women of color. The Founders are existing hosts and co-hosts based in Reno, Nevada. Workbnb team also administers a (used to be) private Facebook group for Hosts worldwide to give open feedback on policies, features, and benefits of the app. This is a hospitality tech company to watch.

Use of Funds: Pay Synap our development partner, hire key staff CFO, COO, CTO, and CMO, hire operating staff, hire and train account managers, account supervisors, and customer service reps, secure HQ office, secure hosting, and purchase Advertisement buys for 2022.

Founded in 2021 and based in Reno, Nevada USA, the Company is currently developing a world class, AI powered, peer to peer mobile application to support a multi-sided platform for booking whole home accommodations, sending/receiving payments, and engaging with user generated content.
The Company is scheduled to premiere a ""Minimal Viable Product"" or MVP at the Consumer Electronic Show (CES) in Las Vegas, Nevada on January 4th - 8th, 2022.
As far as what we have prepared for updates during the campaign, the Executive team has committed to the following:

column2: >99 Reasons to Back the Workbnb Kickstarter campaign
>Join the Workbnb Movement - Pledge Your Support Today!
>Join the Workbnb Movement - Pledge Your Support Today!

column1: About the Developer: Synap provides custom software development, including commercial software applications, in-house software applications, legacy software modernization, mobile app development, application plugins (e.g. Excel, Outlook, Adobe), and Integrating physical equipment or small devices with the cloud and mobile apps. Synap has been hired to make the project a reality and has committed to have the MVP “minimal viable (sellable) product” in time for the CES launch.

Synap’s team brings a wealth of skills, knowledge, and experience providing expertise throughout the whole UI/UX planning, software engineering, development, implementation, project management, and business analysis processes. Plus, Workbnb will benefit from  keen process focus, so the marketing team can execute the go-to market strategy to obtain first sales! https://synap.io/
Synap’s commitment to Workbnb is to eliminate certain risks and provide certain advantage

column2: >Join the Workbnb Movement - Pledge Your Support Today!

>I am blessed to have already found my passion. The short term rental industry is what I was meant to thrive in and we are creating something that gives us professionals in this business a sense of purpose. Working in customer service from the age of 16 to being a Leasing agent for the past 2 years has solidified the notion that building this platform IS my Purpose. I plan to add love, creativity, culture and support to the short term rental community. With my experience and drive to help the industry, my intentions are to help someone else find or strengthen their purpose. Not only in our initiative to raise up 1 million Black and Brown Entrepreneurs, but in every single feature I get to act on.

>I am Chairman and CEO of Workbnb. I started as a Co-host based in Reno, Nevada and I have completed over 200 business travel/ essential worker related bookings in two years. I have assisted several short term rental operators scale up units throughout Reno, Sparks, Carson City, and more! I'm also the administrator for the Workbnb App Coalition, which is a private Facebook group of Hosts and Co-Hosts from five countries and 17 states. We are adding more hosts to the group! Join the Workbnb Movement Today!

column1: Thank to Dream Pilot Films for producing our 1st commercial (check the updates): https://www.dreampilotfilms.com/

The Company is scheduled to premiere a ""Minimal Viable Product"" or MVP at the Consumer Electronic Show (CES) in Las Vegas, Nevada on January 4th - 8th, 2022.
As far as what we have prepared for updates during the campaign, the Executive team has committed to the following:
99 Reasons to Back the Workbnb Kickstarter campaign
Join the Workbnb Movement - Pledge Your Support Today!
Join the Workbnb Movement - Pledge Your Support Today!

About the Developer: Synap provides custom software development, including commercial software applications, in-house software applications, legacy software modernization, mobile app development, application plugins (e.g. Excel, Outlook, Adobe), and Integrating physical equipment or small devices with the cloud and mobile apps. Synap has been hired to make the project a reality and has committed to have the MVP “minimal viable (sellable) product” in time for the CES launch.

Synap’s team brings a wealth of skills, knowledge, and experience providing expertise throughout the whole UI/UX planning, software engineering, development, implementation, project management, and business analysis processes. Plus, Workbnb will benefit from  keen process focus, so the marketing team can execute the go-to market strategy to obtain first sales! https://synap.io/
Synap’s commitment to Workbnb is to eliminate certain risks and provide certain advantage
Join the Workbnb Movement - Pledge Your Support Today!

I am blessed to have already found my passion. The short term rental industry is what I was meant to thrive in and we are creating something that gives us professionals in this business a sense of purpose. Working in customer service from the age of 16 to being a Leasing agent for the past 2 years has solidified the notion that building this platform IS my Purpose. I plan to add love, creativity, culture and support to the short term rental community. With my experience and drive to help the industry, my intentions are to help someone else find or strengthen their purpose. Not only in our initiative to raise up 1 million Black and Brown Entrepreneurs, but in every single feature I get to act on.
Workbnb, Inc. CEO & Chairman, Yeves Perez

I am Chairman and CEO of Workbnb. I started as a Co-host based in Reno, Nevada and I have completed over 200 business travel/ essential worker related bookings in two years. I have assisted several short term rental operators scale up units throughout Reno, Sparks, Carson City, and more! I'm also the administrator for the Workbnb App Coalition, which is a private Facebook group of Hosts and Co-Hosts from five countries and 17 states. We are adding more hosts to the group! Join the Workbnb Movement Today!
Thank to Dream Pilot Films for producing our 1st commercial (check the updates): https://www.dreampilotfilms.com/
And, thank you all for supporting the Workbnb Movement!

About Deyuanxiang Fingerprint Padlock

In an ideal world,locks are superfluous.People feel safe anytime and anywhere.we usually use the key lock or password lock to take care for our possessions.But - how many padlock keys have you lost over the years? How many passwords have you forgotten? We’re all human, and you have enough to remember every day. DY fingerprint padlock gives you one less thing to worry about,your finger,your key.
column5:
showinfo=0"">
 

Travel is essential for everyone. we like running,mountain-climbing,skiing and adventure.we inevitably be injured outside and feel helpless often.especially the Children walking on the road alone.we can’t ignore dangerous situations.It’s necessary to call for help urgently.SOS Alarm is your security assistant.protect your safety anytime everywhere.resounding voice reaches 110 DB that makes the people who near you can help you immediately. DY is ideal for the whole family,protecting everyone’s possessions in a sleek, stylish, and secure way.
column8:
/>

 Continues the founder. “Deyuanxiang’s average reaction time is 0.5 seconds, with a 500 DPI fingerprint recognition rate. Also, a quick tap of the included SOS button empowers you to call for help in an emergency. It’s the best of every world!”

Have some technical ability is indispensable when you try to be a Adventurer,outdoor,Stainless steel wire rope load-bearing with 100 KG.a great helper of survival.DY padlock is cost-effective for a range of audiences across multiple markets, making advanced personal protection a possibility for the masses.Able to bear impressive loads of up to 100kg, the fingerprint padlock is perfect for every occasion.Sophisticated fingerprint technology recognizes rich fingerprint textures in seconds, and one charge using Type-C technology will last most users up to a year (or up to 5000 locks and unlocks).
column11:
/>

 Always on a businss trip in different Countries and so much meeting.thinking about how to make the handbag,backpack,locker,drawer more safer?using fingerprint padlock can make your possessions more safety.

Life happens, but when little accidents occur, you can count on Deyuanxiang to continue to function as you’d expect. Your fingerprint padlock will still work even when the temperature drops to anywhere between -10°C ~45°C. In other words, you can continue to enjoy life’s greatest adventures, worry-free - come rain or shine, snow or sleet. In fact, we put Deyuanxiang to the real-world test at below-freezing temperatures, and it passed with flying colors. Rest assured that you can always rely on your new fingerprint padlock, no matter how extreme the environment. Deyuanxiang is also dust-tight for your peace of mind.
column13:
showinfo=0"">
 

 A sophisticated fingerprint panel with a touch-sensor grants you entry to your belongings in less than a second.its average reaction speed is 0.5 second.with a 500 DPI fingerprint recognition rate.360° identity recognition,supporting 10 users.share fun with your best friends.

column1:
There  are many precious moments to be celebrate.birthday,Christmas,Hanukkah,Anniversary,graduation and so on,Don’t know what to buy for special gift?everyone loves to stay on-the-pulse of emerging technologies.you deserve the bad boy,the safest assistant.

 Designed for individuals who are tired of losing padlock keys and forgetting passwords, codes, and combinations, this fingerprint padlock uses digital precision to protect personal belongings. There’s no need to remember passwords or combinations with this padlock. It’s just as beautiful as it is functional, with a sleek crystal-clear mirror and elegant finish the whole family will love.
column3:
showinfo=0"">

We envision a future defined by more convenience, security, and protection of your personal possessions. If you believe in the same tomorrow as us, choose your early bird special today!

 Deyuanxiang has been a forward-thinking company committed to making lives easier through the power of technology. Today, the company is pleased to announce the long-awaited release of its latest and most savvy contender in the realm of personal security, the Deyuanxiang Fingerprint Padlock.

 “We couldn’t be more excited to finally be bringing our long awaited fingerprint padlock to the market,” says Deyuanxiang founder. “We’ve spent years and hundreds of design reiterations to perfect this bad-boy, and to finally be able to bring it to the market…it feels surreal.”

column9:
showinfo=0"">
 

Questions?  Feel free to reach out to us anytime at info@d-yx.com

While there are always risks and challenges in creating and producing any product, we're confident in our abilities to overcome them all. We’ve finished all testing of the product.The most likely to hinder our project is the supply chain. Although we keep a close connection with our suppliers.if there is no abnormality,We will deliver goods on time. To accommodate our customers as quickly as possible, we separate batches into smaller shipments so that the sooner you order, the sooner you can receive your fingerprint padlock.

column8:
s=89d81d67a68ebadb29bc2f912ccdfd21"" src=""""/>

Commute, travel, or venture anywhere with the Nori Backpack — a lightweight, organized, anti-theft backpack that keeps you moving without weighing you down.

With the Nori Backpack and its sushi-inspired butterfly straps, you’ll have a functional and versatile bag for any occasion.
column36:
s=eac8d9a0f21f249f7164c504966c20a3"" src=""""/>

The Nori Backpack’s sushi-inspired butterfly wings combine playfulness with functionality.

Simply buckle the butterfly wings on the front or back of the bag to hide your zipper ends for extra security. The wings can also be buckled backward to wrap around your luggage handles when traveling.

Plus, the butterfly wings double as a pocket for extra storage space！
column57:
s=45384278def53767fdfea8f5c052558a"" src=""""/>

The main body of the travel bag opens 180 degrees, like a suitcase, so you can easily access everything you need.

Two inner zipper compartments organize your chargers, makeup, hard drives, accessories and more, while a convenient sleeve safely stores a tablet or a notebook.

We’ve also included a separate 15-inch soft-coated laptop compartment and an elastic band on the inside of the bag for your water bottle or an umbrella.

 

Quick access
column64:
s=1a4be3d4b9cb5387d4e644e926591def"" src=""""/>

The six-inch top pocket is perfect for items that you may need to access quickly and easily. There’s also a strap for glasses so you can grab them and go.

Additional nylon pockets are included for a portable power bank that can attach to an external USB so you can stay connected throughout the day.

 

 The Details

column15:
s=925f80ead0a24f01d5c4a671b0539803"" src=""""/>

Keep your belongings safe, no matter where you are.

You can buckle the butterfly wings in the front or the back to hide the pocket zippers for extra security. Plus, TSA-approved hidden pockets allow you to discreetly safeguard all your valuables.

These anti-theft pockets are included on the wings, shoulder straps, and the back of the carrier. There’s also one hidden pocket on the shoulder strap lined with RFID-safe fabric to protect you from tech-savvy thieves.

Additionally, both shoulder straps feature anti-theft buckles so you can strap your bag to your workspace, seat or table.
column36:
s=a4b1dae1b0c88a94c5bc0973efbf6a32"" src=""""/>

Whether it’s packed full or just carrying a few items, Nori Backpack’s semi-hard shell will always hold its shape and rest comfortably on your back without protruding.

Nori Backpack is also lightweight, so it will never weigh you down.
column50:
s=8866b567ca7f9ef8e193a4f1a6baaaef"" src=""""/>

Both the straps and lumbar are crafted with ultra-soft, breathable foam for added comfort.

Plus, a hidden magnetic pocket on the strap securely holds your headphones while you interact with those around you.
column85:
s=3f77d6aac7e19190e4d47485c5817050"" src=""""/>

The Nori Backpack is a truly sustainable product that has a positive impact on our environment.

Both the main fabric and the lining are made from recycled plastic bottles. The Nori Backpack is also GRS (Global Recycled Standard) certified and water-resistant.
column120:
s=09a179d2407719c1e8a885b766b21a7e"" src=""""/>

At Nori Design, we are a group of engineers and designers who set out to re-define a carrier bag for the minimalist lifestyle.

We were sick of carrying massive travel bags and over-designed, bulky backpacks. So, we put our heads together to create the Nori Backpack, a modern, minimalist backpack that holds all of the essentials for any occasion.

We’re beyond excited to share this journey with you and make the Nori Backpack a reality!
column141:
s=538cadfee56b91d84c3fe77f8eba2504"" src=""""/>

We can’t thank you enough for checking out our project and helping us make Nori Backpack a reality.

We know not everyone will be able to support us with a pledge, so even if you can’t give a dollar or pre-order a Nori Backpack, you can help us spread the word on Twitter, Facebook, Reddit, Instagram and anywhere else you can think of!
